title: Great location
review: We were 2 couples who booked directly with the resort and as we had a suite we benefitted from the extras this provided. The reception staff were most efficient and helpful, despite a slow computer, and we all noticed the very pleasant aroma that wafted through the area, must be sent via the aircon. The suites are very comfortable and spacious with everything you need. Santos greeted us the first evening and what an asset he is!! He subsequently remembered our room numbers and always made sure we had a suitable table for the 4 of us. The buffet food is very good but the reason for not giving the full 5 stars is that as we went towards the end of the season there did appear to be some shortages on some evenings. We could have benefitted from the "dine around option" but many restaurants were closed or in the process of closing during our stay. The pool area is great with loads of sunbeds but again many of them need a good clean and I am sure that will happen when the resort closes down. The cleaning staff are tremendous and put in long hours, some are on duty late into the evening. The local bus stop is right outside and of course ther fare to the old capital of Ciutadella is only a couple of euros. We went in the first week of October but if we were to return it would have to be before the end of September in order to get the full package around the harbour, which is so charming and potentially lively in the evening. This resort is recommended.…

title: Ideal location for walks, beach and getting around the island
review: Great hotel could do with new sun beds, food adequate and the rooms take some getting used to, walk-in shower in the room not suitable for shy reserved people.  Entertainment ok but not the best, outside pool bar ideal for a nice drink overlooking the marina.

title: Excellent resort
review: Really lovely resort, very friendly, with fine facilities, spa, swimming pool, restaurants. We visited at end of season, and liked the quieter ambience. The harbour, with many restaurants, is a great setting. Finding cava and hand written birthday wishes in room was a very nice and appreciated touch.

title: Good not great
review: We just got back from a 7 night stay here. I’ll start with the positives.  Reception staff were nice and friendly and alway say hello. The room was nice and clean. The cleaner didn’t clean the cups but didn’t bother us to much. 2 dressing gowns on arrival and clean towels every day and air con was brill, good shower and fully working fridge and safe. Comfy bed with a few good English tv channels. Plenty of sun beds available. We stayed in 122 which had a lovely view and as soon as the door was shut you could hear no noise at all. Hotel is in a great location across from the Harbour with many restaurants to choose from. Bus stop just outside. Recommend getting the bus To citudella for €1.90pp it’s a great day out. We also hired a car and saw most of Menorca which was definitely worth it! 2 minute walk to the beach. Now the negatives. We went half Board and the breakfast was ok including the nespresso machines if they were working. The hot water for teas was lukewarm and the tables were never set so had to Go hunting for cutlery and napkins. The evening meals were terrible! we only eat there 1/7 nights. There seemed to be the same food every night and most of it was labelled so no idea what it was. 3 nights there was what looked Like lasagne and another 3 nights was some Sort of pork which we had on the first night and would not eat again. I Cant eat fish and there was quite a lot of what looked Like it but again mostly no labels. We looked every night to see if it looked edible but It didn’t! It all seemed cold and nothing at breakfast or evening was covered and I saw a lot Of flies on the fruit and salad. We ended up going to the restaurants around town for the other 6 nights. We find it strange that the hotel owns most of the restaurants around the harbour  yet most of them were closed due to nearing the end of season yet the hotel still accepts guests. We were there when October trials were on so On our last 2 days/nights we seemed like we were pushed aside for the people Booked in for that. They seemed Like the priority to the hotel. On the day of the festival We were refused entry to the hotel at the door by festival staff even through we were hotel guests and not part of the event  until we convinced him we were staying there. Saw management on the last 2 days and he couldn’t be bothered to even look in our direction as we were not wearing a trial top. We were not asked if we needed help With bags and when we checked out weren’t even asked if we enjoyed our stay or if everything was ok. Would return to his hotel earlier in the season and b&b only. …

title: End of summer suns
review: A long weekend stay here was perfect. Staff fully accommodating, the facilities were clean & modern. Fully enjoyed the break! The harbour is right on the door step along with the beach. Plenty of choice of places to eat & drink! Will definitely be back in 2020. Perfect!!!

title: Almost perfect
review: This hotel in our opinion with a bit of tweaking could of been perfect. After arriving at 12.00 the only couple to be dropped off the room was not ready I asked several times to no avail for the reception to contact cleaners only to be told computer says no. We eventually got the key and 61.40 euros(tourist tax) at 14.30hrs.We did notice other guests been checked in as early as 12.20 during the week. The breakfast lovely but evening meals very pretentious. Lack of storage in harbour suite rooms. Sunbeds very grubby and no mattresses supplied.If this hotel is charging 4 🌟 prices then these points need to be addressed. We traveled with TUI and the rep never turned up on Thursday or updated his information booklet for transfer times back to the Airport luckily reception had the…

review: Dear hugjo5,  Thank you for sharing your review through this website,   It's good to know all kind of opinions that help us to improve and get better,  We apologize for the check-in inconvenience, we must say that it's true that we do early check-in always when we've got the rooms ready, but check-in time is always at 3pm.   Despite of it, we really hope you enjoyed  your stay, faciliteies, services and staff, and we really hope to see you so soon!  Kind Regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Good position in Cala’n Bosch
review: We have just returned from a week at Lago Resort and we had a very relaxing enjoyable time.  The location of the hotel is good - overlooking the marina (a lot of the shops/restaurants around the marina seem to be part of the resort) .  This isn't a traditional Spanish marina - more for tourists and hotel guests really. but it is none the less pretty and nice to walk around after your meal.  The hotel is also close to a sandy beach, and if you venture out of the resort there is a cheaper supermarket (Betta Buys) just around the corner.  Aside from this, there is not much else in Cala n Bosch - there is a frequent, modern and cheap bus to Ciutadella (bus stop just outside the hotel).  Ciutadella is worth a day out. We had an early flight which meant a 03.00am get up.  We could not…

review: Dear bolton2013,   Thank you for a new revirew about our hotel!  It's a pleasure for all of us to know you enjoyed your stay here again! title: Beautiful spot
review: Stayed as a couple 1st weekend in October for one night as a birthday treat. Arrived on Saturday lunchtime, check in was so-so although not busy and given directions to room. The corridor leading to our room although clean smelt very musty. Our room was okay. Separate toilet but bathroom was in the room. The shower was big but water sprayed out when in use. There was nowhere for toiletries and the 3 mirrors above the basin were awful and so was the lights dangling down. I couldn’t see to makeup in the dim light and mirror. Bed was very comfortable though. We went to the Beach Bar for drinks. We ordered a beer and coffee. After 10 minutes the drinks arrived the coffee was cold. I called the waiter over who took it away to get another or so I thought. He returned a while later, by…

title: Great couples holiday
review: Our first time in Menorca and we weren't disappointed.  The room here was one of the best we have stayed in.  We had ground floor 'garden rooms' which were clean, comfortable and well-equipped (kettle included!).  Could not fault the food, we were offered meals in nearby restaurants but the food was so good, we didn't want to miss a night.  Though right on the harbour, this was a quiet spot with no disturbances (other than the current building work over the road, but this was a bonus to us, as we like watching construction).

title: Nice Resort in Cala' N Bosch
review: Our 4th visit and just as good. Food is great we stayed half board and didn't take advantage of the dine around as we enjoyed dining at the hotel. Even had lunch most days here too. Hotel is lovely and clean. Staff are very friendly. Music so relaxing. Enjoyed it so much returned in sept. Will be back next  year

title: Fabulous Holiday
review: Dear Mrs. Gillian C,  Thank you for your review!!  We are so glad to share with you a fantastic holidays!!  We really hope to see you again so soon,   Warm regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Relaxation
review: With my girlfriend we stayed in Lago Resort from the 24th of September til the 28th. We get a "Cool Suite" with promotional rates on Lago Resort's web site. When you book a suite you get some benefits like a bottle of wine, discounts on massages and excursions, free kayak for 2 hours and discounts on some restaurants of the harbour.  At the arrival we get a non proper cleaned room but the girl at the reception was kind enough and she gave us a new room in few minutes.  We spent most of our time at the pool and we really enjoyed the staff, the beach club is a great place to chill, relax and enjoy good drinks. Close to the Beach Club you have the Spa and the gym.   I would recommend this Resort and why not it would be nice to come back. We had 4 nice days, thank you Lago Resort!

title: Opt for BB only
review: We are only giving 3 stars for this hotel because of the poor quality of the evening meals. There were no food covers on any of the food,  thus allowing flies to land on all the cold meats etc., Not one meal we could say was hot, in fact barely warm , only saw vegetables twice in a week and potatoes are chopped  up either into poor shaped chips or cubes and poorly presented.  Our suite was lovely and spacious  but not without fault. Our hand basin  leaked all over the bathroom floor and we had to ask to get it fixed. Also not so important the TV would only show Spanish programmes, so we asked at reception  to have it retuned and waited a day but no one came to retune, so after some rethinking, my clever husband managed to retune himself!  The positives are the location as the…

title: Nice hotel
review: We stayed here in the first week of September,this was our 1st visit to Menorca. The hotel itself is clean.receptionist & concierge was very helpful and polite too. Our room (108) facing the marina was clean. Our room was clean everyday,but it wasn’t always spotless,but adequate. We stayed half board,breakfast was fabulous,proper orange juice,evening meal was a bit hit & miss. Some evening plenty to eats,other times not a great choice.Desserts was bit boring,same every night.We took advantage of swapping one of our evening meal for a meal in restaurant around the marina. Both our meals was lovely.  Outside pool was very cold,could of done with heated pool,more people might of got in it. Balaineese bed was great,easy to booked online. Found a few sun lounger & seating in need of…

title: Enjoyable but a few improvements would make it even better.
review: Have just enjoyed a week at this resort. On the whole very good but it does have its faults which could be easy to fix. I would not recommend staying here on half board, we did because there was the dine around option of 4 restaurants in the harbour. Having tried 3 of them and the evening buffet at the hotel I wouldn’t recommend this what so ever. Hotel food has lots of variety but the hot dishes are a bit cold. The Tropicana restaurant served the worst meal I have ever been served. We did ask if the manager of the hotel checked the food and were told yes. If Management do check the quality of the food they must think the hotel clientele like slop. We were also questioned about our reservation which we had booked through the hotel, we were then-questioned again and were asked to…

title: Nice hotel , not so nice for dining
review: I found everything in this hotel was lovely , but for the money paid it has unfortunately little things that let it down.  Firstly the room was lovely spacious, clean design but the toilet seat ugh!! The underside was stained yellow completely gross!!   We had breakfast,  this had  everything to choose from .  Then we were asked if we would like to dine in the beach club on our first evening , wish we hadn't bothered ! We ordered some rose wine after 20 minutes no sign of the wine ? I had also told them I was vegetarian as this was a set meal , they came out with starters and gave me prawn and avacado , I told them I had ordered a vegetarian meal and also we didn't want to eat yet as we was still waiting on our wine!! 5 minutes later someone came over and told us the wine we…

title: Amazing holiday
review: We stayed in one of the Bungalows across the bridge from the main hotel Can not fault one thing The bungalow & it's own little pool was great for chilling out at the end of the day  The main hotel & staff 100% No need to get up at daft o clock to get a sunbed round the main pool Everything was so laid back

title: Brilliant in every way !
review: Stayed here for the second week of September, had room 93 which was a harbour view suite. Very impressed with spacious room & terrace. It's very clean and modern, perfect for whatever wanted & such a fabulous location on the marina. I had breakfast each day in the buffet which was very nice but we chose to eat out in the evening. Choice of restaurants were huge, we ate a a fair few and always had an excellent meal. All in all a great hotel in a great location !

title: Great Place to Stay
review: Lovely location and accommodation, we’re here on a B&B basis, breakfast is great with lots of choice. Plenty of restaurants to choose from and a great location to go on walks from. However our time here has been spoilt by the building work going on directly opposite the hotel - constant banging and works noise . Avoid this location for the time being.

title: Lago hotel
review: I have recently returned from three nights at this hotel.  I travelled on my own and the hotel is in a perfect location as it is right next to the beach and over looking the marina which has lots of shops, restaurants and bars.   The hotel upgraded me to a suite which was lovely. Breakfast is great with a wide variety of choice. The DJ played some nice chill out, Jazzy and soulful tunes by the pool and I had some great cocktails from the pool bar. The Spa was really nice and the Spa staff were very friendly.  I enjoyed a Pilates class which was free and paid for two treatments (reflexology and facial).  The Reception staff were friendly enough but from my observation and experience, they seemed selective on how helpful they were and how much information they shared with certain…

We apologize if you felt that our reception team could have been unhelpful anytime, but we really must to say that they always try to make guests feel good and comfortable.  We really hope you'd love come back for your next summer!   Warm Regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Lago Resort
review: Today is our leaving day which makes me so sad. This is the best hotel where I have ever been. Personal is so kind, food amazing, beautiful rooms and pool.. We enjoyed everything. Definitely want to come back. Thank you so much!

title: Very good in some aspects, less than impressive in others
review: Have just returned home from a second trip to Lago Resort after a great holiday in 2018.  Whilst the staff were as friendly as ever the hotel was not as clean as my previous trip.  Dirty plates and cutlery in the dining room and maid service every day but towels not changed unless requested.  My main problem during the holiday were the Balinese beds.  They are a brilliant alternative to a normal sun bed but the reservation service needs to be revised.  The majority of guest are not aware that they have to book and often go to your bed to find someone already their.  Also the web link to book the beds obviously has a glitch as the bed I booked was not the one showing on their computer.  I feel they need to put reserve signs on the bed with your name or room number.

title: Mixed bag
review: We stayed here as a couple in August for 2 weeks and have mixed feelings about it. Our room was lovely, cleaned daily and had a gorgeous view of the marina. Some people might be put off by the shower in the room or people walking past your terrace but neither of these things bothered us. When you check in you get a bracelet with a fob for the door so no rummaging around in the bottomless beach bag for the key card.  The pool area was great, even in the middle of August you could get a sun bed at any time of day. It was lovely to not have to get up at silly-o’clock to put your towel out. They strangely had 2 submerged exercise machines in the pool though and I’m surprised there wasn’t an accident as they are really hard to see until you’ve almost gouged your stomach on them. We…

review: lovely two week stay in cases del lago, at the beginning of august.  from the minuite we checked in, to the day of our departure, fourteen days later, the service from the management, down to the maids was exceptional.  we could not praise them enough for their all round effort to make sure our holiday, for our family of four was a fantastic, relaxing break. ten out of ten!  Irina who checked us in, was very helpful and recognised us from previous years! breakfast was good, with a wide variety of foods, special mention to Claudia for wonderful all round service.  lovely staff on the pool bar, especially Fal and Amanda who were very friendly and always smiling. the djs around the pool were very good, playing different music that was good for all ages. the pianist on a night was…

Breakfast is great, would highly recommend this hotel for your stay in  Menorca, so close to the quaint marina and restaurants.

title: Great Hotel
review: We had the most amazing week at the Lagos Resort Hotel. Where do I start in singing their praises. The staff were all brilliant they were helpful friendly and just all such a pleasure. We were half board so had breakfast and dinner. Both of these were excellent with lots of choices and very healthy options all very fresh and regularly replenished. Also the restaurant was open later so there was no need to feel pressured to eat early. You had the choice to eat in four of the local restaurants instead of the hotel if you chose to but we did not take up this option, you could also receive discounts in some restaurants in the harbour by showing your hotel wristband. The pool and surrounding area was spotlessly clean and there were always sun beds available. There was live music at…

title: So glad I changed hotels!
review: This hotel is a must!  Stylish, classy, fashionable, with the most friendly engaging staff.  Adults only means a noise free relaxin environment. High end spa with expert staff New clean gym equipment  Every requirement met with a smile What more could you ask for.

title: Fantastic spa hotel

title: Fantastic Week!
review: We stayed for a week,all very last minute. The staff were very helpful throughout the  hotel. Always friendly. The restaurant was great. Lots of good quality items in the restaurant. Small restaurant but great range. The rooms were very clean and beds very comfortable and the decor was beautiful. Excellent location. Easy walk to beach and Marina. The swimming pool was warm and no problems with sun beds. Some of them you could even book. We would definitely go back.

title: Great stay!
review: Dear Kelly  Thank you for your review it's to important for us  We work really hard for to do our best in order to satisfy our guest Will inform to the staff to your good words, we apreciate it. It will be a pleasure to welcome back on your next holidyas  Kind regards.   Alejandor Alguacil - Main Manager

title: An excellent stay
review: My husband and I have just returned and we had a hugely enjoyable holiday. Accommodation was just lovely - really spacious and very clean.  Lots of little touches which we appreciated - water, beer etc in the fridge.  Air con was fab - weather was absolutely baking hot and the fact the A/C was so efficient definitely helped!  Pool area was very nice and we even used the spa facilities.    We thought the food was very, very good indeed.  In fact, we used one of the 'dining out' options and decided we preferred the calm atmosphere of the hotel restaurant and indeed the varied choice of food. Loved the 'fresh griddled' option every evening.  We also saw the Head Chef regularly wandering around and checking on how things were going - he's doing a great job as far as we're concerned!…

title: A very relaxing week
review: We spent a week here in one of the bungalows. Our accommodation was lovely, very clean and comfortable with the use of a lovely private swimming pool. The main pool area was also very relaxing and we enjoyed the music very much, can`t see why anybody would grumble about this! Our accommodation was cleaned daily and we found all the cleaning staff to be most friendly, hardworking and very helpful.  Overall this is a very clean and modern hotel and all the staff we spoke to were friendly. It would have been nice to have had a lounge or bar to sit in in the evening to enjoy a drink to round the evening off, (there is only the small gin bar).   There is no entertainment here but it wasn`t a problem as the marina is literally on the doorstep and there is no end of bars and restaurant…

review: Dear Sally W,   Thank you for spending a little bit of your time to value our hotel and write this fantastic review.   We are so glad you enjoyed our refurbished rooms and faclities and our delicious food!  We take into account your comment and suggestion about lugagge, anyway if you need any kind of help we always take lugagge and help people with it, even the team sometimes are too busy they keep it on the storage and then they bring it to the room. Sorry for this misunderstunding.  We really hope that next time the expectations will be reached.   Warm Regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Lovely week
review: Stayed for a week at the beginning of June. We don’t normally return to the same accommodation/hotel twice but had such a lovely relaxing break in 2018 we decided to return for a week this year.  The holiday was just as good , if not better than the previous year , bungalows were spotless, nice touch this year having complementary juice, beer, water in the fridge when we arrived.  The dine around option is great, the restaurants round the marina that are part of it are nice for a change. We ate out the 4 times and all the staff were friendly and a credit to the Lago Resort and food was lovely.  The hotel and staff are an absolute credit to the company.  Thank you all once again for a lovely relaxing break.   Hopefully we will return in 2020.

title: Lago resort
review: Hello,  Thank you for your good review!!  It's so helpful to us you transmit to new customers your good experience here !   We really hope you enjoyed with us so much and you decide to come over anytime !!  It wil be a pleasure to see you again on your next holidays.  Best Regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: WORST SERVICE EVER AVOID AT ALL COSTS.
review: After a bit of a shaky start (arrived there at about 11am and told room not ready until 3pm!) we had a lovely week. Adult only with buffet meals, breakfast being the better meal of the day, evening meal was OK but not that impressed with their hot choices. Salad choices with cold meats, fish etc was varied.  We stayed in the harbour view with terrace room, the let down for me was that the shower and sink was in the same room as the bed with the toilet being separate. Now I'm not shy and have been married for nearly 40 years but sometimes you just need that little bit of privacy to carry out your showering rituals plus it was right opposite the window and being on the ground floor passers by could easily see you through the curtains and I didn't want to shock anyone!! Staff were…

title: A Wonderful Week
review: We first arrived at the hotel it was around 5pm there was a few other couples who got off the same transfer with us. When walking in it was lovely a cool and smelt lovely but although there was a member of staff talking to a customer he didn't once say to us that he'll be with us in two seconds, instead another couple went behind into the offices we assumed to find someone to help us. There should be someone there waiting to welcome us into the hotel. We were given a small map to show us where our room was but we would have liked someone to help us with our suitcases to the room as you would get in other 4 star hotels just a more personal touch. This was even more apparent when we couldn't get into our room (the door is a set of french doors with an automatic lock system against…

We are sorry to hear that we could not offer you a warm wellcome upon your arrival and thank you very much for giving us the chance to improve this service.  Regarding to the room lock, we apologize for the inconvenient coused and we would do the best to find a good option.  Ones again, thank you for choosing us.  Warm regards  Alejandro Alguacil

title: Wow loved it Thank You
review: Really honestly can't say anything bad!  The staff were amazing, namely Mila in reception, Zoran, Javier and Khushal in the restaurant, Antonio in the pool bar and Javi in guest relations.  Can't add anything to the other 5* reviews and certainly no complaints!

title: Rodizio Mexican diner, go you’ll love it!
review: Loved It - Not long back from a 12 day Holiday, Room 134 stunning views over the Marina the sun hit it just at the right time each day, Sunbeds very comfortable. The room large comfy bed big pillows a fan to keep you cool that's silent. Big walk in showers good size fridge with perfect space for all you need. Reception opening friendly staff with the most callout music running all the way though the Hotel Bose speakers which extend out to the pool area. Where ever you are you are made to feel relaxed by the chillout sounds played. Breakfast great selection for all; Dinner well you could of gone out and eaten at anyone of the restaurants attached to the Hotel however the food splendid and I am so fussy with my food a true pain, yet plenty for me to eat. The Spa is a must visit,…

title: Amazing experience!!!
review: We had a wonderful time during our week in Lago Resort Menorca.  Clean, calm, awesome view over the marina, good swimming pool with comfortable beds, nice and welcoming staff, and extraordinary food!!! Located in a very good area, with a beautiful beach only 2min walking distance, and close to the wonderful Ciutadella!

review: Dear claudiavarasq,   Thank you for spending your time writing your possitive experience with us at the hotel!   We hope you really enjoyed our facilities and services and of course, our staff too!  We hope to see you so soon in the island again!!!  Best regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Great place for a break
review: What a great resort to relax and also enjoy watersports, sun and beach all in the perfect setting!  Friendly staff, professional service, nice SPA and gym made this a lovely holiday. I would highly recommend this destination.

title: Relaxing  hotel for adults
review: Dear montevivobook,  Thank you for your review!  We are so pleased to know that your stay was too positive!  We invite you to come over anytime and enjoy with us and our improvements att the hotel anytime!!  Best regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Some Great, some awful
review: Very impressed with this hotel. Adult only and 2 minute walk to the beach and the centre. Our room was excellent with quiet air conditioning and comfortable king size bed. Tv had good choice of UK channels. Food was very good quality with a good choice of dishes. Half board allows you to swap dinner for a choice of 4 or 5 local restaurants if you fancy a change. Staff were excellent, polite and professional and everywhere was clean. Pool area was very nice but recommend reserving a sun bed when it’s busy. Bs stop for regular busses to Ciutadella is right at the door and definitely recommend spending a few hours there

title: Mini break
review: We booked this hotel for a 3 night mini break. Quite quirky but after settling in found this place to be really relaxing (although the constant jazz music by the pool a bit annoying after a while!) Finding the room initially was interesting and the lock for the door takes some doing.  You can’t dine around in the other restaurants if you are staying for less than 7 nights. We had a marina room which was on the ground floor on the end and so quite private (had to walk past other rooms/patios to get to ours). There was no seating in room except for a plastic chair by the mirror. The loo door didnt shut completely and although a lovely very large shower it had clear glass so no privacy at all! We had a beautiful harbour view. The air con in room was good but the fridge never really…

title: Total Allsort!
review: Dear 224angier,   Thank you for your review, it’s really nice to read that despite some disappointing situations your stay was good and you could enjoy our buffet, staff and facilities.   We always try to give the best to our clients to make feel comfortable.   Talking about the room distribution (loo) do not hesitate to contact us and we will advice you about all room categroies and wich one match with your preferences.   We really apreciate you will give us a second chance to try to make your stay one of your best memories.   Kind regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Total relaxation
review: Just returned from a weeks stay at the resort.  Where to begin to give an honest review!  From checking in it actually reminded me of an updated Butlins as regards the rooms and layout.. we had a bit of a trek to our Bungalow across the bridge and harbour, although the man on reception did offer to take our cases we declined.  The Bungalow itself was self contained, with its own private pool which was lovely.  We could only get Spanish programmes on the Tv so not sure where the person who reviewed all the English Tv channels were available was! WiFi was good, no problems there.  I was expecting 2 Bathrooms, as I was with my daughter and husband for the week, but only one was there.. a distinct lack of mirrors as well when we both needed to do hair and makeup!  The fridge was…

title: Incredible Hotel
review: Dear Denise,   Thank you for your review, it's good for us to get some new advices to improve in our facilities and services, in this case we really consider about those small things that we sometimes don't get notice about it and we really need. We really appreciate you shared your time throught the website to post it.  We are so glad you could enjoy our facilities and services, it's fantastic you could felt good and comfortable among us. We understand that every person is a world and it's impossible that everybody like the same things, so it's good to know too your opinion about our food and restaurants.   We have to say that the restaurants we offer in the harbour are completely different one from each other, and there are lot of options to chose.  I really invite you to come back and give us a second chance, we can give you lot of recommendations and even we can make a scheme for you to reach your perfect holidays!  Hope to see you again!  Best Regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Good but could be better
review: OMG this hotel is amazing, we had a harbour cool room which was amazing, we didn’t need to go round the pool as the sun was on our terrace the whole day. Clean and tidy, staff were lovely and friendly, in fact one of the receptionists spotted us in one of the dine around restaurants and popped over to say hi and make sure everything was ok with our meal. It was easy to just pop down to the beach for a dip in the sea and then back to our terrace, the harbour area was very clean and tidy, felt completely safe even at night. Walk down to the bridge that crosses the harbour go over it and turn right to walk to the lighthouse and see amazing sunsets, turn left before the bridge and walk behind the hotels to the beach and watch the moon rise Only thing I would say is as the rooms are…

title: Lovely holiday
review: Lovely Marina chic room great view needs more evening entertainment food could do with been a lot hotter and more choices very small area where food is.Lovely lady taking Aquafit but she is from the spa so depending how many clients she has if it goes ahead.

title: Great location
review: Dear 101cain,   It's a pleasure you enjoyed the island and your stay with us. We are really pleased you loved our services and facilities.   We will be looking forward you to coming back with us!  Best regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: All fur coat and no knickers!
review: This is our 2nd visit to casa Delago. We stayed in the Bungalows on the marina. The rooms were outstanding & the location can’t be beat. Bungalows have a mini kitchen & midsize refrigerator. Breakfast was in main hotel & was very good but crowded at times. There are dozens of restaurants on the marina and many offer a discount to guests. We had issues in reserving the room as we originally booked the large villa. The hotel emailed me later and told me somehow the villa was double booked so they moved us into 2 bungalows instead. The bungalows used to be a family complex but it seems in the last year that had changed. Now only villas are for kids. We did encounter some odd behavior at the pool with a woman posing topless and her boyfriend taking pictures of her in various poses.…

title: Difficult to understand how it has more than 3*
review: Dear donnyagreen,  It's a pleasure you to let us know that is the second time you came to our Resort!  Thank you for the information supplied for new guests about the services we offer and restaurants on the marina.   We'd love to clarify that villas are adapted for families with children because the rest of the hotel is adults only. We'll never try to keep families out, that's why we've got those private villas, but  in fact what we try in our Resort is to transmit calm, relax and peace.   Talking about the taxi, we apologize you had to wait so much time in fact, but there's sometimes that taxis are full occupied and we really promise that our staff was trying to call more than one time.   Thank you for your review anyway it's really good to know you love the hotel and you could come back again!!  Best regards.   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Great 4* adults only hotel
review: On paper, this resort looks fantastic and doesn’t disappoint when you get there but so many silly things let it down. It has been refurbished to a high standard and is very cool and contemporary. I really liked the pool area and the music (unlike some others) the outside bar is a fantastic place to watch the sun go down. Food in general was very good (breakfast more so). We stayed a week and during that time: Fridge was off on arrival - fuse had popped, which we fixed ourselves!  Safe not working reported 2 times & nothing was done only for our Rep to get it fixed about 4 days in!  Water from the hand held shower ran scalding hot & freezing cold! The roof shower dropped out of ceiling and water was banging off roof plaster! This occurred about 2 days before we left and we…

title: The constant 'music' around the pool spoilt it!
review: We're having a lovely week at this resort, it's perfect for us in so many ways. A major minus is the tinkly, thudding noise of the music on a loop around the pool. If people want music to listen to surely they can plug in their own headphones........ We enjoy music but not whilst trying to relaxing so we moved ourselves up to the far end away from the pool but the music still dominated. Such a shame, we thought we had found a venue for an annual holiday! It'll have to be the beach tomorrow.

title: Good but could be better
review: Dear 709ChrisD709,  Thank you so much for your review it's fantastic to know you enjoyed our hotel at all.  It's important to us know about guests inconveniences and advices to make our hotel better and improve.  We'll must keep in mind about your complaints because we just only want that guests feel comfortable and relaxing during their stay.   We really hope to see you soon !   Best Regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Lovely hotel
review: Arrived to be advised our room wasn’t ready,  thankfully we were able to change at the Spa and leave our luggage so we could head out for lunch.  Reception a said they would call when the room ready.  No call so we went back at 3 and the room was ready.  Receptionist said she had called but we hadn’t picked up which was untrue.    Tourist Tax,  I had forgotten about this but to be charged 10% gratuity on top was rather annoying.    Our Room was a marina view suite,  a suite to me means more than a bedroom.  This is a large bedroom with the shower in the room. Hardly any storage.  The terrace with the sun loungers not private and everyone walking around the marina could look over as they passed.  Other rooms were set back and more private.  We asked the hotel to move rooms and…

title: Great holiday
review: Dear Dorothy P,  Thank you so much for those possitive words about the Resort and facilities. We apologize if you did'nt receive your phone call, we always try to give the rooms before check-in time that it's meant to be at 3pm  as we advice in our website and TTOO.  Our staff is always taking care about guests but maybe in this situation the phone number given was turned off, without connection or  just a mistake with the phone number.   Regarding about your 100€ upgrade we must say that we always try to make our guest feel comfortable and when is possible we give it for free, but in this case if the hotel is almost full we can't do that, and if the room a guest has booked is not what he loves we have to do that payment.   Talking about Cala en bosc, we are sorry if you expected other athmosphere but from june to september it is a very touristic place so there's lot of people. I really recommend you if you love the island try to come back in May or October.   We absolutely encourage you to come back here following our advices and as you know the different rooms we've got you could chose the one perfect for you. We'll promise to make your holiday better and unforgottable! Do not hesitate to contact with us!  Best Regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Wonderful Relaxing Stay
review: This is a beautiful hotel, great staff, nice position. We had a good garden suite away from the pool, slightly shabby ( rusty bath and fridge) not a problem too us, huge comfy beds, well cleaned , towels and beds changed when you asked. Shady terrace with the option of sitting in the sun on a bank of comfy chairs. The marina was not to our taste , TV sport beer and chips. Do go to Citadella it is a wonderful town, so lived in. One HUGE gripe, the awful evening meal, if only the staff would constantly watch to see when things ran out it's annoying having to ask for things all the time .We had (steak?)that even a Tiger couldn't have chewed. The food isn't kept hot it's put out hot and left to go cold, (no I don't want to microwave my meal) .  BREAKFAST IS PERFECT. could not fault…

title: Stunning Hotel. Wonderful holiday.
review: Just spent a lovely weeks break at this hotel with my wife. From start to finish we were really impressed from check in to check out. What a fab hotel , the staff were all great, very helpful at reception , nothing to much trouble no dramas .We  only had one small issue with the room regarding the shower which was attended to within the hour. Restaurant was top class lots of choice all freshly prepared, Breakfast too. Plus our 1st encounter with " Dine around" which meant you could choose from 4  restaurants around the marina to eat at in the evening, good idea. Room very modern and spotless, free safe, complementary drinks in the fridge, even the tv worked well. Cleaned and sheets changed every day if you wanted.Pool and surrounding area lovely too. Plenty of sunbeds available.…

title: Nice resort with a Marina
review: Dear Gavin M,  Thank you for your stunning feedback! It's fantastic to read a review as possitive as yours. We are so glad you could really enjoy your holidays with us and you could enjoy our services and facilities too.  Have to say that it's too important for us you posted some advices and information for next guests. Really pleased!  We really love to see you back here. Don't hesitate to contact any of us for information if you need anything.   Kind Regards,   Alejandro Alguacil. General Manager

title: Wonderful week
review: Good breakfast, dinner and Spa. Our room overlooked the marina, which was really nice. Staff all good and when I told one of the waitresses it was our last night, she brought us over 2 complimentary drinks! Really good value and you get the option of 4 close by restraunts ( which are owned by the hotel). We tried the Italian & Brazilian ones which were good.

title: Do not go here
review: Dear Passport35169748499,  Thank you for your review!  It's lovely you could enjoy the facilities and services we offer. We always try to do our best for our guests.  Hope you decided to share more holidays with us!  Kind regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Early Summer Break
review: We have just returned from a week at this hotel. It was all mostly very positive. Beautiful decor, exceptionally clean, great service in reception,from cleaners, and in the restaurant.  We really enjoyed the breakfasts especially the soft, creamy scrambled eggs. Freshly squeezed orange juice on tap, honey on the comb and Nepresso coffee.  It was possible to swap our evening meals in the hotel for meals in one of four restaurants round the marina. We particularly liked the Italian one. A few minor issues. It would be good to have a hand rail in the shower and a non slip mat.  It was nice to have music round the pool but it wasn't always to everyone's taste. Some well known tunes may have been more enjoyable to listen to. The bus stop to Ciutadella is right outside the hotel.…

title: Tranquil
review: Myself and husband stayed in the Largo Resort from the end of May until June for a week. This is an adults only hotel and it shows!! It’s peaceful, clean, classy and well maintained with stylish decor throughout. There are also no inflatable unicorns or sharks in the pool which is a blessing. On the subject of the pool, it’s really nice with plenty of space to swim around and relax. There are plenty of loungers and during our stay we never encountered an issue getting one. My only personal problem was the gravel like sand that surrounds the sun lounging area, it’s rather uncomfortable under foot and difficult to walk on, it also gets very warm. This aside however is a somewhat minor draw back given the beautiful surroundings which overlook the Marina. The location of Cala’ n…

title: Nice Break
review: Dear Bonster2411,   Thank you so much for your review!! It's a pleasure to let us know that you enjoyed your stay at the hotel! It's fantastic that you loved our services and faciliities and we take in advice your feedback about the beach decorative sand.   We hope to see you so soon with us!   Kind regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Be careful choosing your accommodation
review: We spent a week here End of May, first time to this hotel and Menorca.  The hotel was very clean and relaxed, reception staff helpful and it was exactly what we’d expected when booking.  We had a marina view suite, as others have said I wouldn’t say suite as it was just a room with an open shower and hand basin in it but lovely and bright. Open rail for clothes and little storage so once unpacked it felt a little messy but again it was clean and cool on hot days.    The marina view was there however be aware...our terrace was ground floor and with the main throughway around the marina outside, which meant you were like a monkey in the zoo with everyone staring at you as they walked past! That said we certainly didn’t have issues with thin walls that others have mentioned and…

title: Amazing relaxing birthday 🎁
review: Dear ManchesterMxh.  Thank you for your review, it's important to know your experience with us.   We are so happy you could enjoy our facilities and services even you have some unfortunate circumstances that make your experience not as fantastic as we tried.  Talking about the building work we are so sorry if it was so noisy and disturbed your holiday, it was something external we couldn't deal with, anyway we have been trying to offer the furthest rooms away looking for guests goods.  I have to point out that it has stopped during all the summer until winter.   Regarding about atmosphere and ambience we have to say that during the month of may and first of june there are not so much bars open until late or everyday because is not high season.   Anyway, we are so pleased you send your feedback throught this website. We really love you give as another opportunity to come back anytime to enjoy summer with us.   Kind regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Felt like a lot style over substance
review: Not all of the accommodation is suites as you may think. Ours was a room (although described as a suite) which had an open shower in a smallish bedroom, nowhere much to put clothes or hang wet towels and no storage or even a shelf in the shower and no way could we have spent two weeks in this ‘suite’. We paid to upgrade to a proper garden suite on the first floor which was wonderful with a large living area, table and chairs, bathroom and good sized bedroom, a kitchen area  and balcony and terrace with chairs and table.we preferred the garden suites to the pool view ones as it was so much quieter and more private and away from the sound of the constant jack hammers and diggers next door about which we were not made aware before we went. The pool area was very nice with large sun…

title: ☀️
review: Second time coming to Lago resort. Probably the nicest hotel around the harbour. However the harbour isn’t particularly nice.  Breakfast at the hotel was good. But we found food in other restaurants better for lunch and dinner.  Drinks in the hotel are good but expensive.  Relaxing stay. Music played around the pool was nice.  Never struggled to get beds around the pool.  Good bus service - Worth visiting the city Ciutadella.

title: Simply amazing
review: Dear Mrs Ellis  Thank you for your feedback, allways it's a pleasure to see you back in our hotel  It's a pleasure to know you enjoyed  in our resortresort,  We are sorry that you was found better meals in an other places we are work to improve, we want to do the best for our guests but we still hope to see you again in order to surprise you in a positive way.   Kind regards,   Alejandro Alguacil. Main Manager

title: Could be so much better
review: Just spent four days here for a last minute mini moon. It was just incredible. They upgraded us to a beautiful room overlooking the pool. The rooms are stunning, the pool area is fabulous, staff very friendly and the breakfast amazing. We are already planning to book our first wedding anniversary. Could not ask for more.

title: Relaxing Week at Lago Resort
review: Dear Annie5410,   We are so glad to know that you really enjoyed our facilities and services at the hotel.  All the staff from all the departments try to please our guests the very best way we know so it's fantastic to read a fantastic review as yours!   Thank you so much and we hope to see you soon in the island sharing moments with us too.   Kind regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Nice modern hotel
review: Booked this hotel due to the excellent reviews and location. We were so disappointed. We asked for a coffee machine. Not available unless we upgraded our room at a cost of 46 euros a night!!!. Changed rooms and the fridge didn't work.....waited 3 days for it to be fixed. No fridge, no milk so couldn't use the coffee machine. The room flooded on day 1 due to the shower waste being blocked. This hotel is Adult only but we saw children in the dining room. Food was average at best, little choice of veg or salad, and lukewarm. On the plus side it is a beautiful hotel and the staff are friendly.

title: Perfect break
review: LOCATION-great,overlooking harbour on one side beach on other APARTMENTS- we had a Garden suite, these were spacious, modern &comfortable,only criticism would be that the bathroom is a little tired &hasn’t been modernised but adequate. FACILITIES- The pool & bar area is lovely, as it was early in season you could use the Balinese style sun beds but you have to book these via the hotel website which I can see would be a problem in the busy months as there are only about 15 of them, the bar serves drinks &food that is a tad on the expensive side but you expect it at a 4* resort. As it is a Spa resort there are lots of additional services,massages,manicures ,Gym etc,we used the Spa circuit which has a spa pool,jacuzzi,thermal shower,Sauna &Turkish sauna,all of which were enjoyable.…

title: Great Location, friendly staff, fantastic food.
review: Dear tsjs h,   Your feedback is very important in our efforts to maintain the high standards of service to every guest and achieve the total satisfaction.  We are so glad to know you enjoyed the area, staff, location and food, we still hope to see you again in order to surprise you again in a positive way!  Kind regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Lovely Adult Holiday
review: For me this hotel is situated in an ideal location, with the marina at one side and the beach on the other. The staff at reception were very helpful and all the staff were very friendly. I stayed in a Marina chic room and it was ideal and had two loungers on the terrace which were exposed to the sun all day, also there were two chairs and a table. The food at breakfast was really good with real English bacon and pork sausages and a great selection of other offerings including champagne and fresh honey, straight from the hive. The crowning glory for me was the bank of industrial Nespresso machines complete with good selection of pods.(I do like my coffee.) orange juice was supplied from a hopper of fresh oranges in an automatic juicer. Top marks for the food both at breakfast and…

title: Lovely Hotel, lovely rooms, lovely everything!!
review: Dear Paul M,   First of all thank you for leaving your comment regarding your stay at Lago Resort Menorca.  We love knowing that you enjoyed your stay and our facilities.  Very good recommendations and opinions related to our hotel and the restaurants located in the harbour of Cala en Bosc. It's a pleasure to know that you loved everything!  We hope to welcome you again in the near future.  King Regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Amazing and peaceful bungalows!
review: Beautiful hotel, excellent food, great friendly service. Our room wasn’t ready but we had lunch in the sunshine at the pool, once we got our room we were really pleased, great to have sun beds on the terrace, shower and sink in the room but we knew that when we booked. The only downside of the room was there wasn’t enough hooks for towels and dressing gowns and no rack/shelf in the shower but otherwise great. Food was amazing, drinks slightly expensive but we did go out and about so no problem. Loved our holiday would recommend and we are looking to return

title: Menorca is the Perfect escape
review: Menorca has first class sophistication in service and style yet it seems to be adequately dosed with a touch of chaos which is very charming. If you want classy restaurants, it has this in oodles, there is even a restaurant in a cave! But if you want a little rustic charm, there is so much to soak up off the beaten track. Take a hike... no seriously, take one. You won’t regret going on a hiking trail around this radical coastline. It seems it has an endless emerald blue ocean every where you look. It has something for everyone. So don’t waste your time searching “best beaches in Menorca” or “best food”, just go, get out there, you can’t go wrong with Menorca.

title: Quiet relaxing break
review: Dear Ellie,  Thank you very much for your comments.  We are glad you enjoyed the range of restaurants.   We wish to have you back very soon.  Warm regards.  Alejandro Alguacil. General Manager

title: Harbour/marina  View Suite
review: marina room ,very long and open plan storage with the shower in bedroom. although toilet did have a door.Bed was very comfortable,kettle and cups in room,filled tea coffee on arrival but no milk and not replaced during stay. Breakfast very good selection,cereal,cold meats,full English ,really good juices and coffee pods. Evening meals not so good,warm most of the time,although a microwave is available, show chef available offering meat or fish cooked to order. Late in season so had no trouble getting any type of sunbed. No entertainment at hotel and most of bars around marina had shut.but Tom"s Bar still had a week or so still open,made very welcome even when it "poured with rain " Would like to go back but not so late.

title: Great staff and lovely food. A really nice place to stay!
review: Dear guest,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy you loved our hotel and facilities.  Also, we appreciate your review about restaurant, always good to know in order to improve.  We hope to greeting again in our hotel.  Best wishes.  Alejandro Alguacil. General Manager.

title: Great position
review: Have just returned from Casa de Lago after a brilliant week. We were lucky enough to be in the suites over looking the marina which are on the same level as the main hotel building. The private terrace was a real luxury  it was very quiet in resort as it is end of season and many places had closed, but this is only as expected and we had gone specifically for a quiet holiday.  Other reviewers have mentioned not being able to direct access the Marina. For security purposes this is absolutely the right thing. You simply walk through reception and turn left or right, to do the loop of the marina. The hotel is spotlessly clean, the food is lovely with an extensive choice, and the bar prices are very reasonable -€8 for a g&t and €20 for a good bottle of wine at dinner. No complaints…

title: Vikki and sean
review: One of the best hotel ever visited. Nothing was too much trouble for members of staff. The maids deserve 10 out of 10. Only 1 point we didn't get was at breakfast there was loads of brilliant coffee machines lots of fresh juice water and wine for free. Yet at dinner time everything was closed off. You could not get a drink at all unless you bought it. Other than that everything was perfect. Does this hotel have sister hotels? As would use again  anytime

title: Lovely hotel
review: Dear Vikki,  Thank you for taking time to give us your reviews.  We are really happy to know that you enjoyed your vacations in the Resort.  Best wishes from Menorca.  Director General, Alejando Alguacil.

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: We stayed here from 6 to 13 October so overlapped with the most recent reviewer and I can't imagine where or when they were eating but we found the buffet breakfast and dinner to be exceptional in quality and choice.  If anything ran out, the staff were quick to bring replacements usually without being asked..  Some people seem determined to complain! There was no queueing for tables when we were there.  We loved the Spa circuit, the pool area and the position of the hotel was very convenient for the shops and restaurants of Cala'n Bosch and the beach.  We were a party of four including two divers who had a great week and there was plenty to do for the non-divers, beach, spa and (cheap) buses into Ciutadella and other beaches..  We found the staff generally very helpful and…

title: Relaxing Stay
review: We're just back from a two week holiday at this fantastic hotel.  The facilities are superb.  However customer service is rather poor.  The guests are 'processed'.  You go into the 'machine' on Day 1 of your holiday & pass through.  Very little guest/staff interaction.  We arrived at 1pm and were told our room wasn't ready but reception took our mobile number and said they'd give us a call when we could get in.  Still waiting to hear from them.  There's no information sheet to let you know about the hotels facilities & that would be helpful. The food in the hotel was poor - very disappointing.  Frozen vegetables and chips in a ?4 star hotel. Many people complained the food was cold.  Guests have to queue outside the dining room waiting to be seated.  The layout in the dining…

title: Last word in luxury
review: We stayed for 1 week at the end of September. I wish I could have booked earlier as the dine around idea where you eat at different restaurants around the harbour is a brilliant idea but this finished the second day we were there. The hotel food is not bad but could have a better variation and be hotter, however the breakfasts are really good especially the pastries. The restaurant has a strange layout whereby you have to queue across the lobby area to enter. If you eat in the main dining area you also feel that you have to finish quickly for others to come in. The drinks were quite expensive compared to around the harbour. Our room was wonderful and very spacious for the 3 of us and also very clean with everything you need. The pool area was really good with no issue with…

title: Fantastic holiday
review: We stayed here for one week from 28th Sept.  Room very clean and cleaned daily-shower was in the room however no issue with me as I was travelling with my husband.  We stayed half board and couldn’t fault the breakfast or tea. Lots of choices and I especially enjoyed having different fish dishes every night. There’s something for everyone, even if you are a fussy eater.  The pool was very clean and we especially enjoyed relaxing on a Balinese bed- book this the day before for free using the iPad at the poolside bar. Never had an issue getting one.  We used the spa on one day as you can have it for one hour for free each day (book at reception). It was fab! Just us in it, and made use of the sauna, steam room, hot tub, and pool with its different jets of water for a massage! Also…

title: Very relaxing
review: The hotel was very nice. It was clean and our suite was lovely. The staff were friendly and helpful. The breakfast and dinner are buffet with plenty of choices. As with most buffets the food wasn't piping hot but a minute in the microwave provided sorted that problem. The choices changed every night so there was always something different. There was a cook station where there was a choice of a meat and a fish cooked to order, this also changed every night. If half board you could also choose from 4 restaurants in the marina to eat. We had been told about the dj playing music between 12 and 4 but it was background music and didn't spoil our relaxation. Will stay here again.

title: Great week ... But..
review: Spent a week here with friends between 22 and 29 September. Lovely hotel. Great location. Great food an friendly staff. Had an excellent time. Paid bill in full before we left.  However on returning home .. A further additional charge has been taken from my debit card without authority by the hotel. I emailed the hotel for details as I do not know what the charge is for. So far no response from the hotel.

title: just what we needed
review: Stayed here for a week from 17th Sept to the 24th. Spotlessly clean hotel, we were in a suite no 72, massive living room with a sofa 2 coffee tables and a round dining table, lovely bedroom with a view of the beach which is literally across the road. galley kitchenette with everything you need, dont forget to bring your tea and coffee. bath, very small with shower over it, but perfectly ok. we had a small balcony with garden view but could see the marina. lovely areas around the pool, balinese and round beds and normal sunloungers, if you want a bed you book it the day before on the ipad which is sat on the bar at the poolside bar. pool was lovely, bit cold to start off with but once your in its lovely, they have a walking machine and exercise bike in the pool, great way to…

title: Grand Resort
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for shearing your opinion.   We are happy to know that you have a fantastic experience with us.  Looking fordward to greating again at Casas del Lago Resort.  Warm regards from Menorca.  Alejandro Alguacil - Hotel Manager

title: lovely stay at the casa lago hotel
review: Recently spent a very chilled out week at the hotel. Staff very friendly and helpful. food good and hotel facilities good. The rooms on ground floor are open plan with no bathroom( walk in shower in the room) so not ideal if sharers using same room! Spa lovely but when I booked a treatment is was quite difficult and had to walk back and forwards from spa to reception to actually pin down someone to help. Massage was good but wasn't offered any opportunity to use the lounge area after the treatment and was just shown the door, which was quite disappointing. Also the sauna,jacuzzi were out of order for the whole of our week. However we would definitely recommend and return. Harbour is lovely with lots of choice for food and drinks.

title: Very laid back quality hotel and spa
review: Dear guest,  Thank you for your opinion. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the hotel. We would share your comments with all the staffs.  Regarding to your experience in the Spa, we do apologize for the inconveniences caused. We need to take care of the spa facilities and sometimes it need water treatment.  We wish to have the chance to make it better for your next time.  Warm regards from Menorca.  Alejandro Alguacil - Director General

title: Best Holiday Ever, very chilled.
review: Just returned from a lovey week at the Lago resort Menorca.  It’s location in the marina is lovely and the laid back feel makes relaxation very easy.  The staff were friendly and efficient, food was plentiful in the hotel (maybe could be a little warmer) and the fact that half board guests can eat at restaurants in the marina is a nice touch.  It makes a nice change to not have blasting music the entire time and the music that was played was a mix of cool funk and jazz at a lovely “background” volume.  Would definitely visit again.

title: Relaxing, chilled Hotel
review: Dear Dorset,  It is a pleasure to find out that you have a great experience with us.   We try to make your experience as nice as we could offering you a wide range of restaurants included.  We love creating nice atmospheres in the diferent hotel areas.  Warms regards from Menorca.  Alejandro Alcaucil - Director General

title: A Fantastic resort
review: Just returned from a weeks stay at this superb hotel and it's one of the best hotels we have every stayed in. We had a suite with a pool view, and view was breath taking, the room was spotless and cleaned every day. The hotel staff were very friendly and nothing was too much trouble, Jessica on reception was so helpful and really looked after us. The quality of food in the restaurant was out of this world, with lots of variation, they have gone for quality and not quantity, and I especially loved the fresh orange juice machine and the 3 x large Nespresso coffee machines at breakfast. The pool area was also spotless and plenty of sun-beds and it had a very chilled vibe, we also ate lunch at the pool bar a number of times and again the food was superb, the wine was excellent and…

title: Holiday
review: Superb visit will book again clean friendly staff welcoming food was great rooms over looking harbour location best by far rooms cleaned every day . Pool was clean sun-bed booking system works well spa facilities are good above all it’s a very high end 4star close to 5

title: fantastic chill out!
review: We saw this place 10years ago and always planned to stay. It exceeded expectations! Location perfect, overlooking the marina, we were in a pool view room (room 20) (worth the upgrade) which was great spacious, immaculately clean and with a fab view across the pool to the marina. The food was very good, fantastic choice at breakfast and dinner. Intended using the 'dine around' but never did as we loved the ambience in the restaurant. Which leads on to the fabulous staff! All very friendly and professional, special mention for Javier for being ultra organised and having a great sense of humour! Also Eloy for being a great Spanish teacher! Sorry to have missed him on our last day.  We had a car for the duration of our holiday (10 days) which at 300euro for EvERYTHING (Autosamigos)…

title: Location good but missing the extras to make it a good hotel
review: The positives of the hotel... it is a nice setting looking over the marina. The town itself if very touristy and scruffy and the beach had hundreds of sunloungers on them. This was our third visit to Menorca and recommend the less developed parts of the island. Breakfast was always busy but a good selection of food and wide selection of fresh smoothies and Nespresso pods. There were two bikes within the outdoor pool which was good for a little exercise if lounging by the pool.   The negatives... parking was chargeable so the car park looked empty and we had to look for street parking (which was easy enough). On arrival we were given these stupid wristbands which seemed to serve no purpose and were tight and irritating throughout our stay- I don’t see what the purpose of these…

title: Brilliant
review: We booked this for a last minute stay, Adults only hotel. It’s really lovely, chilled tunes played during the day. Lovely clean pool the hotel is spotless.  Yes checkin is very laboured but it’s also very thorough as they take you through everything.   I don’t know where people are getting the pool bar prices from but they are very reasonable for a hotel. A pint and a gin and tonic €11.80. Do not outrageous.   Staff are great breakfast is fab, we had to change room on checkin as our “room with a view” looked at burger king. But reception changed the room no problems and we got a lovely room over looking at the marina.   Loads of places to eat near by .. it’s great we will certainly return.

title: Relaxing gem
review: We arrived as a couple at this hotel about 1130 in the morning as we’d had an early flight.The reception staff were very friendly and helpful especially jessaco(sorry about spelling)the only problem we had was the room wasn’t ready until 3pm so a long wait.we walked around the  marina which was lovely but we were tired so when back to reception hopefully to get a room but still no joy.we were given 2free drinks vouchers so enjoyed a pint,then at 230 we were in.the room was fantastic with a kitchenette and studio and closed off bedroom,not 1 nights bad sleep apart from 1 Saturday at 700am when the local council decided to cut a tree down with a chainsaw(not the hotels fault).The food was very good as was the drinks in the restaurant staff great and cheery,the pool bar as good.one…

title: Father (80yr) & daughter (40)
review: Superb accommodation very very clean and well laid out on the edge of the marina in Cala'n Bosch. We stayed in 2 bed bungalow which is literally minutes from main hotel- cleaned every day without fault and also our own pool, sun lounges, remote controlled canopy, TV, compfy beds ,coffee making machine- refilled everyday, comfy seats and table chairs outside our bungalow. Air con fab, facilities great. Great location 2 minute walk to numerous restaurants and bars around the marina or 2 minute walk across the road to the local beach- again very clean and tidy with a nice beach bar. The local bus stops right outside the hotel and runs every half hour to Ciutadella and runs until after midnight- there is also a little train that goes from the bay around caln bosch - you don't see…

title: Superb stay at the Casa Lago resort and spa
review: Superb accommodation in a well laid out facility on the edge of the marina in Cala'n Bosch. Great location 2 minute walk to numerous restaurants and bars around the marina or 2 minute walk across the road to the local beach. The local bus stops right outside the hotel and runs every half hour to Ciutadella and runs until midnight. The accommodation is very modern and colourful and very well laid out we had a double room which had everything we required for our stay. We always got a table in the restaurant with out any waiting the food was to a good standard with the breakfasts being one of the best we have had in our many years of travel. The pool and bar areas are very good with Balti and round beds bookable a day in advance we always got a bed when we required one a great view…

title: Very disappointing not 4*+
review: Dear guest,   It's a pleasure for us to read such a positive review like yours.  We are so glad you could enjoy all the services and facilities we offer.  We invite you to come back on your next holidays and let one's hair down again in our Resort!   Thank you so much,   Kind Regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Lovely Hotel
review: First of all let me give you the good points. Location excellent but no access to marina from hotel. Rooms light airy and very clean. Free Wi-fi although not always a good signal. Plenty of sunbeds but most of them set on gravel which really hurt your feet- what the idea of that was we had no idea never seen it before and hope never to see it again. Dine around meals were really good but you could only choose 7 or 9 o clock. Now let’s get to negative points- check in took forever and there was often a long queue at reception- staff were pleasant however. Now to the meals we were half board breakfasts were an absolute chaotic affair. No decent cereals my friends husband bought his own at supermarket! No fresh food being cooked and never had hot food the whole week. We had…

title: lovely hotel with question marks
review: Have just had a very enjoyable one week stay with friends at this hotel. We did however have a somewhat shaky start after our original booking for a ‘chic marina’ room was upgraded to a ground floor suite. The ‘chic marina’ rooms at least have a marina vista where our original upgrade had no view and really did not justify being called an upgrade, however after a great deal of remonstrating this was resolved and we were offered an alternative first floor suite which turned out to be very pleasant.  Checking in is a very slow and protracted process as there is an unusually large volume of information to get though.  These two glitches aside the hotel is very clean and well maintained and our suite was very functional and spacious.  The staff are all very pleasant and attentive…

title: Lovely modern hotel in nice family resort
review: We stayed in a Marina Chic room, which is a ground floor room with a terrace, overlooking the  marina. It was bright, cleaned and modern. Be warned that there is no separate bathroom, only a toilet. The sink and shower cubicle are in the bedroom, so you need to be pretty comfortable with whoever you are sharing with! Also, many of the Marina Chic rooms are directly under the beach bar, so it can get pretty noisy when the entertainment is on above or people are moving chairs about. There are many other types of rooms available though! Cleaners will come daily if required, you just put a sign outside your door.  We stayed on the full board option and have no complaints about the food. There was a large selection of good quality food for breakfast and dinner, both buffet style. As…

title: Great hotel well situated
review: Dear Mrs Katy,  It's fantastic a review like yours. It's a pleasure let our staff know about your staying in our resort has been fantastic! We are so glad you shared your time writing those positive words about our facilities, services and workers.  On the other hand, thank you for the information given about the buses and prices, it's helpful to let other future guests know about those issues.  We hope to see you so soon and back to our resort to enjoy and share your next holidays with all of us!  King regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful
review: This hotel is very well situated on the harbour.We had a suite over looking the harbour on first floor so you over looked down on the harbour, well worth paying extra so you have that view all day.  The room is large with kitchen and lounge, TV has English channels which we occasionally watched after a day on the beech. The beech is 150 metres from hotel reception.  The reception staff were very efficient and we had a small problem with the room when we arrived which was sorted immediately.  We were on bed and breakfast as there are many restaurants to choose around the harbour so seemed no point to eat in the same restaurant every night.  The hotel only has one restaurant which is always buffet, it would be better if they offered a la carte in the evening. Also if the breakfast…

title: Beautiful Bungalows and Hotel
review: Dear Marrou42  Thank you very much for your kind comment.  We love knowing that you enjoyed our facilities as well as your stay at Casas del Lago Resort.  We hope to welcome you again in the near future  Best regards.  Alejandro Alguacil

title: Loved it - already booked for next August
review: WOOOOOOOW,WOW,wow once again. Absolutely love this hotel. Each time I review it I still can't find anything negative to report. (please read last years as nothing has changed) From the minute of booking until the moment we left I can't find one single fault.  It really is our very own piece of paradise.  We've been visiting here for the past 15 years and wouldn't choose anywhere else to stay. Rooms, staff, pool, spa, food, management, reception  all made us feel like real VIP's. Yes, it's a bit more expensive than other hotels in cala n bosch but in my opinion it's worth every single penny.  The chilled out VIBE, beautiful surroundings and attentive staff make for a truly amazing holiday. So much so that we've decided to come back once again next year for our very special…

title: Loved
review: Lovely place for a long weekend break. Everything you need is there.The rooms are clean and the cleaners do a very good job everyday. The kitchen is good for a basic - we managed to make a dinner in there one night. I would recommend get the breakfast, lovely variety. Beware they charge tax when you get there which is expensive. The food and cocktails/drink are a bit pricey but there's plenty of places to go if you want to save money. The parking was safe and well located.

title: Second time round and even better than first!
review: Dear Hollie.  We greatly appreciate that you have dedicated a few minutes to commenting your stay at our facilities.  We hope to have you back again.  Kindest regards.  Alejandro Alguacil

title: Dirty hotel and staff who should not be in the service industry
review: Lago resort has it sorted- chillout or what. Gym has been refurbished and loads more equipment which i used daily- relaxed vibe, and the food was fresh and varied. We hired paddleboards, cycles and used the new spa- it was everything a tired Area Manager needed! staff are excellent- yes, check in can be slow but whats the hurry? they offer a changing room and you can grab a drink poolside whilst you await your room....

title: Great Location
review: Dear Lou J  We greatly appreciate that you have dedicated a few minutes to commenting your stay at our facilities.  It is a pleasure to know that you have enjoyed the resort, its services of the environment and also values ​​the work of the professionals with whom we are lucky to have.  We hope to have you back again.  Kindest regards from the entire team of Casas del Lago.  Alejandro Alguacil

title: A paradise in Earth
review: Just back from a stay here.  We paid around 280 euros per night, which kind of sets a certain level of expectation.  We stood in reception waiting to check in a waited whilst one receptionist answered phone call after phone call before attending to us.  Then half way through checking us in, left us to attend to another customer and said her colleague would be here to finish off.  Not a great start.  The other receptionist was lovely incidentally.  The first day, we spent around the pool.  We had booked a bali bed, but there is no system in place to indicate which have been reserved, so when we arrived, we found that it had been taken by someone else.  Staff were disinterested in resolving this, so we just took another one which was free hoping it wasn't also reserved for someone…

title: lovely stay!
review: Just back from a two week stay as a family, been staying at this hotel for the past ten years, and still as lovely as ever! All staff were amazing, polite and friendly.   Checking in; everyone very nice, good information about breakfast, spa and the beds by the pool. Lidia and her team are very helpful and attentive.  Explain about booking certai beds by the pool, even though a lot of people didn’t listen to this which cause a few arguments over them!   Breakfast; great selection for everyone, all tastes catered for! Couldn’t fault. Claudia was exceptional, and could not do enough for us.   Room; very nice room, clean and tidy! The maids are very good, fresh towels and sheets when requested, extremely good, and always spotless.   Pool bar; very good, all the staff are extremely…

title: Memorable quiet adult get away, excellent staff,  excellent quality.
review: Dear Davideschels.   It is appreciated that you spend a few minutes discussing your stay in Casas del Lago Hotel  We are happy to know that after so much time spending your holidays in Casas del Lago  you keeps repeating and intends to do it again.  We hope to have you back in our facilities.  Kindest regards.  Alejandro alguacil

title: Super cool hotel great location
review: First of all the staff is at least trilingual (french, english spanish) with excellent calibre professional and friendly: we immediatly felt welcome. We had the chance to be upgraded from a room to a suite of excuisit design "live the summer" , finesse not to mention pristine cleanliness. Breakfast was complete to fit all tastes including british style, croissants and  a wide vireity of tea or nexpresso coffees for all.
