Towels changed regularly, moreover a DJ included an ambiance music at the pool for adults to chill and relax by the pool. Rest and chill is the priority since thre was no excessive music after 7pm.  We benefited a courtesy shower although we had returned the room on our departure, the receptionst hotel staff, included a Menorca key ring as a souvenir, 2 weeks…

title: My stay at Hotel Casad del Lago in Menorca
review: Dear AllenG  It is appreciated that you spend a few minutes discussing your stay in Casas del Lago.  We love knowing that today we still have the hotel identification bracelets on.  We hope to have you back in our facilities.  Kindest regards  Alekjandro Alguacil

title: Fabulous
review: Literally just returned from 10 days bed and breakfast at this uber cool boutique style adult only apartment/hotel. Lovely tasteful and modern white and turquoise rooms with English  tv channels for a change, wifi free and in all areas. Minutes from harbour and its restaurants and the small beach. Friendly helpful staff, great pool area. Balinese and round double sun beds needed to be reserved a day ahead which was ok but the system needs to be much much clearer upon arrival as there can be confusion and I witnessed a few near altercations when people accidentally took reserved beds!!! Big clear signs and instructions please. Breakfasts were excellent with good choice of continental and British choices (British bacon and sausages) lots of fruit and real freshly squeezed orange…

title: A Fantastic Hotel
review: Everything has been carefully thought about in this modern, wonderful hotel. First the only negative; The evening meals were dire - next time we'll be going B&B only. The evening meal chef needs sacking, sorry about that, but it's true. Everything on offer, apart from potatoes, were in a sauce, yes even the Brussel sprouts, I kid you not, they were in a red tomatoish sauce. Most nights the carved meat was the type sold at the supermarket for sandwiches, once or twice there was actual joints of real meat. Nothing seemed to be hot, perhaps that's what the microwave was for? Lasagna was brought out one night, I took the first portion from the 'hot from the oven' tray, added reasonably warm new potatoes and tucked in - YUK, the lasagna was still frozen - that would explain the…

title: Fabulous hotel!
review: Dear 1Silversurfer  Thank you for taking a few minutes to comment on your stay at our facilities, your opinion is very important to us. We love knowing that you have enjoyed your stay, facilities and services in Hotel Casas del Lago.. We hope to be able to have you in the future  Kindest regards.  Alejandro Alguacil

title: Relaxing and very lounge....
review: We stayed here for 2 weeks in June 2018, and had a fabulous holiday. The staff were exceptional, especially Joana, on reception, and Jordi, the restaurant manager. Everyone went out of their way to be helpful.  When we arrived late at night we were shown to our suite no 45. Think it was probably the worst suite in the entire hotel, as it was right next to the hotel service area, and we were awoken at half past midnight by the bins being emptied onto a lorry. The noise went on for quite a while. Then we were woken again at dawn, with lots of noise from the kitchens. However, my husband asked first thing in the morning if it would be possible for us to have a quieter suite, and we were moved with no hesitation whatsoever. Our new room was perfectly located near to the pool bar,…

title: Perfect short break
review: Dear Annette224  Thank you for taking a few minutes to comment on your stay at our facilities, your opinion is very important to us.  Kindest regards.  Alejandro Alguacil

title: Nice enough resort
review: Three girlfriends who needed a quiet place after a year of noisy students... This is the perfect place.our stay was very satisfactory, the hotel facilities great room cleaning as well. Food was excellent we had booked full board and buffet both at breakfast and dinner was superb. We tried one of the restaurant on the Port area, but not as good as the buffet at the hotel. Service was very professional, but the result in the end of ten days was a bit cold and detached. A more lively atmosphere, especially at the bar at night would have been appreciated, and absolutely some change after a day of uninterrupted lounge music. We really appreciated Leo at the beach bar for her kind suggestions and welcoming smile. At the reception we found incompetence for what concerns the island,…

title: Best place we have ever stayed
review: I cannot praise this hotel high enough. Staff superb, friendly, efficient and smartly dressed. The hotel was spotless and having been recently renovated, done to a high standard. Happened to mention that we were vegitarian to one of the staff, who must have told the chef, who then insisted on creating a special meal for us.  The location was ideal, on the marina and by the beach.  My only reservation with this review is more people will want to book a holiday to this hotel. which may make it more difficult for me to book a place.

title: Paradise Found
review: Dear  Paultogether  We are very grateful for your comment.  Comment that you have our phone and direct contact mail, we will always try to meet your request for availability with the best facilities we can offer.  Kindest regards.  Alejandro Alguacil

title: Short break
review: This complex is simply amazing! The staff are friendly, welcoming, happy and very professional. Our room was to die for! Modern, air con, walk in shower. The facilities onsite are again amazing. The pool and bar area is picturesque.  The breakfast is something to die for...  I can not find a negative about our short stay here.

title: Great Holiday
review: Dear Cragglea1  Thank you for taking a few minutes to leave your comment about your stay in Hotel Casas del Lago.  We hope to welcome you back to our facilities in the near future.  Kindest regards.  Alejandro Alguacil

title: A little slice of heaven
review: This Hotel is situated in front of the Seaport an back is close to the beach.Adults only. Swimmingpool, Spa, rent car, boat,... and many other service. Cleany. The Staff is very professional, smiling, and the carry on about of all the necessity. We have recived Upgrade to The Suite instead we had to stay 1 night less.  The breakfast buffet is various and assorted foods with typical product on Menorca & International, but, the fruits was not good and fresh. Coffe made by Nespresso.

title: Brilliant hotel
review: Where do I start! We have just finished our week long stay here. I don't usually write reviews but I feel it's needed here! (And I'm on the plane back...)  I can honestly say this hotel blew our expectations completely out the water.  The hotel was immaculate from the moment we arrived until the moment we left. All the facilities were brilliant and staff fantastic, most multi-lingual and always helpful. The cleaners do a fantastic job.  The room we had was one of the cheaper options but it did not disappoint. It was set out very well, decent shower & very comfortable beds - loved the pillows.. air con system aswell as a ceiling fan above the bed which worked fantastic when coming in from 32 degree heat! Nice touch to have a fridge, and the terrace area for drying clothes and…

title: Best hotel ever!
review: Dear Tom W  First of all thank you for leaving your comment regarding your stay at Hotel Casas Del Lago.   We love knowing that you enjoyed your stay and our facilities.  We hope to welcome you again in the near future  Kindest regards.  Alejandro Alguacil

title: The Good And The Bad Of Casa Lago
review: All I can say about this hotel is good. The decoration is so beautiful, everything white and blue, so many details. The staff very friendly and the pool with Balinese beds so nice. The beach is 2 min walking and there are lots of restaurants around.

title: Lovely hotel but is it really adults only?
review: Dear MONICA N  First of all thank you for taking a few minutes to comment.   We love knowing that you enjoyed your stay and our facilities.  We hope to welcome you again in the near future.  Kindest regards

title: Excellent friendly hotel
review: Recently visited this hotel as part of my honeymoon, on arrival a young man on reception seemed polite however didn’t really seem to know what he was doing we had to wait for our room and that they would give me a phone call when it was ready 5 hours later after exploring the beautiful marina I asked if our room was ready to which his reply was oh I forgot to call you not an apologie either.  Trying not to let this effect our holiday laughed it off and continued to our room,  room was lovely however lock inside was broken on arrival, the air con didn’t work and the fan consistently switched on and off dependent on the time of the day. We went Half Board part of this allowed us to eat at a number of restraunts around the marina, now wasn’t until after we had ordered and the bill…

title: A good hotel despite the hiccups
review: With this hotel we found that the good parts were very good and the bad were just a little annoying but overall a great holiday.  The very good:  1. Location was brilliant.  Right on the marina for restaurants bars and shops and right oposite the lovely sandy beach. 2. Food. We were half board and both the breakfast and evening meals were 5*. As much choice as any hotel i've stayed at in the last 20 years and good quality too. 3. Beach.  Whilst there was nothing wrong with the pool area except not enought working parasols and the 'sand' effect is grit which can be annoying, the beach has lovely white sand and is in a pictureque bay. However, it gets very very busy after 10am. We chose the beach mainly because there was a breeze there whilst by the pool the heat was a bit…

title: Fabulous in many ways
review: Dear Noddy1954  First of all thank you for taking a few minutes to comment.  The opinion of your experience is very important for us, thanks to his words, we know positive points to applaud and others to improve.  Thank you and kindest regards.  Alejandro Alguacil

title: Fabulous 🌞
review: Have just spent the last week having the most relaxing time in quality surroundings, kept spotlessly clean and with the most attentive and polite staff you could wish for. We stayed on a half board basis and food quality was varied and excellent, we took the dine-around option and ate at both the Rodizio and Tropicana marine side restaurants which didn’t disappoint, again very courteous and friendly staff in both.  We loved the location, just 2minutes to the bus stop to get a 20 minute bus into  Ciutadella, or 5 mins walk to Cala’n Bosch beach, or just chill out in the lovely pool area with elevated views of the marina.  We hope to be back again soon   Ps, if you want to hire a car, get one at the airport for the duration of your stay if you want to do some exploring, hiring…

title: Chilled
review: Dear MickBarber  First of all thank you for taking a few minutes to comment.  We love knowing that I enjoy the facilities and services we offer in Hotel Casas del Lago.  We hope to welcome you again in the near future.  Kindest regards  Alejandro Alguacil

title: Relaxing holiday
review: We have just returned from an all too brief week away at this hotel. We arrived early, due to time of flight and arranged a great private transfer from the airport, service was excellent, driver giving us information about Menorca as we drove through , took us about 45mins. Arrived at hotel, very impressive, clean and welcoming staff, our room was not ready but we were able to leave our cases in secure room and begin to enjoy the delights of the hotel, we had the foresight to pack our costumes in hand luggage. We had room 18 a 2 bedrooms suite, which overlooked both the marina and pool, for us it was an ideal room, balcony was lovely place to sit and enjoy all the ambience of the day and evening. Suite was large, very well equipped, lots of space to hang clothes, no problems…

title: Great place to chill out
review: The hotel is ideally situated next to the marina, with an array of lovely restaurants. We went half board, but we could still eat out at 4 other restaurants that were associated with the hotel. The Adults only hotel was so relaxing, with a DJ playing laid back music by the pool. Loads of sunbeds, and several Balinese beds for couples, although we did not bother with them. Food quality was excellent, and as stated many times, the breakfast was very good. Rooms were a bit quirky, small and with no wardrobe, just drape your clothes on hangers above the sets of draws/fridge/safe. We had a ground floor apartment with sun beds overlooking the marina (about 10yds to the waters edge from our terrace). A very mixed age range while we were there. All in all, I would highly recommend this…

title: Fanatic location and fantastic staff
review: Dear John A  First of all thank you for taking a few minutes to comment.  Your opinion is very important for us, it allows us to reinforce the positive points and study the negatives to give the best service to our guests.  Thank you and kindest regards

title: Nice Bungalows, BUT
review: This hotel is a gem and our stay was made extra special due to the ‘nothing is too much trouble’ attitude of all staff. I cannot say enough about the fantastic customer service!  We stayed under bed and breakfast as we prefer to go out for meals in the evening. The breakfast caters for everyone and we could not fault it.   We did try the evening buffet once, but the choice and quality was not a reflection of breakfast. However for €18.00 you can’t complain.   The pool and bar/lunch area catered for everyone and it was perfect. The pool is set up as a chill out area and the DJ sets the ambiance.   The only downside was our room. It was spacious but needs some modernisation. The bathroom was old and tired and the showered floods the bathroom after each use. There are better rooms…

title: Lovely Stay
review: Dear TGates76  First of all thank you for taking a few minutes to comment. As you know we have multiple types and categories of rooms in Hotel Casas del Lago.  We hope to can help you in your next stay with us to choose the room that best for your taste.  Very grateful, receive a greeting regard.  Alejandro Alguacil

title: Great location
review: Before booking this holiday we had asked our Tui travel agent for some more details on the bungalows at the resort and they very kindly contacted the resort direct to get the information and that was that the bungalows although not on site with the restaurants, gym, reception, main pool, bar and spa they were just a 3 minute walk away and here comes the BUT. If I had put my trainers on and did a very brisk walk I may have done it in just over 3 minutes but the reality of it is that you leave the bungalows through a security gate (which do not work a lot of the time) go down a slight hill and turn right and walk for approx. 50 metres, then you climb 24 steps and cross over the bridge to the marina and go down 24 steps and then it's a straight flat walk of approx. another 50…

title: Meh - 4 feels generous
review: When we arrived absolutely I absolutely loved it, the pool area is lovely and clean, we sat at the bar while our room was being made up and it was very relaxing and the view across the marina is simply stunning.  Our room is airy, well decorated and plenty of space for 2... however, first thing I noticed was the lack of air con, I checked the settings and to my surprise it was already on full, it never seems to get cool unless your asleep, the sofa in the front room is so uncomfortable to sit on, I feel like it’s only purpose is as a sofa bed not to actual sit on, the cushions aren’t in the correct place but to move them is difficult as they are part of the mechanics of the bed, the bedroom is a lovely little room at the back, it feels private and cosy in comparison to the rest…

title: a very good 4 star
review: Dear Meh  First, thank you for taking the time to write about your stay at the hotel  Comment that we greatly feel the incident with toilet paper, but we love knowing that you have enjoyed our services and facilities.  Kindest regards. Alejandro Alguacil

title: Lovely hotel
review: This is a modern, clean and airy hotel which is situated in a great location overlooking a lovely marina in a small resort a very short distance to a small beach (18 euros for two beds and a brolly on the beach). RECEPTION:very good and pleasant always willing to help and always a jar of sweets at reception for guests,but staff probably eat more than the guests. ROOMS:There are a variety of rooms so make sure you actually know which type of room you have booked as there seemed to be a bit of confusion with some guests as to which room they had booked.We had 41 which was a ground floor room which had been serviced in an excellent manner and had a patio which did not catch the sun at any time of day but was overlooking the pool area.The air con worked perfectly well and the room…

title: Great hotel, great service, great location!
review: Dear N0rmski.  First of all, thank you very much for taking a few minutes in your comment.  We love knowing that your stay at Hotel Casas del Lago  was satisfactory.  We hope to have you back in the near future.  Kindest regards  Alejandro Alguacil

title: Paradise!
review: Rooms - although compact we had everything we needed including a fridge and a terrace with sun beds, chairs and a table. Restaurant- very clean and well laid out. Excellent food served at breakfast and evening meal. Wide choice and fresh. Pool bar although the food was nice it was a bit on the expensive side. Pool - great pools, always sun beds available with a calm and relaxing atmosphere. There were some sun beds on gravel (I think this was to give a beach effect) this was very uncomfortable to walk on so we avoided those ones. Overall we had an excellent holiday. All staff very friendly and appeared happy in their work. They all worked very hard and nothing was a chore. It’s very rare we return to a hotel for a second time but will certainly consider returning to this one.…

title: June break
review: We are staying here at the moment. This is our 4th year back to this resort, and having stayed at two other hotels, this is by far our favourite. The staff are polite,efficient and nothing is too much trouble. Rooms are spotless and cleaned to a good standard every day. Food is of good quality and in plentiful supply. Bar prices are comparable if not cheaper than some of the bars in the marina. Great place for adults to chill, relax and have a good break. Music played around the pool in the day, but you can still have a conversation. One very minor gripe, reception should tell you how to get into your rooms, as they are patio doors, you put your key card against the handle, wait for the light to flash green,then turn the handle. So many people including us couldn’t work this out…

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Dear guest,   Thank you so much for this fantastic review! We really appreciate those words about the hotel and we love you could have had passed a fantastic stay on here, or even just for a magnificent break!  It's a pride for us knowing about this hotel is by far your favourite one! We'll promise we'll be trying to get better every year for making our guest staying super!   We hope you to be back so soon! Thank you so much!  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Loved it!
review: We stayed for 2 weeks from 5-19th June, and can honestly say this is a beautiful hotel.  1. The staff are brilliant - from initial check-in at reception, where Joana, Jessica and Marina were particularly helpful, but all reception staff were good. Joana was fantastic. The restaurant is run efficiently with Jordi heading up the team, who were all efficient, friendly and hard working. The housekeeping team were lovely too, and our housekeeper was always happy and smiling, and kept our room immaculately clean. The pool bar staff were also friendly, efficient and helpful, especially with assisting with the sunbed reservation system. In fact the staff across the entire hotel always had a smile and a greeting for us.  2. The breakfasts are absolutely brilliant, with healthy eating…

title: Fabulous hotel
review: Dearest guest,   Thank you so much for your review. It's a pleasure for us to read step by step what you think about our hotel and how you transmited your staying in here. It's fantastic to know that and very helpful to getting better and innovating every year.   We really love your tips about places to go and your lovely words to our staff and facilities.   We would like  to see you again!  Kind regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Relaxing week in the sun!
review: Stayed here for a week with my sister and we had one of the bungalows. Definitely worth it especially if you enjoy a quiet time around the pool as sometimes it was only us! A bit of a trek for breakfast and dinner but I’ve walked further when I’ve stayed in large resorts in the Caribbean. Food was good and well and a bonus that you could use some of the restaurants on the harbour side. The Brazilian was my favourite. Rooms were well equipped with outside sofas and were clean with a daily maid service. The resort was spotless. I would definitely recommend and would go back in a heartbeat

title: Child free holiday!!!!
review: What a great hotel!! The staff were brilliant. Full board option was great value for the two of us and our bar bill was very reasonable!!! Go and speak to Javi, on the boat excursion desk by main entrance. We can recommend the 3 hour hotel boat trip. If you book the hotel direct you get a discount on the boat trip plus other benefits such as spa use. Beach club vibe is great with excellent pool area and our room was good too. We would definitely book again. Taxi to/from airport is cheaper than the hotel’s private car and cheaper than several of the private transfer companies we looked at. Go to the capital one evening as it is fabulous.

title: Fabulous
review: Dear Mr Trevor,   Thank you for your comment is fantastic to know you really enjoy our Resort!!  We are so grateful you could encourage through this review our future guests to try to do our boat excursions and to provide them info about the food, facilities,discounts and transport! It's fantastic!!!  We love you could come back anytime!   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Beautiful
review: Just returned from a ten day break at this amazing resort. It was our second visit and it certainly didn’t disappoint....... we had a ground floor suite overlooking the pool which was superb. ALL the staff so polite and helpful and nothing too much trouble for them. We were on a half board basis and the food at breakfast and dinner was superb something for everyone’s taste. The pool and bar area gorgeous but if there is one criticism it’s the false grit/sand area which is truly atrocious but with lots of other areas available this can be avoided. Would definitely visit a third time.

title: 2 years on and this hotel is even better!
review: Dear guest,   It's fantastic knowing about your second experience in our hotel and we are so grateful you wrote a comment through this website expressing all your holidays and suggestions!  It's too important to know those little weaknessess to get better and improve in our offered services and facilities.  Thank you so much and we'll be waiting for your third time with us!  Kind regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Fabulous Hotel
review: Visited for one week with my partner beginning of June.  We went on a Bed and Breakfast basis as we like to eat out in the local restaurants. The rooms are beautiful, king size beds, large bathroom, lovely terrace. We also had a kitchen in our room, but we didn't use it. Flat screen TV and corner suite slightly off from the bedroom and Mirrors by plug sockets is always an advantage. Hairdryer supplied and a coffee machine complete with coffee pods, also tea. Breakfast is amazing. Fresh fruit, lots of cereal, all types of milk including soya and nut milks. Homemade croissants at least 3 types and a menorca corner which had vegetable and meat pies and biscuits and cakes. All types of breads, jams, pancakes. Full English breakfast, British bacon, fried and scrambled eggs, baked…

title: Wow
review: This hotel is probably one of the best hotels we have stayed in. The room was lovely and very modern, the view fantastic, overlooking the Marina. The shower was sink was rather unusual, being clear glass in the bedroom. We did worry that we would flood the bedroom, but needn't have. The shower is well designed like everything else in the hotel.  The food was fabulous. The chef needs a special mention for his tasty dishes. The orange juice in the morning was excellent too. Plenty of choice to suite all tastes and diets. We enjoyed the pool bar at lunch too. Again very tasty food.  The spa is probably the best we've ever been in abroad. My daughter had a massage and said that was very good too. To use the spa facilities costs €15.   The hotel staff are very helpful, polite and…

title: Great break in a modern spa hotel
review: Dear Mr and Mrs,  This is known as a FANTASTIC review! Thank you so much!! We are so glad to read this comment about the the staff and services of the resort! We finally are getting our goal that is to make our clients feel so happy!   We would like to see you again and you could follow and enjoy our improvements and successes!!  Warm regards,   Alejandro Alguacill, General Manager

title: Nice and really good hotel, but the music...
review: My partner and I stayed for 10 nights in June 2018. Check in was very quick.  The hotel, also having a spa, has a clean fresh feel to it throughout. Our room was large, with a double bedroom, kitchenette, bath/shower, lounge and balcony. From check in to check out the hotel staff were very friendly and attentive. All public facilities, including the pools and sun bathing area were spotless throughout our stay.... we particularly liked the sand area on which some of the loungers were placed as it gave that 'on the beach feel'.  The hotel is a 2-3 minute walk from the marina shops and restaurants, which has a lively feel all evening.  The hotel offers half board guests, like ourselves, the option to take evening meal in one of four restaurants in the marina, something we took…

title: Fabulous!
review: Dear Mr&Mrs Womblingdom,   Thank you for that amazing review! It's a pleasure for all the staff to know you could enjoy our facilities and services and you loved them! It's a pleasure to know that you could benefited from the dine around option because is totally exclusive and unusual to see in other places, so we're in constantly in pursuit of getting the best improvements and ideas to all of our guests!!  We'd really like you to stay here once and hope that it'll be so soon!  Warm regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Relaxing holiday
review: I and my wife have been here earlier a couple of years ago. It has recently been renovated and are in a really good shape. It's located close to the harbor and the staff are really nice and friendly. Our problem 50+, is the music. For us, it's close to read a book when there are loud music. We asked the staff in the reception to turn it down a bit and the very nice persons managed, but then some one turned it up again after some hours. The same pattern during two weeks stay, and was exactly the same during our previous visit. We wasn't the only ones that had problems with the loud music. This is really a pity since we in a way would like to go back, but my wife got head ache in the end due to the music. If you don't bother about the music, then I highly recommend this hotel. If…

title: Total Relaxation
review: This hotel, for adults only, is the paradise for a relaxed couple holiday. I believe it deserves the 4 stars, but not more nor less.  Plus sides: -The facilities (Spa, rooms, pool, beach bar) are excellent. The sunbeds are unreal! -It is in the centre of Cala n Bosch, surrounded by restaurants and anything you need. Beaches are really close as well.  -The room cleaning service is excellent. The hotel is really clean and tidy overall. -Javi, the excursion guy at the front entrance, was excellent at giving us little tips. Very knowledgeable about the island. -We got a room upgrade with an unreal sofa and kitchen!  Downsides:  -The taxi to the airport is far distance! around 80 EUR one way so have this in mind before booking.  -The hotel does not have room service yet. I found this…

title: Odd!!!
review: Dear Mrs Colomba,   Thank you for sharing your time and experience leaving a comment through this website related to our hotel. We really appreciate those comparison between the plus sides and downsides to let us know what we could change or how to improve and get better in our resort and of course for our guests.  In spite of the downsides is wonderful to read that you definitely stay here again with us. We really love that!! We count on it so hope to see you again on your next holidays in the island!  Thank you again,   Kind regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager.

title: What a Chilled Place
review: First of all, the staff are great, the food is OK, but the main meat (joints) nearly always Pork, but OK. Breakfast was well cooked, non greasy, general seating in the restaurant is comfortable, Hotel is clean. THE DOWNSIDES: Electronic booking via i phone or i pad for sun beds is awful, the amount of times ours was double & treble booked caused almost fights, and loads of stress, especially for my wife, its a stupid system. We booked a suite with Tui overlooking the marina, to our surprise it was a very small room, with only one chair, no English channels on the TV (not important) the shower is in the bedroom made out of glass so you must get on, have great looking bodies. There is no fan so the damp enters your clothes, as there is no wardrobe just hanging rails, things get…

title: Amazing hotel
review: Dear Knottfunny,   First of all, let you know we're so sorry about this comment and your experience. Anyway is too helpful to know your impressions and opinion about the changes and  new technologies we introduce this year in our resort. It's important to improve and to know the result or effect in our guests that help us to get better every day.   Anyway, we appreciate your review realted to the spa, food and facilities. We hope you could enjoy it instead those little problems you had to deal with. If we would had known we really had tried to do anything.  We hope you give our resort a second chance again once more!!  Thank you so much,   Kind regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Fabulous place to stay
review: We have just returned from a week at Casa Del Lago and what a lovely chilled place it is. All the grounds are kept clean and in good order, with a great pool area. We chose the half board option and never got bored with the choice and if you desire, there is a dine around option where you can dine at a choice of 4 marina side restaurants. We only did this one not, at the Tropical restaurant and found the food and service to be very good. The staff at the hotel were very attentive and pleasant. There are cabanas and rotundas at the side of the pool that you need to book the day before, that are worth the effort for the comfort. Hotel is in a great location, with a short walk to the beach and steps out of the rear of the hotel straight on to Harbour side. All in all a great week…

title: Relaxing week
review: Had a fantastic week here, the hotel is spotlessly clean, staff are helpful and ever so friendly and the location of the hotel overlooking the marina is superb. The week was so relaxing, being on b&b the breakfast was really good with a wide choice. Beach close by and a good choice of restaurants, we particularly enjoyed Noray and El pato. Wouldn't hesitate in returning, ideal for a week or long weekend.

title: Brilliant to chill out for a week
review: Dear Mr Mark,   Your review is super positive! It's  a pleasure to take care of our clients and what we always expect is all of you to enjoy our faclities and staff!  We are so grateful with this review through this website and we really hope you'll be back again!!  Warm regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Break away
review: Beautiful hotel located right in the harbour. We stayed in a bungalow which was located a few minutes walk from the hotel. The bungalow was bright and nicely decorated. It was always cleaned to a high standard with bedsheets changed upon request. The bungalows had there own shared pool which was nice, this was also cleaned regularly.   The staff were really helpful and friendly. Nothing was too much trouble. There was always someone around of you needed to ask something.   The breakfast was brilliant! A range of foods and they have english bacon and sausage. The evening meal offered again a selection but could get a bit repetitive at times.   The location was good; a short walk to the beach and right in the harbour. Lots of little supermarkets and restaurants nearby.   All in…

title: Being disabled a bit of extra help would be helpful
review: Dear Bethany,   It's fantastic to share through this channel your experience in our Resort! We are so glad you to have a really good time enjoying our facilities and our helpful and fantastic staff!  It's really helpful your review to express your approval to all of us.  We'd love to see you again in your next holidays!!!  Thank you so much,   Kind regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Management

title: Little piece of heaven
review: The hotel is easy to find. There is enough parking space nearby; there is a bus stop just outside of it for those who elected public transport.  At the end of May the maintenance team was still working on the appearance of the place. The hairdresser’s and the beautician booths were still work in progress in the basement, near the gym where the equipment is cramped and there isn’t any natural light. In the gym fruit is available and a jug of water is also there alongside clean towels. On a couple of occasions I’ve had to walk to the end of the long corridor to the other side of the spa to refill the jug with fresh water as it was empty when I arrived down there. The rest room or relax room, where people elect to go dyer a spa (you can go there any time we were told), has 2 large…

title: Best part of this hotel - THE STAFF
review: Stayed here last week, hotel is great, really good location and set out lovely. Rooms are very clean as is the whole hotel. Pool area lovely, friendly, relaxing atmosphere. One of the best things about thsi hotel is the staff, they are a young group but all very nice, always looked like they enjoyed their jobs. Special mention, manager take note, your very very good staff members who went beyond their role I feel were Marina and Giuseppe. They seem like two lovely young people who are a complete credit to your hotel. If we came back to Menorca we would most definatley stay here and would recemmend to anyone. Happy Days

title: Amazing chill!
review: Dear Mrs Deli,   Thank you so much for that review. It's a pride for us counting with a marvelouse staff that make guest feel as home! We are so grateful with your lovely words!! It's a pleasure you could enjoy your staying in our pool and facilities.  We wish you decide to come back any time!!  Warm regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Excellent but not 100% suitable for disabled.
review: I can recommend this hotel for all those who are looking for modern place with amazing food and lot of suntan places with always helpful and friendly staff!  Building is totally renovated, rooms having many amenities and hotel offers perfect possibilities to relax and enjoy Menorca sun. Was so convienient that we prefer to stay at hotel surrounding than beach area... Tasty food with some local cuisine gives you opportunity to try new things...  Thanks especially to Aitor and Giuseppe who always with smile helping us with :)

title: Great location. Shame about the food
review: Dear Mr Jagoda,   It's fantastic to read your review and to know that you are so satisfied with our facilities and staff!! All of us appreciate the you spent some time to write you comment and value about yor staying here. Of course is marvelouse you to recommend people to come to our hotel too!  We hope you decide to come back to the island and you chose our resort again  Kind regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: BEAUTIFUL, CLEAN AND RELAXING HOTEL
review: We booked this hotel and originally booked a suite,for our Sons, and a bungalow for us because it had a walk in shower that my Husband would have needed. They were aware that two of the party are wheelchair users but didn’t explain that, in order to access main hotel building, you had to walk a good 15 minutes or use a bridge with steep steps and no handrail. They were excellent though as they moved us to a suit the folding day which was next to my Sons and very close to the main building. The hotel is immaculate and staff cannot do enough for you. The standard of cleanliness is excellent. The food is really tasty and usually a reasonable selection so everyone should get something they like. The hotel bar actually was cheaper than some of the pubs down the marina. We never used…

title: Two weeks in May.
review: Summary of our trip.Given an upgraded suite which was very nice.Very good reception staff and helpful at all times .Suite very clean and serviced daily by competent and pleasant staff.Free safe and towels for the sun beds.No problem getting a sun bed.We booked half board the food was very good particularly breakfast.Good day out go to Ciutadella the local bus departs outside the hotel get a time table and map from reception.Did not use the spa two ladies I spoke to said it was very good.Had a problem with the hot water and telephone a maintenance man sorted the problems out.Using the restaurants around the Marina had not started so no comment.The area around the are cleaned to a high standard.We enjoyed our stay this is a well run hotel with good management and staff.

title: Outstanding hotel stay!
review: Dear Mr Michael,  Thank you so much for your review ! It's a pleasure you have had a good time enjoying our facilities and staff. We are so thankful you to chose our resort and we really wish you come back so soon!  Warm regards,   Alejandro  Alguacil, General Manager

title: Stylish Hotel in a great location
review: My husband and I are currently staying at Casas del Lago resort and spa. This was a surprise trip for my husband for our anniversary and this hotel has gone above and beyond. Marina at the front desk is absolutely incredible. I honestly can not say enough great things about her. My husband and I were greeted with a huge smile and were checked in quickly after our long journey. We were also generously given a bottle of delicious champagne in our suite. Our airline lost our luggage and Marina helped us with calling the airline representative and tracking down our luggage which was delivered promptly and she even placed it in our room while we were at dinner! The entire staff here is extremely attentive and truly care about your happiness during your stay.  The harbor room suite is…

title: Short break
review: Dear Nikki,   It's marvelouse to read this magnificent review about our hotel and staff! All of us hope you really have an enjoyable time and we wish that this magical island brings lot of beautiful moments and memories in your staying. We are so glad you to celebrate your anniversary with us and is a pleasure to attend you!!  Hope you to come any time because you and your husband are always welcome in the resort!!  Warm regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: 4 night break
review: My husband and I stayed in this stylishly appointed hotel in the first week of May. The location is excellent over looking the harbour so you have plenty of great restaurants on your doorstep. Everything about this hotel is exceptional. The décor is beautiful,  all areas are immaculate with lovely touches around the pool and grounds. There is also a spa and gym. Our room a "Cool Harbour Suite"(room94) was large, airy and finished to a very high standard over looking the harbour. We had an amazing terrace which had sun well into the evening it had two sun loungers table and chairs. I would recommend paying extra for this room. The breakfasts had plenty of choice from fresh fruit to cooked options really impressed by the quality and being a coeliac was pleased to see an area with…

title: Lovely hotel
review: Visited last week which may have been a bit early in season for the really hot days but enough for us. Great hotel, nicely situated at end of the harbour area. Lots of nice restaurants around it if you are not on half or full board. Food at hotel was okay,  breakfast was best, good snacks at beach club. Drinks can be expensive if you don’t watch your intake. Clear your bar bill half way through your hols rather than at the end. Doesn’t hurt so much then. Cannot praise the staff enough, especially Marina at reception, she couldn’t do enough for us especially when for me when I became unwell during our stay. She is a gem, just wanted to take her home with us. The hotel was quite empty as it was early season but that did not detract from its appeal. Nice size rooms, has a good view…

title: Great staff
review: Dear Mr Jim,   Thank you so much for your review! It's a pleasure for all the staff to took care about you all your staying. It's wonderful to know that you enjoyed all of the facilities even when you felt unwell and we really wish you to come back again and have a really good time as you deserve!  Warm regards from Menorca,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Brilliant stay Mr and Mrs Rowe
review: Cannot rate this hotel enough purely for the quality of the staff . Marina on reception was an absolute delight and made you feel so welcome. The pool and bar staff were also first class and spot on good service. We had a pool view room that was excellent and got the evening sun .

title: Switch off in the sun
review: Dear Ian,  Thank you so much for your review!  It's a pleasure for us to know that you enjoyed your holidays in Menorca!!  All of us hope you decide to come back next summer!!  Kind regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, Hotel manager

title: CHILLED OUT AND STRESSED FREE
review: The service we experienced in this hotel was tip top . The food is excellent , dining room and dining area are lovely .  Facilities are so good , including quality spa .  Sun beds and area are a special treat as the sun beds are comfortable  The best comment we would like make is about the staff . The staff in this hotel are outstanding !  They are very friendly ,always helpful ,kind and professional .  We really thought the staff team the best . Marina on recepion is a perfect star . We were told by one of the staff team they have a wonderful manager . How nice to hear a staff member speaking so highly of their manager .  All in all brill hotel . We are certainly going to recommend it to our friends and certainly we will go back . Thank you to the staff

title: Good Stay
review: We stayed here for a week in May 2017.  The hotel was good (good breakfast and facilities), but the room was a little tired (we moved rooms because of this, and even the replacement was in need of a bathroom update.   Great staff and service though.

title: Amazing Room
review: I visited this hotel last May as a treat for my 30th birthday and it was a  really good choice.  The hotel is modern and stylish and the views to the marina are really nice.   We stayed in one of the loft suites which is amazing. The room is very spacious with a seating area and a very comfy bed. The shower in the middle of the room made it extra special (not for the shy ones though). I couldn't book a room overlooking the marina as they were occupied but I think it would be worth it as the views to the marina are stunning. Our room also had a small terrace with a table and two chairs.   The ladies on reception  (Elisabet and another girl wearing glasses) were really friendly and helpful. The staff in the bar and restaurant could have been nicer though.   The spa is not too big…

title: Amazing holidays
review: The hotel is amazing with very beautiful swimming pool. The staff is very gentle and ready to help you in any way. We stayed in a suite and everything was perfect! The position of the hotel is very good, close to a nice beach, that you can easily reach by walking in 5 mins. Menorca is a paradise and I strongly recommend an holiday here, with amazing beaches and blue sea. I definitely recommend this hotel, especially if you are in couple or with friends.

title: Adults-only hotel in a family resort
review: Arrived before 10 in the morning, reception staff took my number and promised to call when our room would be ready. They never called so we waited about half a day until the official check-in time. It was not a huge issue since we spent the day exploring the surrounding area, but I do think if you promise something, you need to deliver.   So after this slightly rocky start we got our room, a Sea Cool Suite, which was nice but as it was on ground floor in the far end of the building, it really didn't have any kind of views. Bed was okay, as was the shower. The aircon wasn't very powerful, our room was slightly hot and damp for the whole week. It was annoying especially at night. We asked the reception clerk if they could check if it's working properly - not sure if they did or…

title: Beautiful beach hotel
review: Lovely hotel/apartment complex overlooking a lively marina lined with cafes, bars and restaurants. Was delighted to be given a 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment despite having booked a smaller room.  The apartment was in fantastic condition with great views over the grounds and marina beyond. Each room had a double or queen sized bed and good closet space. A bright combined living/dining room provided plenty of space as did a terrace with the same views. There was also a small kitchenette with fridge, cooktop, sink and microwave.  The pool area was great with plenty of space around the large pool which wasn’t very busy in May. Breakfast had plenty of good quality options including cava.  The property overlooks the marina which has plenty of dining options and a small supermarket to…

title: Late holiday in October
review: Great hotel and amenities , very helpful and pleasant staff. Room was bright and airy. We were on a half board basis, but basic cooking facilities were available in the suite.. The pool area was great with no shortage of beds, and the luxury ones were free, but bookable a day in advance. The beach was only 150mtrs from the hotel entrance . The food was excellent , so my only slight gripe that some of the restaurants were starting to close for the season is a bit irrelavent , as they were not really needed. All in all a great holiday

title: Casa Del Lago
review: Excellent hotel, arrived and our room was not ready, they apologised and upgraded to a room with a fabulous harbour view, staff was friendly and helpful, no problem with sunbeds, the music around the pool was so repetitive it became annoying, the location of the hotel was very good, we would certainly go back next year.

title: Lovely hotel.
review: The hotel was very good with friendly staff, spa and poolside bar.  I cannot fault our stay  but had a couple of niggles.  The music was loud throughout the day. A suggestion would be to have a couple of hours peace time.  The evening buffet was not very inviting and the food was always either cold or just warm. We were half board but only ate in the dining room twice. We ate around the marina for the rest of the week.   We would definitely go again but on a bed and breakfast basis.

title: Holiday
review: Visited for 2 years now keeps getting better and better Room best we have had in 40 years Pool area very relaxing beds very comfortable excellent pool service Breakfast food spot on Evening not as good but helped out by being able to go to 4 restaurants in town

title: Not as good as last year
review: The room had 3 faults the hand basin was fix the following day but the wobbly toilet and light was not. The spa had 2 water features that never worked and the food was not as good as it was last year.  Vegetarian food was hard to find for dinner two nights I was restricted to cheese salad sometimes provided in unusual containers.  Breakfast was very good with a wide selection.  If you get a chance to dinner out do so . The tropicana is good and if you book at reception you can dine there free once a week.  All the staff were professional and helpful but an extra thank you to Marina on reception who answered all our silly questions and gave us accurate directions and information.

title: A Lovely Holiday!
review: Having never been to Menorca before we searched online for one of the best rated hotels and came across Casas del Lago Hotel. We were sold on the ‘Adults Only’ part.  We arrived at the hotel around 1pm after a coach transfer of just under an hour which was absolutely fine. I’m not sure why people complain about the transfer being too long because if you do your research you would find out how long the transfer is before you even book! Certainly can’t blame the hotel for it!  First impressions of the hotel were great, it was bright and clean and we were welcomed by a receptionist as soon as they were free. We were informed that our room wasn’t ready (to be fair they do tell you that check in is 3pm) and so we started to get a change of clothes from our cases when another…

title: Jubbs autumn break
review: All staff were efficient, helpful and frindly. Hotel was clean and comfortable. Food was good. Location was good. Very quiet at the time but more lively in summer. Will definetly try again in the summer months.

title: A Lovely place to stay
review: The hotel is located in a beautifull a rea overlooking the Marina Andy very convenient for the shops reataurants etc. The hotel room was very spacious with a large comfy bed. The hotel ground S were imaculate w itch lots of sun beds around the lovely swimming pool.with one exception the hotel staff were very helpful and friendly. The one exception was the dinning room manger who seemed to run the dinning room with  fear which rubbed off onto the gusts causing an unpleasant atmosphere.  The breakfasts at the hotel were excellent  but the same could not be said of the evening meal.There was very little choice and the food was never warm enough. Had the restaurant experience been better I would have awarded the hotel 5 stars.

title: The best in Cal an Bosch
review: What a lovely adults only hotel, great location, great staff, great accommodation, great food, this is a spa hotel so you can relax any time of the year even in October we used the pool we would recommend this hotel

title: Beautiful hotel
review: We arrivered on the 14th of October. Landed perfectly, went through the Menorca airport no trouble. The transfer was a bit long. Over an hour on a coach full of people.. got to the hotel, beautiful from the outside than just the inside. Spread out nicely. Our room was beautiful. Got 2 rooms for just two people, but done me nicely instead of sharing with the other half. Little on the channels. Disney channel and nick I think, in an adult only hotel. Lovely and peaceful during the day, loads of sun beds. No entertainment at night which was a down full. Not much across the harbour either to be fair. Looked like many places had been shut down for a few weeks. Wouldn’t recommend going out at this time of year.. the town wasn’t busy nor was shops open. Only a few there too. Not much…

title: Location-Location_Location
review: We stayed at this lovely Hotel for 11 nights at the beginning of October and loved it.  Such a lovely location right on the marina and a fabulous beach on the door step.  We arrived at 11am so the room was not available, we left our cases in a secure room behind reception and spent 3 hours looking around the area and had a lovely lunch at Picalo's restaurant.  On our return we were offered an upgrade to a Bungalow situated just a 3 minutes walk from the hotel, the receptionist arranged for our cases to be taken for us as we decided to walk.  The Bungalows are situated with the villa's in their own private grounds with a pool accessed by your key card.  We had two double bedrooms, plenty of drawers and loads of hanging space for our clothes, a lovely big bathroom with walk in…

title: Wonderful stay at the Casas Del Lago
review: Dear guest,  Thank you so much for that lovely review!!! It's a pleasure for all our staff take care after you and it's wonderful that you could enjoy all the hotel facilites and services during your staying here.  We hope to see you next summer here with us and in this magical island!  Best regards!  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager.

title: Let down by evening meal
review: Myself and my partner stayed for a week from October 7th to the 14th October. We both had a wonderful and relaxing time. The hotel was clean and the décor was relaxing. We stayed as B&B only as we are foodies and like to get out and explore local places to eat. The staff were friendly and helpful. We had beautiful hot weather I visited the spa at least 3 times and my partner had a massage which he rated as good. We did go towards the end of the season when a lot of the restaurants had already closed. So on our last night we ate at the hotel it was only 18 euros each.  We have already decided to return again next year. Thanks for looking after us it was wonderful and the other guests were really friendly beautiful views of the harbour.

title: Amazing hotel
review: Dear guest,  Thank you so much for that phenomenal review! We are so glad to read that you have passed a fantastic days in our hotel enjoying our services, facilities and staff!! We'll be so pleased to take care after you again and so glad you to come on your next vacation here with us!!  Affectionatelly,  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager.

title: Just returned from honeymoon
review: Lots of pros and a few negatives, so do those first. Long transfer, 1 hr 20 mins. Dine around as advertised, and we were looking forward to, only available in 1 restaurant not 4 and despite the other 3 being closed told we could only use Tropicana once during our stay. Piped music was a bit loud at times and got a bit repetitive.  The restaurant at night did not cater for vegetarians despite several dishes being on the menu displayed at the main door, food choice very limited and took a while to replenish. It seemed the kitchen were just using whatever they had left as the hotel closes very soon. Pros. Lovely location, friendly staff, plenty of sun beds and unusually not the mad dash at 7am to reserve them! There was a system for reserving the better sun beds but unfortunately…

title: Hotel on the Marina
review: Modern hotel in a busy part of Cala den Bosch right on the Marina and just 4-5 minutes walk from a lovely secluded beach. Hotel and area quite quiet at this time of year but can imagine it would be fairly manic in high season. Good location right on the quaint, if understated marina, obviously catering for small family type "pleasure" craft, a world away from the more well healed occupants of Vilamoura and Puerto Banus, but very nice to walk around in the evening. Don't expect to do much "window shopping" as there are very few commercial shopping options here. Restaurants around the Marina (and there are plenty of them) only OK if you like "Pizza' et al, if not get half board in one of the 4 star hotels, better value for money as most have a "dine around" option at reduced cost.…

title: ANOTHER LOVELY STAY!
review: Dear Robert,  Thank you so much for sharing your time writting a marvelouse, detailed and complete review about our hotel, staff and the island. We hope you had enjoyed our hotel, services and facilities, but above all we wish you had enjoyed this magical place.  You should come back and try our spa, promise you'd love to come back for 5th or 6th time!  Hope to see you soon in a nearby future!  Thank you so much  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager.

title: Good value but some improvements needed
review: We come back to the Casas del Lago Hotel each year as it has everything you could want for a relaxing, chilled holiday.  This year we came here on our honeymoon and were really well looked after by all the staff.  There was a bottle of champagne and fruit waiting for us on our arrival along with a note of congratulations from the staff - a really lovely touch.  We were also given a complementary evening meal, which we really enjoyed.  As each year we hired a car - we did a couple of trips around Menorca, but to be honest it's so relaxed at the hotel that we found it hard to drag ourselves away from the Balanese beds!!  We've already booked our holiday for next year and can't wait to come back.  Thanks again to all the staff and especially to Lidia and Alex.  Doreen & Larry

title: Best Hotel in resort
review: Dear Doreen and Larry,  It has been a pleasure taking care of clients as you. Thank you so much for spending your time writting that lovely review. We really hope you enjoyed our hotel, facilities and services and wish you felt like if you were in home.  We wait hopefully you to come in a nearby future to share your vacation with us!  Thank you so much,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager.

title: Worth a 4.5 but not a five
review: This fairly last minute break for rest and relaxation was half the price I usually pay for four star in the Balearics, so I was prepared to get what I paid for. We had a lovely week, spacious suite with a fabulous view of the whole marina, comfortable bookable Balinese beds, friendliest staff I have ever encountered, a nice spa and fabulous breakfasts. With some improvements this could be really a great place to stay. To really be a four star from my experience, Please improve: The bathrooms in the junior suites, our was very old fashioned and shabby, out of place with the rest of the suite and the shower was only workable if you held it in your hand. The hairdryer on the wall blew cold air. The buffet food in the evening, the main meals were not good and the sister restaurants…

title: Superb relaxing break
review: If you are  wanting a holiday that is relaxed, peaceful, adults only, with superb facilities and pleasant and helpful staff, then this is the place for you! Casas del Lago is superbly located opposite the small beach and overlooking an "inland" marina. All the rooms are well appointed and are either ground or first-floor or facing the marina below the pool. There are plenty of sun beds around the pool area, most on "sand" which reduces the risk of slipping or falling and beach towels are provided by the hotel. There are large "super" beds adjacent to the pool that can be reserved, particularly helpful for people with disabilities. Breakfast is buffet style but with a huge range of options to suit all tastes.  We were offered an upgrade when we arrived and there is also a storage…

title: Good place, shame about sand
review: Dear Lyndon,  We are so glad to read you enjoyed here in Menorca, but specially in our hotel. We appreciate that outline related to our services and facilities. It has been a pleasure to take care after you and we hope to do it again so soon.  Warm regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager.

title: Spa experience
review: This was my first time back after 10 years. Hotel has had a very good upgrade.  Staff are fantastic, helpful, friendly, superb. Food was good we didn't feel the need to go out to other restaurants Area was exactly as it was 10 years ago, nice but still the same. I did feel it was a little over priced. I took a very heavy fall in one of the bars and ended up in hospital for a full day, here the staff were also great. The hotel were very supportive over this matter. The worst part for me was the fact that virtually all the normal sunbeds are placed on what was supposed to be sand but it was almost like cat litter, very difficult to manoeuvre on, leaving grit everywhere and making the pool appear dirty.  As a disabled person I found it impossible, as did many other infirm people…

title: Beautiful setting.
review: Dear Adrian,   Thank you for your possitive review of the hotel. We appreciate you took your time writing those beautiful words about our services and staff. We hope you had a good time here and enjoyed the island.  We look forward to welcoming you soon again here.  Warm regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager.

title: Adults haven
review: I paid €15 for one hour in the so called Spa. The dynamic pool is advertised as being between 31-33 degrees  However it was more like 20 degrees and chilly.. So much for advertising for helping with aches and pains. I would recommend checking the water temperature first as it was a wasted €15.

title: Amazing place to stay
review: This is an amazing place to stay the rooms are amazing beds super comfortable, breakfast outstanding, staff friendly welcoming and always have a smile on there face and they are helpful. The only thing I would say is that the restaurants around the hotel could be better there is one restaurant that is outstanding and that is called la marina

title: Late check out hospitality
review: Dear guest,   Thank you so much for this magnificent review of our hotel. We hope you have spent a memorable vacation with us!!  You suggestions are very important for us to improve in our hotel & restaurants, we'll take it into consideration.  Hope to see you so soon!!  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Lovely new room, harbour view
review: My husband and I have had a great stay at one of the villas but did not use the hotel/spa just because we could not fault our villa. However with a late night flight due we were offered a courtesy room in the hotel until our transportation/departure. We must write about Noemi the lovely, pleasant and very pretty receptionist with whom managed us both on arrival on day one and our final day. Whilst we intrigued her with the concept of contemplating 'squatters rights' she gave us a very clean room to store our belongings in and use of hotel/spa facilities. A true credit to your team.  We enjoyed relaxing at the pool bar, sipping mojito's and basking in the sun until we return to a probable raining U.K. We'll happily recommend this place to anyone else wanting a chilled 'no kids'…

title: Great stay
review: Dear guest,  Thank you so much for leaving this comment regarding to our hotel! We wish you had a fantastic holidays here in Menorca and a fabulous time in our Villa! We are so thankful for you to recommend our hotel and we hope to see you herea again so soon!!  Thank you so much  Warm regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager.

title: Dream come true paradise
review: We’d actually booked a suite, but when we arrived we’d been “upgraded”.  In this case, the room was actually smaller than we’d booked, but newer and with a much better harbour view. The only thing missing was the facility to cook our own food, but the Reservations Manager comped us dinners if we wanted them, so it was a no-brainer to stay in the newer room.  The hotel has a fantastic location, with views across the harbour of Cala’n Bosch.  Meals are buffet-style (except lunch) and the restaurant is lovely and clean with great, friendly staff.  We’re already planning to go back next year, and this will be our first choice of hotel.

title: Fabulous hotel for a relaxing break however it  being understaffed caused issues!
review: The locations was perfect, probably the best in the resort, overlooking the small marina. The hotels only a few minutes walk to a wide selection of bar restaurants plus a small shopping centre and supermarkets. There was a beach nearby and the marina ran various  boat trips. The area was also flat so very accessible to wheelchair users and those who are not good on their feet. Unfortunately the first impression of the hotel wasn't very positive as the overly small reception area was full of people trying to check in or waiting for rooms to become available some had waited for hours. The check in time of 3pm is the latest I have ever encountered and there seemed to be a reoccurring issue of a mix up with rooms and it didn't 't help that in different online sites the rooms are…

title: AMAZING
review: Dear Audrey,  We are really so sorry to hear this request, we wholeheartedly apologize if you felt bad and uncomfortable here anytime. We always try to help and make our guests feel comfortable during their staying with us. We hope see you here a next time and we will try you to feel better and pass a wonderful vacation and finally to get that this hotel & staff will be what you expected.  Thank you so much,  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager.

title: Not what we expected!
review: Just returned home from one of our best and most memorable holidays. I cannot recommend the hotel enough. The staff were friendly, professional and helpful - the restaurant staff work relentlessly to ensure excellent service. The food is incredible - we were slightly concerned after reading some of the reviews on here but had no complaints. The food was plentiful, well cooked, immense choice, beautifully served and warm (if not piping hot). Another great option is the Dine Around which is a great addition and we did take advantage of this one evening and had a wonderful meal at Tropicana. The breakfast juice bar, unlimited Nespresso refills and huge choice of food were fabulous. Dinner was another array of delicious choice and flavour. My only compliant is that I ate too much!…

title: Great location.
review: Dear guest,   We're so glad and grateful to read that request of our hotel! It's a pleasure to all the staff to know that you enjoyed properly your holidays here and that you loved the services and facilities we offer!  Hope you to come again with us as soon as next summer is coming! Thank you so much,  Warm regards,   Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager.

title: Wonderful care!!
review: Stayed here last week and to be honest we were a bit disappointed after reading all the great reviews. The hotel is on first look very nice and in a great location. It is exceptionally clean and bright and the staff are all very friendly and very hard working - a credit to the hotel. We loved -  The bed in the room was fantastic - we've even checked out the label on the mattress to see if we can source one in England for our home. The staff - they were all young and energetic and helpful. The  gin hall - try the local gin with hibiscus tonic - really good. We booked the jeep safari through the hotel reception and that was brilliant - a must do! The cleanliness - nothing was overlooked. The location - our room overlooked the marina - nice view. The resort is very flat and easy to…

title: A relaxing oasis!
review: We booked Casas del Lago hotel for our last holiday as a couple before we have a baby! We had a beautiful, relaxing week at this hotel and honestly couldn't fault the hotel in any way! It is a stunning, modern, light and airy hotel!   We stayed in a room right next to the pool which was huge - more like a little apartment! Comfortable and kept very clean every day! We loved having a little lounge area to relax in at night before heading out!   The pool area is beautiful - we spent most of our day here! There was no shortage of sun loungers and the pool was a great size - it never felt full! We weren't fussed about the Bali beds as the sun loungers were comfy and set away from the pool which we liked! We absolutely loved the chill out music which played every day especially when…

title: Brilliant !!
review: Dear Risklovebe,  Thank you very much for your lovely review regarding our Casas del Lago Hotel. We really appreciate your good comments about the hotel. We are happy to read that you enjoyed our facilities and those fantastic reviews related to our staff. We are looking forward to receiving you again in the very near future again.  Warm regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager.

title: Great hotel, fabulous area, but if only the food was hotter....
review: Loved this place. Loved the food,  the hotel and the staff were very attentive and professional . Jorge the maitre de kept everything moving swiftly at all times and Noemi at reception was so sweet and interactive with us that we always looked forward to seeing her ! The "muscles" from menorca ( we called him hercules ) around the beach club was great too. As long as you understand that if you want one of the double sunbeds or round ones you have to pre book them a day in advance that way you can go at your leisure as long as its before 12 noon. If you havent claimed it by then anyone can take it which is fair enough I think. Theres a dj in the afternoon which we enjoyed but take yr headphones and ipods if your " particular " about what  you listen to ! The hotel looks over the…

title: Great hotel close to everything!
review: Dear Teresa&Tony,   Thank you so much for that smashing review regarding our Casas del Lago Hotel. We really appreciate your good comments about the facilities, servicces and staff.   It was a pleasure for all of us making your holidays better!  We are looking forward to receiving you again in the very near future.  Alejandro Alguacil, General Manager

title: Cool place to chill out
review: Arrived after a long journey desperate for shower only to be told the rooms are not available until 3pm (latest we've ever been able to check in). So we went to the beach bar and had lunch while we waited. Back to reception at 3 for our room, handed keycard to room 22 by one receptionist but then called back by the other. The two receptionists then had a conversation in Spanish before telling me that the room we had booked (sea cool suite) had a maintenance issue. She then said we could either keep the room we were being given or come back after breakfast next day to get another room. Room 22 was fine overlooking the pool but we quickly realised the bathroom ceiling had a leak. As we'd paid extra for a sea cool suite I called our holiday rep who said she'd contact reception on…

title: Loved it so much we came back for more
review: This is a first class resort - we came in July and loved it so much that we decided to return this week. We were not disappointed - a lovely peaceful location, comfortable accommodation, good food - and most importantly excellent staff everywhere. A special mention to Esther, Miguel, Mauricio, Jorge, Andres,Barbara and Melanie who all went out of their way to make our stay extra special. If you are looking for a laid back relaxing and peaceful holiday in a beautiful location - look no further.

title: Best Hotel on  the island of Menorca
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your kind feedback. Feedback like yours are very important to improve our service standards.  We're happy to hear you've enjoyed your stay and would be pleased to welcoming you back again at our place.  Yours faithfully, Alejandro Alguacil, Director de Casas del Lago

title: Relaxing break with the Mrs...
review: Beautiful, pristine resort with impeccable service and facilities. Could not want for anything. We would recommend to all Australians, whom appreciate quality facilities and service. It was in the perfect location on the port.

title: Nice; in fact, very nice
review: Dear Eileenq  Thank you very much for taking the time to add your review of Casas del Lago Hotel. We really appreciate your good comments. We are looking forward to receiving you back in the near future.  Best Regards, Head Receptionist Elisabet Benejam

title: Amazing place for total chill out
review: Best hotel in this resort. Good being adults only. Very nice and relaxing around the pool area. Good breakfast and good pool bar food. Drinks a bit pricey.    Overall we had a great 5 days here. There are a couple of things I would note if you are planning on staying here.   Firstly, in my opinion if we had a basic room we would have kicked off as there is a separate building where these rooms are. If you are planning a stay it is well worth booking a pool view room as they are really nice. If not a marine view is also very nice which is what we had. The beach view room, well if we had paid extra for that! Pfffft, you need a telescope to see the sea, first a main road, then a tacky bar, then in the distance the sea!  Secondly, every person we have spoken to (including us) gets…

title: last minute trip
review: Wow,wow, WOW.......!!!!! ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS PLACE....... Simply Perfect!  After visiting this beautiful hotel for many years now all I can say is it just gets better and better and better. Even from the moment of booking ,the reception and reservations staff could NOT have been more helpful. Lidia,Elizabet and Noemi are wonderful. Reserved round sunloungers for us on our arrival were a very special touch. The hotel has expanded over the last 12 months and it certainly does not disappoint. New and updated rooms are so beautiful. Modern, spotlessly clean (well done housekeeping) with the most comfortable hotel bed ever. We were upgraded to an amazing marina view room with fantastic terrace compliments of Alex (general manager) who also is wonderful and treated us like real…

title: Good relaxing break
review: Dear Lindsay  Thank you very much for taking the time to add your review of Casas del Lago Hotel. We really appreciate your good comments and we are very happy to contribute to celebrate your happiness. We are looking forward to receiving you back in the near future. It is a pleasure to have clients like you, we all miss you.  Best Regards, Head Receptionist Elisabet Benejam

title: Sun loungers galore.
review: Spent a week at Casas Del Lago half board, our first holiday at an adult only hotel and a great choice for us. We moved rooms on our first day after a leak in the bathroom ceiling to a much nicer and recently modernised room. The manager couldn't have been more helpful. The hotel is spotless throughout including the pool and gardens. The bed was extremely comfortable and we slept well all week. Good choice of food at breakfast and dinner in the main restaurant and always a choice of seating. We had lunch several times at the poolside bar. The quality was good again but service a little slow at times, better when the maitre'd was present. We enjoyed the round sunbeds and never had a problem booking one. We took advantage of the dine around option a few times and enjoyed this but…

title: Great choice
review: Dear Palm,  Thank you very much for taking the time to add your review of Casas del Lago Hotel. We really appreciate your good comments and we are very happy to contribute to celebrate your happiness.  We are looking forward to receiving you back in the near future.  Best Regards, Head Receptionist Elisabet Benejam

title: Perfect!!!
review: The best place to come to relax. The staff are lovely and attentive. Special thanks to Jorge, Miguel and the wonderful Ismael who looked after us at dinner. We would love to come back here, we had the best holiday ever. Thank you to everyone.

title: Perfect and more than we expected
review: (We are a couple both around 30) We stayed at Casas Del Lago hotel for 5 nights and 6 days at the end of August 2017. Booking online directly with the hotel promised us many extras and VIP treatment at a cost no greater than any other websites and very competitive prices of other hotels in the area. We received everything we were promised and more. Including, two free drinks, a bottle of wine, spa access, and two hours of paddle boarding. We were also lucky enough to receive a free room upgrade to an apartment overlooking the pool and marina, which was an option if we booked online if available. Everyone was friendly, the breakfast was amazing and a big plus for the smoothie station where a lovely smiling lady made fresh juice for us every morning at no extra charge. It was…

title: Very relaxing holiday
review: The hotel had all the amenities you require, with good food and very good service. The hotel has a great view over the inlet harbour from the restaurant. There is no mad rush for the sunbeds and there is enough beds all the time.The hotel is very close to the beach, but we did not go there as the hotel had great facilities. We would normally try other resort restaurants, but we did not as the hotel food was very good.

title: Basic Fundamentals missing
review: Dear Ken,  Thank you very much for taking the time to add your review of Casas del Lago Hotel. We really appreciate your good comments about the cleaning, facilitites and services. It is a pleasure to read that you enjoyed your holidays in Menorca and at our Hotel.   We are looking forward to receiving you back in the near future.  Best Regards, Head Receptionist Elisabet Benejam

title: Upgrade on 1st year Anniversary!
review: Stayed in this hotel expecting it to be a 4 * experience . This was.not the case . No welcome with a drink and niceties !  The door to the suite takes a degree in engineering to operate , as many clients agree . Why do they give a paper with instructions on how to open a door . Unnecessary hassle on holiday .  The smell from the toilet and associated drains has been disgusting, The wash. basin does not drain into the drains but on occasions onto the floor of the bathroom . I mentioned this to the cleaner but to no avail . After the cleaner left on one occasion chewing gum was ground into the floor , removed by me .  The. breakfast is disappointing.. only saving grace the restaurants where one can dine are very good .  I am sadly disappointed, holiday ruined by hassle .

title: Highly Recommended!
review: Dear Barbara,  We are very sorry to know you had not a great experience with us, we will take in consideration your reviews and will try to ameliorate inasmuch.  Best Regards, Head Receptionist Elisabet Benejam

title: Super Relaxing
review: We have just come back from two weeks at Casas del Lago, my wife and I went with our two daughters, they having been for a week last July. The place is very good, totally relaxing, and really chilled. We have a double bedroom apartment with two bathrooms, very nicely laid out and very clean, in fact the whole place is very clean, if you are up early you will see an army cleaning the pool area, sun beds, decking etc, cannot fault it on cleanliness. They have 12 double round sunbeds and about 15 double sunbeds some of which are under canopys, these can be booked at the beach bar a day in advance only, which was totally fine. Last year there was a charge for this and for changing beach towels, but this is not the case now. We got the beds we wanted every day no worries. There are…

title: The best holiday ever!!
review: Dear Nick,  Thank you for your nice comment and the time spent on your review, we really appreciate our guests feedback. We are glad to hear you had nice time with us. We hope to see you soon on your next visit to Menorca.  Head receptionist Elisabet Benejan

title: Beautiful hotel ! Very relaxing
