review: Dear Cris A A,  Thank you very much for your lovely review regarding our Casas del Lago Hotel. It is always a pleasure to read such a good comments and we cherish your recommendations as we aim at making our clients stay the best possible experience. We are happy that you enjoyed our facilities such as our pool, and the hotel services. We are looking forward to receiving you back in the near future.  Warm regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP

title: Fab holiday!
review: We recently stayed at Casas del Lago for 7 nights and our first time at an Adults Only hotel. Situated in an elevated location,overlooking the marina at Cala'N Bosch, the first noticeable difference was the peace and quiet around the pool area..... bliss !! Booked on a half board basis with Thomsons, the breakfast was substantial and delicious. Done on a buffet style with an incredible amount of choice. Particular mention must be given to the waitress Vera, who seemed to be at work 24/7, always with a smile on her face and nothing was to much trouble for her - a gem of an employee. The pool area and bar was very clean and tidy, plenty of sun loungers and an option to pay for a circular bed / balinese bed for the day. Included in the cost were two mojitos and nachos/dips. Special…

title: Really good but...
review: The hotel itself is in a lovely location and spotlessly clean. We love the fact it is adults only as it makes for a relaxing atmosphere. However, unlike some of the previous reviews we haven't found it without fault thrée days into our holiday. Many people ARE putting towels out on sunbeds four or five hours before turning up - all Brits I have to say. Quite wrong. Today was busy and, as someone else pointed out, the fact that non guests can use the pool facilities meant not enough beds. Not really what we expected from reading other reviews. Next point is meals- breakfast is lovely but evening meals disappointing, overcooked meat and very samey but they do make the effort and we have had worse. Last moan is the near to useless aircon, about as useful as making a fan out of a…

title: A lovely relaxing hotel
review: We stayed at the Casa Del Lago for a week in August. We planned a relaxing, quiet, child free spa holiday and that is exactly what we got. Our room was spotlessly clean and just like the pictures. We loved the pool area and there was no rush for sun beds as there were plenty. The location of the hotel, right by the marina is lovely as it is a nice view and is lovely to walk around in the evening. We chose half board and we were more than happy with the breakfast and evening meal choices. We did eat out one night but actually we preferred the food at the hotel. The restaurant staff were lovely and the spa and massage was really relaxing. We would happily stay here again. It was just what we wanted.

title: a relaxing place
review: Dear 5chapz,   Thank you very much for taking the time to add your review of Casas del Lago Hotel. We really appreciate your good comments about the cleaning, location, facilitites, staff and services. It is a pleasure to read that you enjoyed your holidays in Menorca and at our Hotel.   We are looking forward to receiving you back in the near future.  Best Regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, Director CASAS DEL LAGO HOTEL 4*SUP

title: Relaxing stay
review: just back from a week at this hotel, was in room 75 which is a harbour cool suite...well worth the extra money to have the peace and quite. The breakfast is excellent with british sausages and proper bacon on offer along with the usual continental sections of cooled meats, cheeses and fresh fruit. The evening meals were tasty but must agree with other reviews that they could have been kept warmer...must be something to do with their hot plate/lights. The resort and surrounding area is nice to walk around day or night with a good selection of shops and supermarkets to get the essential beers in for the fridge.The beach (or should say swimming in the sea) was actual closed for the last 2 days...don't know if it is open up again now, due to some "toxins" found in the water,…

title: Fab
review: We had a very pleasant week here in August. The hotel has a great location, 50 yds from the beach on one side and overlooking the Marina on the other. The rooms were spacious and very clean. We had cleaning and fresh towels daily and clean sheets mid week. As mentioned in some other reviews, there was a slight drainy smell in the bathroom but we covered the drain with a towel and no longer noticed it.  Our apartment was directly adjacent to the lovely pool. There was never a problem getting a sunbed, but you could pay extra to have a Balinese bed. We didn't do so as initially I though it was a bit of a rip off at 15 euros for the day. However, it seems you get a couple of Mojitos and some nachos thrown in so not so bad...  Adults only comes into its own at the poolside. Here…

title: Great hotel, great area
review: Hotel, shared areas and rooms were spotless.  We were lucky to be offered a update on one of our rooms (we'd booked 3) and were given one with the light-up bedroom - which was fun, although we were glad we didn't pay the extra for it as the 'basic' rooms are really nice anyway.    We really enjoyed eating in the restaurants around the harbour, and there's a nice (large, outdoor) bar with live entertainment every evening.  Going back to the hotel pool bar for a nightcap very enjoyable too (closes at midnight, so not noisy when you're ready for sleep).  Breakfast was fine, although might get boring as same buffet on offer every day.  We didn't eat any other meals in the hotel but saw others who did and it looked good.  Would definitely return for a short, relaxing break.  Plenty…

title: Beautiful adult only hotel
review: Dear 4Jayz,  Thank you very much for your lovely review regarding our Casas del Lago Hotel. We really appreciate your good comments about the facilities. We are always looking for improvement.  We are looking forward to receiving you again in the very near future.  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP

title: Delightful
review: We booked into this adult only hotel and were not unhappy with it at all.  The pool is lovely, the music referred to in other reviews is not too loud and adds to an atmosphere of calm and tranquility.  It is wonderful not having to put towels out to reserve beds because there are too many for the number of guests.  We did not choose to pay for the Balinese beds but they looked lovely and were popular.  The bar next to the pool has a seating area for romantic balmy night drinks or other seats at tables for eating at.  We did not use the SPA but it looked lovely.  Breakfast is a buffet at which you can choose different types of nespresso coffees, juices etc.  You then had a choice of fried breakfasts from a buffer bar, cheeses, meats, pastries, breads - all very delicious.  We did…

title: Casas Del Lago
review: Dear Simon A.,  Thank you very much for taking the time to add your review of Casas del Lago Hotel. We really appreciate your good comments about the hotel and will take in consideration your review about room 71.  We hope we can see you again and show you our other rooms.  Best Regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, Director CASAS DEL LAGO HOTEL 4*SUP

title: Perfect location
review: The management very kindly answered the many questions I had before choosing (lone female traveller) ; all answered honestly and accurately so on checking in and going to be my room all my expectations were met.  Fantastic views of the marina from the balcony; from the terrace at the rear - the little bridge and out to sea.  The room was spotlessly clean (no smells at all!!!), the light changing bed great fun once I'd learned how to use it!  The bus stops right outside the hotel.  Beach just across the road.  The Balinese beds wonderful and luxurious.  I felt very safe and secure. Staff could not do enough to assist and help me.  The spa - amazing; bijou but the staff outstanding.  I had three amazing treatments in there and reflexology by the pool.  More than enough choice for…

title: Fantastic holiday and hotel
review: Stayed at Casas deal Lago for 11 nights mid August. Hotel is in a fantastic location, our Suite overlooked the marina and the blue cow!! Yes, random blue cow in grounds!! Note that check-in isn't until 3, but holiday companies don't pass this on to you. We arrived at 12.30, so went to Beach Bar for a nice snack, room was ready at 2 and we had been upgraded to 2 bedroom suite which was brilliant as travelling with husband and 16 year old daughter, so she got her own double bedroom and bathroom. Breakfast is amazing, so fresh and huge choice. Lovely Spa, Thermal Circuit for €10 is a must. Beach bar was good and agree that it was better when Xavi was working, he does amazing local cocktail - Pomada. Rooms cleaned daily, fresh towels - our cleaner was Rosa, so sweet and didn't speak…

title: Nice apart from the music
review: Dear Del1803,  Thank you very much for your lovely review regarding our Casas del Lago Hotel. We really appreciate your good comments regarding the location, facilities and services. We are glad to know that you have had a fantastic holiday at our hotel. We are looking forward to receiving you again in the very near future.  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP

title: Good Hotel
review: Very clean,great food,accommodation clean and well kept.The only problem is the music which is very intrusive and played loudly. I did ask for it to be turned down but they didn't take any notice.It is a common moan ,I like music but not canned lift music certainly not chilled. Other guests commented the same and looking at reviews a theme. I popped into town and bought some ear plugs apart from that all good .

title: Lovely hotel
review: We stayed at the Casas del Lago Hotel with friends, we had adjoining harbour view suites. The outlook from the well furnished balcony was fabulous, we used the balcony most days for sunbathing and just watching the activity in the harbour.Although you can see the restaurants across the harbour there was no sound to disturb your sleep at night. The cleanliness of the rooms and of the common areas was excellent. The staff were very helpful, friendly and all seemed to enjoy their work. Breakfast was good with a good choice of hot or cold items. Just a couple of negatives,some of the hot dishes at breakfast were either over or under cooked and the towels in the rooms were due for being replaced due to over use. All in all a good hotel, only four stars as there is no good on the…

title: Another fab holiday
review: This was our 8th time in Cala n Bosch but never stayed at this hotel as our children no longer holiday with us we decided on a more relaxed adult only experience and we got exactly that.  The staff looked after us, our marine view room exceeded our expectations .  I would definitely stay here again.  My daughter also stayed here this year and she is already thinking about returning.

title: Four star price, three star service
review: We stayed at the Casas del Lago between August 8th and 19th in suite 47. We arrived slightly early and our room wasn't quite ready, so left our contact details with reception who agreed to call us as soon it's we could get in. Three hours later and with no call we returned to the hotel - room ready. Checked in but then had to return to reception for the safe key which we'd been told would be in the room.   Overall the quality of the accommodation was good - suites looked to have been very recently refurbished in a modern, clean style (with the noticeable omission of the bathroom, which felt a little dated). Maybe a little more thought could have gone into making the living space feel a little less sterile - empty bookshelves aren't a great design feature. Public areas (pool,…

title: Very good hotel to relax and enjoy!
review: Rooms are very new and fancy, staff is kind, nice breakfast buffet, relaxing atmosphere. The pool area is awesome! Only negative experience was the Wifi, which wasnt working well, actually not working at all in our room.

title: Very Expensive Hotel for what it offers
review: Very expensive hotel for what it offers. View and location are great. Room is nice, though bathroom a little bit dirty (hair on the floor and body hair in the shower), sink doesn't drain. Pool area is awesome, BUT don't be fooled by the nice photos. You will have to pay aditional €16,00/day to use the nice beds. Where, bye the way, is the only place you can get dome food by the pool. Bar at the pool is nice, BUT you can't get any food after 5pm and it closes at 8pm with the swimming pool. So from 5 to 8 pm you can't get any food. Restaurant food, haven't eaten, but it did't look great. Just regular food. Spa area, great facilities, but you have to pay to use sauna, hot-tub/jacuzzi. Deep tissue massage from Julia was awesome.  Eufi doesn't work any where. Overall a great place,…

title: Excellent holiday and amazing hotel
review: This hotel is actually in Cala'n Bosch and is directly overlooking the marina. This means that it is also very close to a lovely (but busy at this time of year) beach. The ideal position. It is adults only and therefore very relaxing. All of the staff are so helpful and everywhere is clean and well kept. Our towels were changed daily and bed linen every few days. We did have to wait for our room which was ready at 3pm and when I saw it - it was fantastic! Very open plan and modern, with a walk-in shower and great views of the marina and sea (2 balconies). Balinese beds, or round pool beds can also be reserved and included are 2 mojitos and nachos. We had half board, but they did a good option of eating out at 4 different restaurants, owned by them, instead of at the hotel. It…

title: Great spa!
review: Dear Donna G,  Thank you very much for your lovely review of Casas del Lago Hotel. We appreciate your good comments about the location, staff, facilities, cleaning and services. It is a pleasure to know that you have had an excellent holiday with us. We are looking forward to receiving you back with your friends and family in the very near future here in Menorca.  Warm Regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4* SUP

title: Two weeks of bliss
review: We arrived on the 30th July & we booked a superior beach view suite, we  didn't realize that it included a separate bedroom,lounge & kitchen, to say we were surprised is an understatement! Breakfast was included in the package which was lovely. Staff were attentive & accommodating, the pool area was clean with plenty of sun beds. Bali beds & round beds were available at a cost. The spa & gym are new additions to this lovely hotel also being adults only in a family resort is a bonus!

title: Relaxing break
review: Stayed here for a couple of weeks in August. On the whole a good holiday and staff at hotel very pleasant and eager to please. Breakfast was great and the evening buffet was good most nights. Room was comfortable and very clean. The poolside DJ played some great chill out music and there was also a pianist some afternoons which made a nice change. However, when the DJ and pianist weren't on, the whole hotel was subjected to the most awful piped oriental-sounding 'music' which was very repetitive - we think they only had the one CD, so after 2 weeks, it was almost like a form of torture (it was played from breakfast time through to dinner service on a constant loop). The hotel should really invest in a selection of chill-out CD's to avoid staff and guests going slowly mad! The…

title: Utterly Magnificent !!!
review: Fantastic location 30 seconds from the lovely beach. Pool was beautifully kept and the bar staff were happy and friendly and served great food and cocktails . Poolside beds were clean and the entire hotel was spotlessly clean as well. The apartment was immaculate and the beds were really comfy. Great view of the marina and plenty of nice restaurants and shops within a few minutes walk. Girls at the reception were very kind and efficient and helpful.  Awesome hotel and we will definately be returning again soon.

title: Perfect hotel
review: Dear Sandy,  Thank you very much for your lovely review regarding our Casas del Lago Hotel.  It is always a pleasure to read such a good comments and I am sure all the staff will really appreciate your words, we work really hard tokeep improving every day.  We hope we can see you back in a near future!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP

title: A great choice when in the area!
review: Brilliant hotel, especially for the price we paid! The pool area is so so nice - worthy of a 5 star hotel.  Service and staff were all excellent - cant fault this place.  If your looking to stay in this area - this is the best hotel plus NO kids!

title: An Oasis of Calm.
review: just returned from a two week stay on half board basis. Ate all our meals in the hotel as the standard was so good. Food was hot and fresh at all meals. The dine around option was not for us as the marina was so busy. This hotel is an oasis of calm in the storm of the marina. From the moment you enter the door with a blast of air-con to the helpful reception staff.   Do not  bother to email requests to the website as they are not acted on.  Did get an occasional blast of sewage smell in the room which was overpowering.Room 59 the bathroom could do with some attention, rust from the toilet has stained the base of the shower.  Had a great holiday.Awesome weather. Lovely beach just over the road. Free safe. Free pool towels 1.50 euro to change for clean. ALL the staff are awesome…

title: Stunning pool area and a relaxing holiday, but would be a 3* review if based only on rooms and service
review: Enjoyed a lovely long weekend at the Casas del Lago hotel in Cala'n Bosch a few weeks back.  Firstly, a couple of pieces of advice before you consider booking here.  1. The resort of Cala'n Bosch is a busy and bustling family resort, not (as I had the impression from reading reviews and looking online) a quaint and quiet harbour area with some restaurants. There are numerous hotels, kids areas, arcades and souvenir shops and of an evening, the area is really quite busy. This is not to say the area is not nice (it is) but just so that you know what to expect!   2. If your budget allows, do not book shared transfers. We waited on a bus for over 45 mins for another flight to arrive before departing for the resort and then stopped at around 7 other hotels before ours, meaning a good…

title: Top Quality Hotel and Breakfast
review: We stayed in a suite which was situated at poolside behind the outside bar area . The accommodation was modern and finished in high gloss white and lots of glass and mood lighting around the bed . The suite had two rooms and two balconies , one with table , chairs and sunbeds . We had a fridge and safe on our room at no extra cost .Air conditioning throughout the suite and wifi was free around all the hotel and pool . Hotel and breakfast was first class but we found that the cleaners wouldn't wash any pots and weren't great at cleaning . The pool area is very relaxing and had chairs & exercise bikes in the water too . Towels are provided but you had to pay if a clean one was required .  The Resturant staff weren't the best I have experienced and arn't very talkative to guests . …

title: Complete Satisfaction In One Location
review: My partner and I have just returned, completely refreshed! It's the first time we have had the chance to use an adult only accommodation, during the summer holidays! I am more of a beach person, however, with the facilities and great staff that the 'Casas Del Lago' had in place, it was hard to leave the premises. The reception upon arrival was second to none and the modern, daily cleaned, air conditioned room with king size, comfortable beds (loved the beach setting above it) completed the accommodation. The clean pool was surrounded by different loungers of all shapes and sizes, which were plentiful and sometimes luxurious. Breakfast was hot, tasty and catered for all, especially me as I love my coffee, which was available in all strengths, tastes and aroma's. The setting is…

title: Modern hotel in at the top of the marina
review: This hotel is positioned right at the far end of the marina in the resort at roof top level ,so has a good view of the marina ,it is a short walking distance, under 5 min to the beach .the bus stop is right outside the hotel and runs around every half hour to cittudella . The marina is eye catching ,but I thought lacked a little depth restaurant and bars wise of high quality .unlike cittudella (must see) . The hotel is modern ,very clean and gave good quality breakfast and snacks .i was on HB and find buffet dinners a little hit  and miss(hotchpotch)although it was generally good food .you could swap your dinner for a restaurant near by ,but it was a limited menu, which was a little disappointing . I found the extra charge for use of day beds both excessive and unwelcome . The…

title: Great Apartment but some odd policies.
review: It was a beautiful place and I would highly suggest this place if you are a couple with no kids because there are so many kids around and at the beach. This place is so much more relaxing than the beach areas that are close by (if screaming children are not your thing)  Pros: Good Location Nice pool area Good Air-conditioning  Cons: Beds are made everyday but we were there for 10 days and the sheets were not changed once.  Wifi is pathetic. My husband doesn't get much sleep and he said it actually worked at 3-6am when not many people were on. I'm talking, really bad wifi!  As we were there for 10 days we asked for our beach towels to be changed and they charged us 3 euros. Pretty sad for a longish stay.

title: Modern Hotel in Excellent Location
review: We arrived late in the evening and were given the key to Apartment 1. We were not pleased as it was on the ground floor (I had specifically asked for an upper floor), there was no balcony as such just a short wall separating our area from the apartment next door.  There was also a terrible smell throughout the whole apartment.  We complained to reception, who said they couldn't do anything until the reservations manager arrived the following day.  The following day we were moved to apartment 66; what a difference.  It was on the upper floor with a door shutting the apartment off from the outside steps and any neighbours, plus there was no smell. The furniture is in the style of Ikea, modern and white, with a comfy settee in the lounge area. The apartment overlooked the garden…

title: Relaxation
review: Had a lovely week at this hotel with my daughter, pure relaxation at a very chilled out hotel. Stylishly furnished with large suites and plenty of space around the pool. Staff are friendly, helpful and forever smiling particularly the lovely Beatrice and Elisabet. Breakfasts were excellent with plenty to choose from and the poolside bar provided yummy lunchtime snacks as well as cocktails. Evening entertainment was understated and classy. Loved the pianist! Lovely resort with plenty places to eat all around the attractive marina. Highly recommend and can't wait to return!

title: Relaxing place.
review: Dear Paula A.,  Thank you very much for your lovely review of Casas del Lago Hotel. It is a pleasure to read your good comments and know that you had a pleasant stay. We are sure Elisabet will really appreciate you comment. We are looking forward to receiving you back in the very near future here in Menorca.  Kind Regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4* SUP

title: Jules
review: Excellent central hotel with plenty of sun beds and a lovely pool area. There was a problem with umbrellas taking off in the breeze which was quite dangerous. Heavier bases are needed.  Although the accommodation and main part of the hotel is spotlessly clean we did notice that in the two weeks we were there the pool area was never washed down. Normally at other hotels this is a daily occurrence. The breakfast was excellent with lots of choice but hot breakfast choices, although lovely quality, were only luke warm and the plates were cold. Such a shame when the quality of the food was so good.  The staff were very helpful and obliging at all times. Overall  we had a wonderful stay here and will most definitely be returning.

title: Drain Problem/Bad smell/Language Barrier/No running water/Poor dinner
review: Let's start with the few good points. The receptionists were very attentive and helpful. They did a good job even though they their english skills weren't very good. We also lost the spa vouchers and we received new ones. Very friendly!  I also liked the breakfast.  Now the bad points...  The fridge leaked water, there was a big puddle on the floor.(see pictures)  The place was not hygienic, very unclean (see pictures in enclosure) the toilet seat had suspicious white spots, the mirros was dirty, the light switches also dirty, spots behind the toilet on the ground, etc etc..  They have a serious drain problem. The whole appartment smelled like foul eggs when we arrived. So they sent us a maintainance man who "took care of the problem". All he did was putting this soap stone…

title: Excellent hotel
review: Staff were very attentive. All areas were very clean, food was fantastic, with a good selection, only small amount put out so always fresh and warm. Apartments were well equipped. Would definitely go back.

title: Red Hot Hotel
review: Dear Bluecath,  Thank you very much for taking the time to add your review of Casas del Lago Hotel.  It is a pleasure to read that you enjoyed your holidays and we hope we can see you back in our hotel in a near future!  Warm Regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, Director CASAS DEL LAGO HOTEL 4*SUP

title: Lovely clean apartment
review: Love the place. You get a suite. Huge living room with a big settee and dining table, small kitchenette with plenty of cupboards, microwave,  single ring hob, sink, full size fridge [very important for the gin and the tonic], and a toaster. Do you really want an oven on yer hols? [Go out of the main door of the Hotel, turn right and there's a supermarket 100 yards on your left, with another over the bridge.] The bathroom is fine with a wall mounted hairdryer. The shower was a bit high and doesn't adjust. We found there was plenty of hot water and no loss of pressure. Sometimes the bathroom smelled a bit drainy, but it comes and goes and wasn't that bad. The bedroom was a nice size and the bed was very comfortable. The decoration is very modern, which we liked.  We were…

title: early getaway
review: Not allocated the room requested when holiday booked last  October however after standing our ground we were allocated a room which partly suited us. Everything about the hotel is great, cleanliness everywhere and breakfast choices superb. Hoping to return next year.

title: Mrs Fiona Tootill
review: Dear pa_cranfleet,  Thank you very much for your kind review of Casas del Lago Hotel. It is always a pleasure to read that the service provided by our team made your stay more enjoyable.   We are looking forward to seeing you again at our Hotel in the near future.  Kind Regards, Alejandro Alguacil Director CASAS DEL LAGO HOTEL 4*SUP

title: Amazing
review: excellent hotel with excellent staff and facilities, very relaxing place and will definitely go back next year. make sure you have a great massage from Ray and visit the spa, super relaxation!! The bars and restaurants are very good around the marina, also the glass bottom boat trip is recomended.

title: Brilliant
review: Dear 117fionat,  Thank you very much for your kind review of Casas del Lago Hotel. We appreciate your comments about our facilities and staff. Best Regards, Alejandro Alguacil Director CASAS DEL LAGO HOTEL 4*SUP

title: Beautiful Location
review: I can not fault the staff and the over all experience at Casas Del Lago in May. It was the 2nd year running we have been and cant wait to return. The apartment are huge and bright only problem now and again are periods of either no water or low water pressure. The staff couldnt be more helpful and friendly. We take mugs for our tea in the mornings and when the staff saw this they asked why? I explained I like a mug and the next day loads of mugs ready for breakfast appeared. Everywhere is clean and looks lovely. The breakfasts are fantasic and so much choice. This year they also had the option of evening meals but we where a little dissapointed with what was on offer and prefered to eat in the other resturant available. One thing we where also a little upset with was the fact…

title: Great hotel great location
review: Visited this hotel for one week on a BB status, check in nice and easy reception staff Beatrice and Elisabet were really helpful. Rooms clean and tastefully decorated loved the fresh colour scheme very tranquill. Fantastic location overlooking the marina with plenty of choice of restaurants to suit any budget and close to the beach. Pool area and grounds well maintained and massage and use of spa facilities was well worth it. Overall an ideal chilled out destination to unwind. Would recommend and would have no hesitation in returning.

title: Great Hotel, Great Services, Almost Perfect!!
review: Dear Janine J,  Thank you very much for taking the time to add your review of Casas del Lago Hotel. We are glad to read that you were satisfied with the location, facilities and cleaning . It is always a pleasure to know that you have enjoyed your holidays in Menorca and at our Hotel.   We are looking forward to receiving you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, Director CASAS DEL LAGO HOTEL 4*SUP

title: Perfect Location
review: It is a great hotel. We've stayed in one of the new-built bungalows. The check-in was nice and easy, then we had to drive around to get to the bungalow, it's a short drive. There were a few things missing in the villa when we arrived but the hotel staff were bringing them in during our stay. I think that it was just finished built and they were getting the place ready.  The location is amazing, lots of shops (supermarkets) and restaurants around, also a public beach near by. If you're staying at the Villa, you'll get 10% discount in the restaurants.  The good bits:  - The place is very spacious. Great living room. - The bed got a firm mattress and really comfortable - There is a private swimming pool and it's right in front of the villa. Beautiful swimming pool designed like…

title: Great spot on Marina
review: I recently stayed at this hotel, we had a view overlooking the beach and a short walk round the corner from the hotel was the Marina. With fantastic restaurants. The Hotel was very friendly and adults only so no Children running around the place. We had Bed and breakfast which suited us to a tee. Having a walk around the marina in the evening to find a lovely restaurant for dinner. The hotel Beach Club was fantastic with complementary towels for the pool area which you keep all week. They had a wide selection of food and drink at the Beach Club bar  which we made use of for lunch on a few occasions. On check out day our flight wasn't till the evening but we were able to enjoy the extra day as they had luggage storage for the bags and showering facilities to freshen up before the…

title: Lots of good things to say here – but you’ll want to try and avoid rooms that smell bad or have strange noises

title: Relaxing
review: Loved this hotel the position near Marina is lovely and plenty of places to eat within a short distance. Rooms nice and kept very clean. Breakfast excellent selection. We were in room 67, which is lovely however do expect some noise from properties behind. Wasn't too bad when we where there. But did hear some other guests complaining. Cant find any faults with this hotel at all and will definitely return.

review: Dear herts4,  Thank you very much for taking the time to add your review of Casas del Lago Hotel.  It is a pleasure to read that you enjoyed your holidays in Menorca and at our Hotel. title: Would come back for sure!!!!
review: Just back from a week here that we booked on the back of reading the reviews on trip advisor as we often do. Staff were excellent and very helpful booking our Taxi for the return along with some advice etc during our stay. We took the B&B option as there are plenty of great places to eat around the marina. Breakfast at the Hotel was buffet style and really had everything you could want - fruit, cold meats and cheese and a hot section with sausage, bacon eggs etc all well presented and good quality. Seating inside and out and we never struggled to find a nice table. We stayed in room 72 quite a large suite over looking the Marina with a large balcony in an excellent position catching the sun all day. Very good standard with King Size bed etc all rooms have a fridge (so we were…

title: casas del lago hotel
review: Dear Guy B,  Thank you very much for your kind review of Casas del Lago Hotel. We are happy to read you liked our facilities, services and food. It is always a pleasure to know that the service provided by our team made your stay more enjoyable.   We are looking forward to see you again at our Hotels in the near future.  Best Regards, Alejandro Alguacil Director CASAS DEL LAGO HOTEL 4*SUP

title: Lovely and relaxing
review: The island of Minorca ..A stunning peaceful idyllic tranquil get away, A mere two hours 10 minutes from London with the most beautiful white sandy beaches turquoise seas/nature reserves.   Casado del Lago Hotel spa and beach club,  *an adults only resort. (Albeit an hour away from the airport of Mahon - costing around €60 to get there In a cab, it was my personal obvious choice)  although  Please  note if you have this hotel in the package deal transfers may be included!!   This is a concept hotel,  attention to every detail has been well thought out - turquoise blue and white nautical  in colour scheme it is striking subtle airy clean simple yet classy!!   As you walk through the reception you will be greeted by Beatriz-  she speaks perfect English has an infectious smile and a…

title: Chill out holiday
review: Very quiet relaxing environment, large clean rooms, comfy beds.Excellent pool area great views of harbour, breakfasts excellent, evening meal good quality but limited choice, would certainly return on bed and breakfast terms

review: Dear JakeyLeicester,  Thank you very much for taking the time to add your review of Casas del Lago Hotel. Warm Regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, Director CASAS DEL LAGO HOTEL 4*SUP

title: Very nice location overlooking the Marina
review: Visited this hotel with a few friends and we really enjoyed our stay. The hotel is immaculately clean. The staff were very friendly, helpful and accommodating with nothing being too much trouble. The pool area is very relaxing. The breakfast buffet was pretty much the same each day as in most places but cooked well and very tasty, they even have had champagne to wash it down. The room was cleaned and our towels changed everyday. There is lovely beach with clear waters almost opposite and a harbour with restaurants the other side.

title: Fantastic hotel, great stay!
review: Dear em-london2013,  Thank you very much for your lovely review regarding our Casas del Lago Hotel. It is always a pleasure to read your good comments and get known you have had a pleasant stay.   We are looking forward to receiving you back in the near future here in Menorca.  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil, Director CASAS DEL LAGO HOTEL 4* SUP

title: Relaxation, chill out, peace, and no kids.....
review: Stayed here for  week end May early June.  Very nice room overlooking the pool and Marina, very spacious and comfortable.  Always plenty of sunbeds and friendly staff.  Room was cleaned daily and the hotel was spotless.  The breakfasts were excellent and the dinners were OK but there are so many restaurants around the marina I would not recommend half board.  Overall a very nice Adults only hotel, I would definitely return.

title: Hotel great- BUT sorrounded by NOISE!
review: Very sad to write this review as the hotel itself was lovely, especially the pool area. Breakfast was really nice, & like another reviewer I felt dinner was pricey for what it was ( I only ate there as my poor husband was ill) Most of the staff were lovely, in particular the reception staff, some of the younger pool bar staff were more interested in chatting amongst themselves than providing a good service. The room ( 101) was great, with a huge terrace- but we were across the road from the Cala n Bosch Hotel - a large 60's characterless building that emitted noise throughout most of the day & night, spoiling our time on the beach as it's right next to the hotel, but worse of an evening where it was like being at some awful karaoke bar. sadly, the re-naming of Cala n Bosch as…

title: Perfect holiday
review: All rooms aresuprb at this place. We had band b and hope this option continues as we like  the freedom it brings. Sunbeds are a bit too close to each other as they have introduced couches etc which  are extra cost. Very clean and excellent service throughout.

title: Great place to stay
review: Dear 176av,  Thank you very much for your lovely review regarding our Casas del Lago Hotel. It is always pleasure to read such a good comments and know that you had a pleasant stay with us.  We are looking forward to receiving you back in the very near future.  Warm Regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4* SUP

title: Could be outstanding....but
review: Enjoyed our stay lots of space in our apartment which was very tastefully furnished and decorated .Bed was huge and very comfortable . Pool area was really good with the added bonus of no kids which when your own  kids are parents themselves now is sheer luxury .Breakfast was Ok some of the hot food was certainly not .Fab coffee. Noise from the opening and closing wardrobe doors was really annoying as you could hear this from your neighbours .Hubby reckoned this could be sorted very easily by fitting soft pads on the doors which would be very cheap to do . Regardless of the minor issues we enjoyed our stay .

title: Casas del Lago Villas
review: Just returned from a week staying here half board......just myself and hubby. Stayed in room 16... Suite with marina view......The suite was spacious and kept exceptionally clean during our stay...but it did seem to be "half refurbished" a beautiful contemporary lounge and kitchenette area -White and teal..... A very "70's" brown looking bathroom and the bedroom was half contemporary...white and teal....which was spolit by brown slatted wardrobe doors. Breakfast was of a high quality and the evening meals were varied, hot and relaxed in feel. Pool and bar area spotlessly clean and plenty of sunbeds available including round and balanise beds for an extra charge. The reasons that I haven't given this 5 stars are the service in the restaurant fell below expectations....finished…

title: Gorgeous Hotel !!!
review: Absolutely fabulous, fantastic hotel, loved the suites, the sun beds were unusual and so comfy. Definitely return with friends and family. Reception staff were very efficient and so knowledgable, great location.

title: Simply Lovely
review: Dear Connollyconn,  Thank you very much for your lovely review  of Casas del Lago Hotel. It is a pleasure to read your good comments and know that you had a pleasant and memorable stay. We are looking forward to receiving you back with your friends and family in the very near future here in Menorca.  Warm Regards,  Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4* SUP

title: gorgeous hotel great location
review: On arrival at Casas del Lago Hotel we were promptly greeted by reception staff and handed our room card and safe key immediately [plain key card / old fashioned safe KEY].  We had emailed asking for a double bed and higher level accommodation however neither of our requests was met but to be fair we actually liked our room on the ground floor but the twin beds were very annoying.  The room itself all good, clean and plenty of kitchen equipment although a dish cloth would have assisted us to wash up our dishes!  Occasional drain smell from the bathroom but nothing too bad.  Sadly our room developed a leak which did impact on our holiday over our last 3 days and damaged some of our own things and we felt this wasn’t dealt with correctly, a mere “sorry” was deemed by reception…

title: Wonderful holidal
review: fantastic hotel perfectly placed in lovely area great rooms, pool and staff only downside evening food was no good so dont book half board the breakfast were lovely with lots of choice the superior sunbeds had to be paid for but were worth it with the extra free drink location perfect for bars and restaurants

title: Excellent

title: Relaxing holidays
review: The hotel is very nice right next to the marina in Cala n Bosc and very close to Ciutadella (10-15min drive); a beautiful town that you can explore.  Rooms are very big and quite, clean and with a great view; room provided had a view of the pool and the marina.  Breakfast had quite a few options to choose from the buffet (English and continental with an espresso machine and fresh juices). The pool was a nice place to relax. There were few activities to do if you wanted such as aqua aerobics or scuba diving lessons.  Staff were friendly and accommodating, and suggest things for you to do like which beach to go to or restaurant to try.  If you rent a car, there is free parking on the street right outside the hotel. But if you want, there is parking within the hotel for an extra…

title: I want to go back now!
review: Dear EvanKar,  Thank you very much for your kind review, we are delighted to read that you had an enjoyable and memorable stay at our Casas del Lago Hotel. As we strive to give our clients the best possible service, we are pleased to read that you had a pleasant and memorable stay with us. We hope that you will choose to stay with us again on your next visit to Menorca.  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP

title: Better than expected, lovely hotel
review: Well we arrived home 2 hours ago and really couldn't wait to post this review! What a really lovely hotel and staff to match, I really cannot understand the expectations of some people! We arrived at midday and were greeted by a smiling receptionist who booked us in and allocated our apartment within minutes so thumbs up number one! Our room was on the ground floor (not our usual choice but decided to go with it) no problem large lounge/dining area with a roomy bathroom and beautiful bedroom, believe the photos they don't lie! We had a lovely patio to sit out on overlooking the pool and marina.  Like many other reviewers the pool area was clean quiet and so relaxed, lovely! We went half board so had breakfast every day which was always plentiful and if you can't find something…

title: relaxation
review: Dear Sue D,  It is a great pleasure for us to read your wonderful review. Thank you very much for having taken time to describe in such detail your experince here in our Casas del Lago Hotel; it is thanks to these comments that we are able to keep improving our hotel facilities and services. Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP

title: My experience at Casas del Lago
review: I am very surprised to see negative comments / reviews. Stayed here May half term week with my teacher daughter for a well needed rest and 'chill'. Room absolutely lovely even though only the basic 'suite', pool and range of beds right outside room with wonderful view of harbour, beach other side of hotel, 30 secs walk with nice beach bar for lunches. Staff really helpful, shops, restaurants, bars all so local and easy access. Lovely spa with hour session included free. On b&b so can't comment on dinner but enjoyed every breakfast with good range of English \ continental foods, fruit etc. Adults only so really peaceful at hotel and Beach Bar foes good range of cocktails and food.

title: Lovely Hotel
review: We stayed here the last week in May and after reading bad reviews were a little worried of what to expect. No need to worry at all!. We stayed in a suite overlooking the pool and marina. The rooms are very big with everything you need. Kitchen area has all the cutlery, glasses etc you need if you need to use them. We didn't as we ate out everyday but we did use the wine glasses on a night to sit and relax with a drink watching the world go by.  The breakfast is beautiful with choices for everyone's taste. We were never disappointed. Plenty of room round the pool area with different beds. eg Balinese, round beds and ordinary sunbeds. All comfortable! The staff are great and very friendly no matter what job they do. Lots of restaurants to choose from around the marina and also…

title: Wonderful
review: Dear traceylunn68,  Thank you very much for your fantastic review of our Casas del Lago Hotel. We are delighted to read that you had a pleasant stay with us and that you enjoyed our facilities and hotel services. Thank you for sharing your thoughts through this channel. It is always a pleasure to know that our clients had a good and memorable experience and we hope to welcome you back very soon.  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP

title: Bliss!
review: Just spent a lovely week in this hotel. Fabulous location , brilliant staff. And so relaxing as there were no children. Really enjoyable. I would recommend it and I will return. Hire a car as you can feel a bit remote . Unless you use the bus which are right outside the hotel.

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: Dear Roger W,  Thank you very much for your review of Casas del Lago Hotel. It is a pleasure to read your good comments and know that you had a pleasant and memorable stay. We look forward to receiving you back in the very near future here in Menorca.  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP

title: Total chill out
review: What an amazing place!  An excellent place to relax and unwind and indulge in some holiday relaxation.  Rooms were excellent, we stayed in a twin one bed apartment, very modern and clean.  The breakfast was amazing, they served English sausages and bacon as well as a decent choice of cereals, fruits and cakes.  The spa is well organised as you book your free hour slot which means you aren't sharing it with other people.  We had no problems getting sunbeds and did treat ourselves to the round beds around the pool, but you each get a free cocktail and nachos to share so its well worth it. The harbour is delightful with a good choice of restaurants, reasonably priced and you get 10% off some of them for staying at the hotel. If you are looking to relax and do nothing this is the…

title: Nice Hotel, shame about the lack of organisation
review: The rooms are spacious and clean with modern decor to the living and bedroom areas.  The bathroom, although not as nice as represented in the pictures on the hotel website was clean and large. The shower in the room we stayed in (22) was very powerful and sometimes would soak the room because of the limited size of the shower enclosure.  The toilet flush in the room was also temperamental.   If the bathrooms in the standard rooms were updated this would make a huge difference to the quality of the room.  There are a few reviews on here which mention the standards of the towels provided in your room, I would have to agree with those reviews and say that the towels do need some upgrading.  There is a hair dryer in the bathroom but it took a long time to dry my hair which is quite…

title: Can't decide!
review: Where do I start? Breakfast- sometimes no cutlery or cups and forget about runny boiled eggs with soldiers cos you get a hard boiled egg! If you want a full English breakfast it's great as you get proper English bacon! Evening meal- don't go there as there's no choice and it's cold so make sure you swap your evening meal for lunch as that is cooked to order. Staff- special mention to Jon Jon, Hannah and Xvair very friendly and attentive.  Rooms - yes there is a drainage issue and yes we did complain and received a free balinese sun bed and the choice to move rooms however we decided to stay put and just leave the window open as the smelt went! Samuel assisted us well with the problem but a little spoilt brat of a 17 year was with him who tried to be so obnoxious I wanted to…

title: Pleasantly situated overlooking the small harbour of Cala’n Bosch - we sit, relax and chill out!
review: A boutique style hotel pleasantly situated overlooking the small harbour of Cala’n Bosch. The Hotel has a nice fresh airy vibe, assisted by the decor and wide spaces to all the rooms. Space is also evident in all the standard rooms which include a fridge and basic kitchen/cooking facilities. Rooms (Suites) have Large comfy beds and lounge.   Rooms 1 - 30 overlook the pool. Even numbers are one floor up, odds are ground floor, The pool side is where the best Wifi reception is to be found, the other quieter side overlooks the gardens. (avoid rooms 1-5 if you want a view) though most of the upper floor rooms will have a view of some kind.  As we arrived on the 1st of May this is the start of the holiday season on Menorca and not everywhere is open a lot, None of the hotels…

title: Great location
review: My husband and myself have just arrived back from a week at this hotel. First I would like to start with 'negatives': We upgraded to a beachfront luxury suite........ It really wasn't worth the extra money, there was no separation of the terrace with next door, which made it not at all private if you wanted to sit outside!! We were in room 102. The view was only partial beach view, right next to the main road, and in the shade early,  so really not worth it. When we had finished with the pack of toilet rolls we had to keep going to reception for more as they weren't replenished. We were given 1 roll at a time!! Not good. As it was starting to get quite busy in the hotel we noticed there is definitely not enough sun loungers which are free, so if when the hotel becomes full you…

title: 50th Birthday Present
review: We have just arrived back frum staying 4 nights at the Casa Del Lago hotel.  I booked this as a Birthday present for my husbands 50th which he knew nothing about & our first time away in 21yrs without the kids!  The location of this hotel is outstanding, overlooking the Harbour. We stayed in one of the Cool Harbour Rooms No 76, which have just been renovated and are very spacious, modern, beautiful beds with a large balcony with your own sun loungers, overlooking the Harbour, which is breathtaking and well worth booking these rooms.  The hotel is very clean, swimming pool area gorgeous with plenty of sunlounges. The round beds etc you have to pay for. Very quiet, but then again they were just getting ready for the season to start and was informed this hotel then steps things up…

title: Great place for everything
review: My wife and I stayed early May, maybe a bit early as some things in Cala n Bosch were not quite open. This hotel is fab, great setting, really good grounds/pool all fantastic can't fault it.  We went to Ciutadella by bus, to be recommended.  Beers around here are about £2.50 to £3.50 a pint, although spirits are about £6 a drink that's because you are getting 3 - 4 units at a time. The apartments are lovely, just renovated and cleaned regularly, well equipped too.

title: First time to Menorca and probably not the last!
review: Dear bighalders,  thank you very much for your lovely review. It is always a pleasure to read such good comments. We hope that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again here in Menorca in the near future.  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP

title: All round good
review: My sister and I went first 2 weeks in May, the start of the season.  Weather was a bit hit and miss and restaurants were still painting and brushing up for their opening.  Casas was a great hotel.  There were a few issues at first but they were put right promptly.  Breakfast was fantastic, good range of food, hot and good quality.  Evening meal did have a few problems, mainly with the heat, although I think this was an issue with the heating bulbs and not with the chef or quality of the food. All the staff were friendly and professional.  Thanks to JonJon for introducing me to Menorca gin, Xavier for his smile and attentiveness at meal times, along with Sus, Nacho (Iggy) and Pablo for great bar service and not forgetting all on reception, Elizabeth and Lydia to name but 2.  Our…

title: Exactly what we wanted
review: My partner and I stayed here last year in September and loved it. The hotel, pool area, rooms and facilities were kept extremely clean. The staff were friendly and there was a lovely relaxed atmosphere.  The only down side was that it sometimes took a while to be served at the pool bar which shut early some nights. We also were not made aware of the fact we could have had lunch instead of an evening meal as part of the half board deal. However the food we did have was delicious with a great choice. Breakfast was lovely and had everything you would want.  The hotel was right on the Marina and a 30 second walk to the nearest beach which was perfect (golden sands and crystal clear water).  Whilst staying here I also had a massage from Rian which was well worth the money.  During…

title: Perfect
review: Booked as a bed and breakfast package for myself, sister and 83 year old mum. The obvious draw was it's location, just a few steps down from the hotel to the harbour front. I'd emailed the hotel to ask for a suitable room and we were given a ground floor room within easy reach of the reception, restaurant and pool area whilst being away from any possible noise. As the rooms are set up for two people it meant my sister sleeping on the sofa but it was certainly of a good size. We asked for an extra chair and crockery and had no problems getting them.  Breakfast was great, couple of toasting machines, hot buffet, fruit, cereals and fresh brewed coffee in a light, roomy restaurant that wasn't choc a block with tables. All the staff we met were very pleasant and helpful, although I…

title: Poor service / Very disappointing
review: We stayed Half board, the choice of evening meal was poor. Food labels not on food difficult to know what we were eating, staff didn't understand when we asked what the food was. On many occasions the food was cold and off poor standard. Room smelled of drains, bedding wasn't changed all week, safe didn't work,  asked the reception staff to have a look they didn't seem to understand and asked us to use the key.  The safe didn't have a key. Wi Fi poor. !  This hotel is not off 4 star standard, we have stayed in many 4-5 hotels this has got to be the worst. We hired a car for 4 days through the Thompson Rep menorca is lovely. We used the sun beds for 5 days( no charge)  on the 6th day we were charged 16 euros for the day at 12.30pm lunchtime, we complained to the staff ( no point…

title: One of our best and most relaxing holidays
review: This hotel has everything to offer superb accommodation clean with friendly staff. With easy access to beach and fabulous marina. The marina has a fantastic selection of restaurants and bars. We also appreciate the hotel was adults only

title: Didn't meet expectations.

We look forward to receiving you back in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Alejandro Alguacil Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP

title: Bed and Breakfast accommodation
review: Pros: Nice setting, smart looking building, good location between beach and marina, good breakfast, excellent new spa (special mention to the physio/therapist Julia who was delightful and extremely knowledgeable).  Cons: Rooms smelt (drains), forget the wifi, staff seemed inexperienced with poor language, communication and Customer Service skills, quality of towels poor, pool 'chill out' music too loud for clientele demographic (we're 45 and felt like youngsters...if we wanted Ibiza we'd have gone there!), booked hotel directly for ViP 'benefits' (free parking, bottle of wine in room etc) but had to ask for most of these as staff didn't seem bothered. I'll stop there, I think.  In summary, this wasn't a cheap holiday and we expected more from the hotel after reading last…

title: Disappointed
review: Had a great weeks holiday in this aparthotel we stayed on a Bed and breakfast basis and the Room we stayed in was great with plenty of room and all the benefits of an apartment including fridge, toaster, kettle and table top cooker and separate lounge/dining room. We then had the benefit of going for our breakfast which was fantastico in that it was a buffet style breakfast and there was something for everyone from a full English to a continental breakfast and a full selection of tea's and coffees. The hotel is well situated on the Cala en Bosch marina as per the attached photo and there is a great selection of restaurants around the harbour catering for all tastes. The only let down was the weather with only one nice day but that's out of our control so made the best of it by…

title: Ok but could be better.
review: Me and my partner stayed here from the 9th of May till 16th of May! We stayed in room 3 which was a lovely spacious room with everything you could need! Really couldn't fault the room itself but we kept getting a bad smell from drains and loud water running noises during the night which we believe came from under the room which was the spa! Half way through the week our fridge broke and within a few hours we had maintenance men come and bring us a new one! We booked a garden view suite but I wouldn't class it as a garden more of the back of the building with mud and rubbish but for us that wasn't a problem as we had a lovely view out the front of the pool and marina! All staff were very lovely and helpful! The main down fall of this hotel is certainly the dinners! We booked half…

title: We loved this place!
review: We took at 4 day break from 9th to the 13th. Although the season hadn't quite started yet (which we already knew and expected before we came) we had such a lovely time, pure relaxation, and as the week went on it just got better as more things were opening up and it got busier. The staff couldn't be more helpful to us and all work really hard to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable as they can. Some people were complaining about food but we loved the food, a good selection everyday of fish, meats, vegetables, pasta etc(which I enjoy more than ordering one dish from a menu in a restaurant,u can try lots of different things from the selection) breakfast was fab, we loved that there was so much to choose from every morning with proper coffee machines and full English buffet,…

title: Good location but lacking in plush features
review: Dear Michaela E,  we are delighted to read that you had an enjoyable stay at our Casas del Lago Hotel. It is always a pleasure to read such good review and hear that you had a great time in our facilities. We hope that you had a good experience in our spa and that this, together with the rest of our hotel services helped make your experience here in Menorca memorable. Thanks for sharing your comments with us through the TripAdvisor community. We look forward to receiving you back in the very near future.  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP

title: Excellent location and good cleanliness standards but the Hotel is lacking in some areas....
review: This hotel is located just across from the marina and beach and there is plenty of available outdoor street parking. Wifi is complimentary though the signal is lacking in the rooms (this isn't a deal breaker considering that the environment screams please unwind). I appreciate the adult only aspect and the grounds are well maintained with a beautiful pool overlooking the marina. But the rooms truthfully are barely above motel level. The bathroom in particular always smells like sulfur which the front desk staff attributed to the sea but why that would be is unclear to me because I doubt they are using sea water in the toilet as it would corrode the pipes. Perhaps it is that the hotel is very modern in styling and accordingly it is not particularly plush in accommodation but I…

title: Disappointed
review: We have just returned from a week spent at the Casas Del Lago. The location of this hotel is excellent as it's situated right on the marina with lovely views of the harbour and the surrounding restaurants. The Hotel is beautifully designed and has the potential to be an outstanding 4 star establishment, but unfortunately it just didn't reach the mark on this occasion.  Prior to our stay at the Hotel, I had e-mailed them to explain that it was my husband's birthday and requested for an upgrade or something nice to be put in the room on arrival. They had indeed upgraded us to a beach deluxe suite which was lovely, until we tried the bath and realised that there was no hot water. We later realised that the safe in the room also didn't work! We explained these issues to the manager…

title: Disappointing
review: Hotel has not opened this season anywhere near 4 star standard.  Booking full board to take advantage of being able to choose 4 local restaurants for dinner was impossible as they were All closed.  Hotel dinner restricted choice and average standard, nowhere near as good as any other hotel of this rating we have stayed in previously.  Buffet breakfast was good except for one morning with no butter.  Lunch very restricted choice and average quality.  Poor sound proofing between rooms.  Rubbish skips emptied on road at 5am each morning followed by deliveries to hotel at 7am including rolling barrels and shouting staff, no chance of sleeping through either.  No hot water several evenings.  Tricky room card system, even cleaners left room unlocked on 3 occasions. Dirty cups and…

title: Wow
review: Got back from the casa del logo on 9 May. The accommodation, location and staff at this hotel were totally unexpected. Elizabet on reception quickly checked us in and gave us our key. She is a real asset to the hotel and during the weeks stay was a font of knowledge, busses, maps etc etc.  Room 3 on the ground floor, not much of a view, but the room itself really spacious, a full sized bathroom and a huge bed. The kitchen was equipped with a fridge, microwave, hob and all untensils, not that we used the middle two. Room was cleaned every day, and breakfast was superb with everything you could want.   The beach bar provided towels for the week 1€ if you wanted to change them, and plenty of sun beds etc. Drinks and food were the same price here as in the marina.  The bus to…
