Thank you again for taking time to write to us a review through this channel.  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP

title: prime position
review: I am a little late in writing this review as I was under the impression that I had already submitted one - bit I was mistaken. My husband and I chose to stay at Casas Del Lago in June 2015, as some friends who were holidaying there in 2014 sent us some photos and pointed out that the hotel would be going Adult only in 2015 - we much prefer Adults only hotels and instantly booked,. We were not disappointed. The room had a wonderful view over the harbour, plenty of room inside with a sitting area, small kitchen and separate bedroom. Decor was modern. The pool area was fantastic, lots of different types of sunbeds, beanbags and large beds, but what attracted us, in addition to the Adults only, was the DJ in the afternoon - we loved the music around the pool, and thought this was a…

title: Brilliant relaxed holiday
review: Dear Elaine D,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share with us your experience. We are pleased to know you felt happy at our hotel and Beach Club. It is a real pleasure to read that your stay at our hotel has been fantastic! We hope to welcome you back very soon!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.

title: Excellent Adult Only holiday
review: A friend and I went to Casas del Lago 29 Sept to 6 October. We opted for half board and were glad that we had as the food was good.  However the hotel was closing for the winter on 11 October and so the kitchen were obviously running stocks down.  Breakfasts were excellent with a very wide variety.  Fresh juices and proper coffee (casules in a machine rather than the horrid stewed variety) were a huge plus. The rooms (including a lounge, bedroom and bathroom) were spacious.  They are now refurbishing the rooms and the new ones are fabulous. The pool and pool area was very clean. All the Staff were very friendly and made us most welcome. Being adult only it was wonderful not to hear screaming children round a pool.  I can well recommend Casas del Lago as a relaxing break.

title: Superb weeks relaxing holiday
review: Dear MadywLondon,  We would like to thank you very much for your fantastic review about the Casas del Lago Hotel! We are delighted you had an enjoyable stay with us and thank you once again for your kind comm. We really look forward to receiving you back in the very near future with the new facilities!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil, Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP

title: Best holiday for couples without children
review: We were at the Casas del Lago in early September 2015 and thoroughly enjoyed our stay (barring a couple of stormy days).   The room was spacious with fabulous mood lighting around them bed, the view over the Harbour was a treat and the proximity to the harbour just right     Jesse Diarte's chill out sessions around the pool were lovely (and we are 62) and relaxing each afternoon

title: Hall's from durham oct 2015
review: Dear CessnaDave,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on the Casas del Lago Hotel. We are happy to hear you liked the facilities! We do hope that you will choose to stay with us again on your next visit to Menorca, a returning guest is our greatest compliment received!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director HOTEL CASAS DEL LAGO 4*SUP.

title: Special holiday experience
review: Our stay here was so relaxing and the hotel is absolutely amazing. The pool area was exceptionally clean, the waiters were friendly and attentive and the offers for the fancy sun beds were bargains. You actually ended up paying nothing for them if you took in to account the two free mojitos and nachos included in the price for the day.   Breakfast had a wide selection of food, including British sausages if you are picky and was served over a convenient time scale.   The doors to the apartments were interesting but safe. We thought ours was broken but you have to wait a few seconds after holding your card infront of the sensor before the door actually locks.   We hired a car for the week thinking there was parking at the hotel. There is, but only if you pay and only if it is…

title: Excellent Holiday!
review: Arrived at the hotel and the staff were excellent and friendly. Check-in was smooth and everything we needed to know was explained. The room was clean and spacious, the only downside was the balcony being quite small. We only had breakfast at the hotel, so can only comment on that. The breakfast was adequate but nothing fancy. After 3 days the bedding should have been changed, but wasn't and the room was not really cleaned properly. The number of staff was dropping off due to the end of the season maybe had something to do with it. We really enjoyed our stay, but the hotel needs to improve standards to stop it falling into 2-3 star bracket.

title: It's not a Radison but it's not far off.
review: Booked through Jet2 holidays again, you can't go wrong. Arrived at LBA. 2 hours early for our flight due to leave at 0705 hrs. We were eventually called to board at 0730,the reason was a technical fault. The surprise was that they had change the aircraft from a 737 to a 757 so 54 people on flight how many seats do you want. We landed not far off the scheduled time because of a tail wind and a larger aircraft. On arrival we were met by a Jet2 rep. and guided to our coach transfer to Cala'n Bosch. We had to drop of at quite a few hotels on route so the transfer was about 1.1/2 hours, probably would have been 35 minutes by car. You need to look at the brochure pictures to get an idea of the hotel layout and position within Cala'n Bosch. The reception was bright, clean and airy with…

title: "4 Stars, I dont think so"
review: Dear Sturart M,   Thank you very much for your comment and for sharing your thoughts about your stay at Casas del Lago Hotel. Thank you for sharing your moments you had here. For sure we will supervise your issue during your stay but we are very happy to hear that overall you likes and enjoyed your stay at hotel. We really hope to welcome you back very soon!   Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.  http://www.tripadvisor.es/ShowUserReviews-g187465-d498781-r308890525-Casas_del_Lago_Hotel_Beach_Club_Adults_Only-Ciutadella_Minorca_Balearic_Islands.html#

title: FABULOUS HOTEL WITH EXCELLENT FACILITIES
review: Be aware the difference between rooms in this "Hotel" ranges from 4 star to at best 2 star. The room we were given was 57, we opened the door and walked straight back to the reception, the smell from the room was disgusting the overall description would be blocked drains. Cutting a long story short we could not be moved to another room because the Hotel was full. We booked the holiday through Jet2 whose rep managed to arrange another room for us on the sixth day of our eight day holiday. We never unpacked due to the smell in the cupboards and wardrobe space for storing our clothes. The living area sofa was something out of the 1980's a wooden structure with some cushions which can be used as a bed if required for children (hello this is an adults only Hotel) the biggest problem…

title: honeymoon bliss
review: This adults only hotel is one of the nicest hotels we have stayed in (and we are well travelled).  The room was decorated in white with blue hues and there were coloured lights around the bed which made it very romantic.  We had a huge balcony overlooking the marina and although this came at extra cost it was well worth it.  One thing the room didn't have was a long length mirror.  I spoke to the manager Alex and one was installed within hours whilst we were out.  Well done to him for such a quick response.  This consideration from management is rarely experienced! Won't say anymore about the room as most previous comments cover the exceptionally high standard.  The breakfast was extremely good with a large choice of everything you could ask for - cooked or continental.   The…

title: Beautiful! Loved every minute of our stay here.
review: What a stunning hotel! We've just come back and we've enjoyed every minute of our holiday. It's all modern decor and it's right on the harbour with wonderful views. You wear a wristband and you get 10% discount in certain restaurants around the marina. You also get to play crazy golf for free.  Check in was quick and efficient. We were given wifi codes and a key for the safe in the room. The staff on reception were always polite and helpful.  The room was clean and spacious. It had a kettle, toaster, TV and hairdryer, amongst other things. The bed was actually a double bed, not 2 singles pushed together, hooray! We opted for a standard view, with rooms of the gardens. Nice and quiet, away from the pool and harbour.  We opted for B&B, breakfast was fantastic. Everything you could…

title: Peaceful
review: Dear Eilish91,  We appreciate that you took the time to share your experience during your last vacation in Casas del Lago Hotel. We are glad to know that you really enjoyed of a good time in our hotel. We took note about the suggestions ;) It will be a pleasure to welcome you again!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.

title: amazing place
review: Hotel, rooms spacious, clean. Bedroom, sitting room, table and chairs, bathroom with attached hair drier . Small cooking area with a fridge. There is a sink, plates, cutlery a plug in hob and frying pan. A kettle and toaster too.   No charge for safe key unless you lose it! Air con included.  Sun beds nearly always full up as the towels were put out early.  The breakfast was very good. A large choice from cooked  & continental with fresh fruit, pancakes, pastries. An expresso machine and tea/filter coffee on offer. There were several fruit juices too.  Rooms either had a garden, pool or or harbour view.  There is a book in reception giving details of bus times, pharmacies, menus at restaurants etc. Reception staff and breakfast were love as. helpful and friendly.   If you book…

title: Great Hotel, Very Relaxing Atmosphere
review: Dear Calirefrom UK,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share with us your experience. We are pleased to know you felt happy at our hotel! It is a real pleasure to read that your stay at our hotel has been fantastic. We really hope to welcome you back very soon!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.

title: Casa del lago hotel
review: My husband and I went on our first holiday in 22 years without our kids and where a bit scared as we didn't know what to expect but my goodness were we lucky we came here as it is so peaceful and clean with the most lovely staff. When we arrived and went to our harbour view room we couldn't believe the size of it and the décor was lovely. The next morning at breakfast we where so surprised to see real English bacon and such big pancakes that I was sold straight away (haha). You can come down to breakfast at 10am and so many sunbeds are free there is no rush to get up which was amazing after so many years of fighting to beat everyone for the prime spot everywhere else. Breakfast is till 10.30 and how great is that. We where half board and thought we would be eating in the same…

title: Relaxing stay - some improvements needed but has the potential to be excellent.
review: My husband and I stayed at Casas del Lago for 4 nights during September.  First impressions were good but this was deceptive and overall we thought there were too many negatives to score this above a 3.  The hotel is in an excellent location right on the marina and has great pool facilities, although we were disappointed that we had to pay €16 for the Balinese beds but you do get 2 mojitos and nachos included in the price.  Beach towels are provided but you have to pay €1.50 should you wish to change them during your stay.  The breakfast was good - proper English bacon and a good choice of cereal, fruit etc if you did not want a cooked breakfast.  We stayed in a Sea Cool Suite which was very nice with good air con but we did not like the open plan bathroom but nevertheless it…

title: fantastic setting
review: Just returned from a week at this hotel , had an upper floor room on the quiet side of the hotel, which was to our liking . the breakfasts were really good and lots of choice . attentive staff throughout our stay . spent many hours on sunbeds overlooking the harbour . very clean and comfortable  and loved the fact it was adults only . the downsides were few but for us were having to wear a wristband , music sometimes too loud around the pool , not enough sunbeds for amount of rooms , and didn't see the need for the 'extra's ' that were in the room (at an extra charge) !  still wouldn't stop me from going there again  if you like peace and quiet it's the hotel to stay in .

title: WONDERFUL RELAXED HOLIDAY!!
review: Dear Critch123,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and feedback. We are glad you have Casas del Lago Hotel for a stay in Menorca. It is a real pleasure to read that your stay at our hotel has been fabulous from the first moment until the time you had to leave!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.

title: Perfect in every way
review: My husband and I have just returned from a fabulous two week stay at the Casas del Lago Hotel & Beach Club.  We have been going to this hotel for 10 years now and I can honestly say that this has been our best stay yet.  This is the first year that the hotel has gone adult only and there was a wonderful quiet and relaxed atmosphere around the lovely pool with some chilled background music.  We went bed and breakfast and the breakfasts were amazing with a great choice of fruits, cereals, cold meats, cheeses, English breakfast, juices and cakes/pastries.  Our one bedroom apartment was very comfortable and cleaned every day.  We had a great view of the marina and were within a two minute stroll of the many restaurants and shops that surround the marina.  Finally, what really made…

title: Excellent position
review: Dear Doreen S,  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor! We love that you have chosen to stay with us in Menorca. We appreciate you kind words about our rooms, pool, breakfast (this year we have amazing plates to offer every morning) and staff! We look forward to welcoming you back again and again!  Warm regards

title: hotel good catering poor
review: room very good, intended for self catering, cooking facilities etc, however we had booked half board. no use for fridge cooker etc.Bufet brekfast served in hotel usual fare,had to use one of three resturants affiliated to the hotel on the marina

title: Perfect, perfect, PERFECT........................
review: Well Casas Del Lago.........After coming back to you for 12 years we didn`t think you could get any better but WOW..............!!!!!!!!!  The hotel this year is AMAZING. Adults only is heaven........Beautiful, quiet, romantic.........Just PERFECT in our opinion   And Yes you might be a little more expensive than some hotels but we believe you`re well worth it......... We stayed in a one bedroom standard apartment (as always) which had a new bed, new furniture,new kitchen area. A clean lick of paint + wall art aswell....(could have done with a dressing table in the bedroom though for all the `girlie bits + bobs)  On arrival the reception staff were lovely + VERY helpful as there was a small problem with the room. They sorted it straight away for us + arranged a different room.…

title: Beautiful and relaxing..
review: Dear Lindsay R.,  First of all, we would like to thank you very much for your fantastic review about the Casas del Lago Hotel. We are delighted you had an enjoyable stay with us. We will share your compliments with our team and they will be more than glad to know that you liked our facilities and services.  We really look forward to receiving you back in the very near future!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.

title: Holiday
review: There was nothing that we could fault with the hotel I emailed before hand and asked if any availability to upgrade. When we arrived we were given on if the 'cool suites' I would have liked a separate bathroom as it's all open plan but it wasn't a big issue. Service good always sunbeds free, didn't find music particularly offensive! Expected cala bosch to have been slightly more Spanish and didn't really find much going on. One or two English bars which were not great and no nightlife after midnight. Cuitadella is beautiful and well worth a visit by bus, stop outside hotel or we took a cab and it took about 10/15 mins and was about 15 euros. Larger selection of restaurants etc overall trip was very enjoyable and relaxing!

title: Nirvana
review: Dear LondonAeh,  Thank you very much for your lovely comment and for sharing your thoughts about your stay at Casas del Lago Hotel. We really hope to welcome you back very soon!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.

title: Wonderful relaxing hotel with style and great location
review: I paid for the upgrade which was half board and a larger room - not knowing what I would get I received room 71 which I would highly recommend as it was larger than most. Fantastic balcony and the most modern room with relaxing lights around the bed, lovely lounge and large plaza with a kitchenette on the side.  The hotel itself is so relaxing as adult only. The pool area has a variety of different chairs with lovely relaxing music around all day. The staff were so friendly and couldn't do enough for you. Also I would night recommend the Massarges around the pool, the women was wonderful and not overpriced.  The food was good as they choose the restaurants around the port for us to use as the hotel doesn't really cater for food. One night we had it around the pool and the rest…

title: Fabulous
review: Dear Jomiller,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on the Casas del Lago Hotel. We are happy to hear you liked the facilities, the modern room and the pool area! We do hope that you will choose to stay with us again on your next visit to Menorca!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.

title: Total relaxation
review: Stayed here last year it was fabulous and the breakfast was to die for.great pool and lovely apartment with great view over the pool and marina would recommend this hotel the only thing we didn't like was the terrible music the played all day at the pool.

title: Fabulous Location
review: Dear Rosebankl,  Thank you very much for your comment and for sharing your thoughts about your stay at Casas del Lago Hotel. We are happy to hear that you were satisfied with our facilities. We thank you very much for the compliments and we hope to see you back here soon again.   Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.

title: Chilled out in menorca
review: Just returned from our third visit here and again we have had a fantastic holiday. Staff really friendly, helpful and chatty. Room spotless and is cleaned daily and towels changed daily. Pool area relaxing with bar serving cocktails and brilliant food. Breakfast is full fry up or fruit , yogurt etc. restaurants are just 5 mins walk away and bus service just outside hotel. We love this complex as is so relaxing and clean. We will be going again soon for our fourth visit. We had no problems with wifi or air conditioning.

title: English cooked breakfast, cheap Estrella and a great location
review: Room was sizeable nice little balcony,   Great brekkie every morning with English produce although the beans could of done with being a bit warmer!  Only English channel on TV was BBC world and wifi was not great in lounge area of room.  Snack bar at pool was under staffed.  plenty of beds round pool, music through the day not too loud and reminded me of Ibiza sunset

title: Enjoyable stay but needs improvement.
review: Dear Kevin B,  Thank you very much for your lovely comment and for sharing your thoughts about your stay at Casas del Lago Hotel. We are happy to hear that you were satisfied with our facilities. We thank you very much for the compliments and we hope to see you back here soon again.   Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.

title: A gem of a find
review: Good points. Pool area is lovely! There seemed to be enough deck chairs plus they had other beds you could hire. The hire includes drinks so ends up being a great deal. I tested and found the normal deck chairs to be more comfortable though.  Prices for pool bar are not particularly overpriced which is good. Hotel has a 24hr mini market which had decent selection and again not particularly overpriced. Hotel breakfast was great. Large selection and nice environment near pool to eat.  Fiesta restaurant is the offsite location for dinners. I knew it was a casual family style place and was perfectly happy with this, especially as more upscale hotels I checked seemed to think men need to wear trousers during dinner. They did world cuisine and obviously have a decent cook as all meals…

title: Great hotel!! It's not in Ciutadella though..
review: Dear Danielwales,   Thank you very much for your comment and for taking the time to write such a detailed description of your stay at Casas del Lago Hotel.  We highly value your opinion for process of continuous improvement .  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconveniences caused during your check-in Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we look forward to welcoming you again at Menorca!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.

title: Lovely holiday but good could have been great!
review: We visited Casas del Lago with two friends for a chill out holiday, adults only hotel. From the moment we checked in the reception staff couldn't do enough for us. Excellent! We left our jackets on the transfer coach and within a minute of us telling reception they were tracing the coach and managed to get them back for us. Thank you girls. Our room had a harbour view, it was well laid out with a small kitchenette, good bathroom, bedroom and lounge area. The pool area was fantastic. Luxury beds (VIP) were available to rent for the day. They charged €14 but you get 2 mojito drinks €7 each plus nachos. Bargain! The VIP loungers also had a waiter call gadget that when used alerted the waiter via his special watch, that you were after service. The pool area has Bose outdoor speakers…

title: Great Location, but a little sterile.
review: Location could not be faulted, close to beach and Marina. The hotel itself seems to be fighting to carve out a niche, but not entirely sure what that niche is! Pool wise, never had a problem getting a sunbed and brolly, but as usual some decided that they needed to place towels on beds all day without ever turning up. Room (stayed in 57 - backed onto car park, fronted the garden area - Burger King end) - 1 bed apartment, dining area, seating area with T.V. well equipped kitchenette. Bath with shower over. There were 2 of us staying there and we had plenty of room - probably more than enough for 4 (sofa-beds in lounge), but would not fancy sharing a single bathroom. Only issue with the room was the fact that the air-con seemed too weak for the space - took something like 3-4…

title: Fantastic Holiday
review: Dear Goon1,   Thank you very much for your comment and for sharing your thoughts about your stay at Casas del Lago Hotel and for taking the time to write such a detailed description of your stay with us.  We will share your comments with our team, who I am certain will be encouraged by your remarks. We hope to see you back here soon again!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.

title: Fabulous Hotel
review: My wife and I have just returned from a 2 week (B&B) holiday at Casas Del Lago. The hotel, staff, facilities, location, music and food were all fantastic.   The only minor points are the A/C and WiFi could be more efficient.

title: Fantastic stay in Casas Del Lago
review: Dear Grahamste,   Thank you again for sharing your experience! We are glad to know that you enjoyed a fantastic stay with us! We look forward to seeing you very soon!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.

title: Wonderful Place
review: My boyfriend and I stayed here for a week in July. We were very lucky to get upgraded to a private Villa. It was amazing....private pool, beautiful lounge area overlooking the harbour. The Villa was pristine and very comfortable. The staff were incredibly professional and friendly, particularly Alex the hotel manager. The pool area was very chilled out and relaxing....glad there were no kiddies around! We will definitely be back! Highly recommend it!

title: Menorca experience
review: First impression very good standard, complex 4*+ Rooms 3*+ and only need refurbishment to gain 4*+. Very good staff and great idea 24 hour shop at sensible prices. Great location and very hard to beat that anywhere, regarding harbour and restaurants and beach. Breakfast as good as it gets regarding choice, but hold down your plates as service is quick clear tables. Be aware there's charges to the round cushioned beds and luxury beds, unless you book direct and they will allow you to have VIP wrist bands and not standard wrist bands. Unfortunately sunbed towel issues. Emmaculate facilities and very good staff for end of June and beginning of July. Not Sure in peak season? Overall I would recommend this hotel and will certainly go back next year,

title: A very lovely hotel almost perfect
review: Dear Ian K,  Thank you for your sharing your Casas del Lago experience! We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us during your visit to Menorca, we will share your comments with our team. Please let us know when your next visit to Casas del Lago will be and you will enjoy a memorable experience!  Warm regards, Alejandro Alguacil,  Director Hotel Casas del Lago 4*SUP.

title: Very good but not quite excellent
review: We arrived at hotel quickly, took a taxi from the airport, €66 as advertised. Welcomed by a very busy receptionist, but quick and easy. We had a 2 bed apartment.  Getting into the patio door was easy, locking it slightly more challenging... You have to put the key on, click lock once clockwise then hold the key for a good count of 5 before it engages the lock.  The apt does not live up to the beauty of the public areas, but is functional.  Apart from the doors of the wardrobe that are directly behind the bedroom door, and the wardrobe you need the most due to the safe being in there!!!  Safe was free, but it is a key type, and if you lose key, you are charged. Wifi was also free, you need to state how many devices you have at reception and enter a different code for each device.…

title: not to be missed
review: Dear Lee,  Thank you for your sharing your Casas del Lago experience in Tripadvisor. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us during your visit to Menorca! Also, we took note about the comments regarding the apartment and passed all the information to the manager in charge. Casas del Lago Hotel team look forward to welcoming back to you in a very near future!  Warm regards

title: Not what it appears
review: My wife and I have just returned from a five day break at this hotel. Overall we had a wonderful time and there are many positives to mention. But first let me deal with the negatives:- - the hotel needs to seriously consider the apparent need to have piped electro music around the whole complex from midday to midnight every day. It's not to everyone's taste and spoils what is otherwise a lovely pool area. - the AC is really weak and there were no electric fans available from reception - Wi-Fi is extremely poor within the complex. We needed to visit local restaurants to get proper Wi-Fi which is not acceptable in this day and age. - The bottle of wine in the fridge and the 'romance' pack in the room are not complimentary. The hotel should either provide them free or don't bother…

title: Fantastic holiday
review: Just back from 2 fab weeks in Casas Del Lago. This hotel really suited us ..great location overlooking marina, stunning swimming pool area, fantastic music at beach bar and excellent staff. Loads of good restaurants nearby and we enjoyed the flexibility of B&B. Breakfast really good. Only minor negative is that the air con could be more effective, esp in bedroom. Hope to go back.

title: Too Many Negatives
review: Dear HST_12,   Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and feedback. We are glad you have Casas del Lago Hotel for a stay in Menorca. It is a real pleasure to read that your stay at our hotel has been fabulous from the first moment until the time you had to leave!  Warm Regards

title: Agree with most reviews, good but could be great
review: We are regular travellers, and have reviewed many hotels - always in an honest manner.  This hotel flatters to deceive. The location, and the outward appearance is first rate - and on first sight, impressive. There are several positives - particularly the breakfast and the lovely pool. However, having been in three different rooms in the space of seven nights, we are well appraised to be objective.  Firstly, the AC is inadequate and obviously restricted. The rooms are sparsely and cheaply furnished and lack catering equipment, despite having a kitchenette. One room did not even have a kettle. The housekeeping was poor - in fact we were in our room one day when the maid completed her cleaning in 12 minutes. Needless to say - not very well!  The biggest criticism is that the Hotel…

title: Great hotel but could be better
review: First of all thank you very much for your opinion. My name is Alejandro Alguacil and I am the director of the Hotel Casas del Lago. I regret that there have been some situations that have not done it to be completely satisfied with our hotel. Tell that if some of his critics. On the one hand it is true that the air conditioning for a few days did not give adequate performance and even now is already solved for reform is anticipated this winter aumentare renew machinery and power. As for cleaning, comment that daily cleaning of an apartment can last 12 minutes as you say and not have to be poor. It always depends on how the apartment is to come clean. Can be very dirty or may be very clean and that lengthen or shorten the time it takes to do such cleaning. Finally tell I'm always on site at the disposal of customers all day. Many customer comments appoint my closeness to the customer and always try to be close to you to fix and improve the problems that may occur. Anyway, I hope to see you soon in the hotel and assist you personally.  A greeting and thank you very much. Alejandro Alguacil.

title: Hotel/appartments nice located at the harbour
review: As part of a quick 4 day break in Menorca, we looked to complement 2 days in Mahon, with 2 days in a busy beach area, and Cala'n Bosch is a perfect fit for this purpose.  Without any booking, we struggled a little to find space at a reasonable price, so when we saw a sea view suite available here for about £150 per night including breakfast it seemed worth 'pushing the boat out' for.  Although we'd seen plenty of rooms on offer on the internet, seeing as we were in Cala'n Bosch, we decided to just turn up at reception and book. That way we could hopefully check out the suite first. Bizarrely on arrival, we were told 'sorry we are full'. Only when I pointed out that the likes of TA and Booking.com were advertising availability, did they call a supervisor and found that they did…

title: Amazing 'Ibiza' Cool hotel........but could do better !
review: Just returned from a 7 night stay in a Sea 'Cool Suite' which we loved......generally ! We chose this hotel as it was adults only & we love peace & quiet which this hotel delivered in bucket loads, even the DJ who came daily for a few hours played fantastic chilled tunes. Prior to arriving we were a little worried that it would be a 'Beautiful People' type of place but our worries were soon put to rest as there was a complete cross section of all ages there which we loved. The pools were superb with plenty of sun beds for everyone not to be worried about hunting a couple out at all. The views over the marina were amazing from the poolside too. The room we were originally put into (87) which was supposed to have 'unique Mediterranean views' was a slight let down to say the least…

title: Good holiday with a few concerns
review: Dear Samjack,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback following your recent stay at the Casas del Lago hotel. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your time here with us. It is our pleasure to see that you liked our hotel, beach club and the guest rooms. We really do hope to receive you back at our hotel in the future!  Warm regards

title: Nice relaxing hotel, could improve...
review: Have just returned from a weeks holiday at the Casas del Lago.  We really enjoyed our break but had a few concerns.  Firstly we had a room overlooking the pool and marina which was lovely, but the room itself was very tired, especially the bathroom.  On arrival we opened he fridge and found a bottle of vino which wasn't particularly nice, and then found an adult heart shaped box with adult contents in it.  The wine we drank and the box lay unopened on the table, but when checking out were charged 25 euros.  Now there is no mention of any charge which I think is just a con, disgraceful!!!! Outside the hotel is rather messy and doesn't bode well for your arrival.  The atmosphere around the pool was very relaxing until a man came with a petrol lawnmower and made a racket, I would…

title: Relaxing & Recharging
review: Dear Janandjohncginn,  Thank you for all your comments and we have taken good note of them. We deeply regret that we have not been able to be meet your expectations. Please be certain that we have taken well note of your comment about the room and the atmosphere around the pool. We truly apologize for the inconveniences. Be rest assured that we have taken well note of it.  It would be a pleasure to welcome you back in the near future so we could have the opportunity to show you that we work every day to offer the best service to our clients.   Warm regards

title: Really nice place to stay
review: Hotel is very relaxing - nice to not have kids running around screaming. The pools are fantastic, nice to have a drink in the sun with your feet up. The room was super clean and a good size (although can't see the TV from the bed) - very comfy for chilling out in the morning or before going for dinner. Reception staff seemed not to fit in with the place, very snooty and a bit arrogant - ignoring them seemed to do the trick (as they ignored us). Area - the small port was ok, bit too 80's style restaurants and entertainment, but not a problem as Menorca is small and easy to visit other areas.

title: Excellent
review: Returned on Tuesday and already planning to go back. We could not fault a single thing, spotlessly clean and staff friendly and efficient. Read that some people are moaning about the music??? No charge for safety deposit boxes, air con etc and on leaving day there are showers to use, towels supplied and use of a hairdryer. Altogether a perfect hotel which made for a perfect holiday without children. Recommending to family and friends. Hope to see you next year x

title: So relaxing
review: Dear Katrina,  First of all, we would like to thank you very much for your fantastic review about the Casas del Lago Hotel. We are delighted you had an enjoyable stay with us and thank you once again for your kind comments about the service offered. We really look forward to receiving you back in the very near future.  Warm regards

title: Casas del Lago, very relaxing.
review: I visited this hotel in early July for a relaxing post-university break with a friend and we were not disappointed. This was the best hotel we saw on the coach drop off and from walking around the local area. We left having lost all track of days and time, an extremely peaceful and tranquil retreat with lovely views over the marina.   ROOMS: We stayed in one of the standard twin rooms which are yet to be refurbished fully I believe. They were spotlessly clean and the bedroom was spacious and nicely decorated. The bathroom was in need of a revamp but was as I say, very clean. The space wasn't used very effectively as we never used the kitchenette or lounge area. Take your own hairdryer as the bathroom one is very weak and ours broke.  LOCAL AREA: Cala'n Bosch is a lovely small…

title: Lovely set up, but the afternoon poolside music ?
review: Dear TravelFeedsMySoul,  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor! We love that you have chosen to stay with us in Menorca. We are happy to hear you liked the facilities! We appreciate your kind words. We do hope that you will choose to stay with us again on your next visit to Menorca.  Warm regards

title: Lovely hotel but a little confused...
review: We have just returned from a stay Casa del Lago. This is our forth time we have stayed and every time the service and accommodation has got better. We usually visit Casas outside the school holidays to avoid high cost flights. This year Casas went adults only. The accomadation we stayed in was a Harbour Cool Suite overlooking the marina. Great for people watching parading around the marina and visiting the many restaurants. Our room had been completely revamp since our last stay, very bright and modern. In the bedroom area there was a coloured light display around and under the bed! There are few people I would like to mention. Firstly the Manager, Alex (sorry if I got the spelling wrong) An excellent host. Pablo at breakfast, Mate as one of the excellent pool staff, Fran on…

title: Fantastic
review: The hotel is fabulous . we had a two bedroom apartment which was great as my husband and I had one room and my mum and our daughter had the other , both had their own well equipt bathroom.  The location is perfect overlooking the beautiful marina. The pool area is just lovely so although the beach is only a minute walk we preferred to stay by the pool (and bar) . There are lots of great restaurants around the marina serving a host of different foods. The breakfast at the hotel is very good and they do light lunches by the pool every day (great salads) as well as other choice's.  The staff are all lovely but the help and kindness we were shown from the general manager Alex was exceptional what a fantastic young man . we have stayed all over the world and all agree Alex is by far…

title: Relaxing week break
review: Dear Beverley,   Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and feedback. We are glad you have Casas del Lago Hotel for a stay in Menorca. It is a real pleasure to read that your stay at our hotel has been fabulous from the first moment until the time you had to leave. The details are highly taken into considerations with the only purpose of making feel our guests at home in luxury and well equipped facilities. It is nice to hear our staff made your stay comfortable, we will forward you feedback to them!  Warm Regards

title: OMG !!!
review: Having just returned from a fantastic holiday. The hotel is absolutely spotless. We stayed in an apartment that was fine just badly designed. A lot of waisted space in the lounge/dining area & not enough in the bedroom but like anything else you learn to adapt. If we went back we would request a bungalow with a view overlooking the marina. These were amazing. The breakfasts were some of the best we have ever had. Eating out round the marina was a delight. There is a bus stop outside the hotel,very convenient. All in all well worth another visit

title: Children
review: Dear Olmagr,  Thank you very much for choosing Casas del Lago Hotel for your stay in Menorca and for sharing your experience with the Tripadvisor community. Thank you for trusting us and hope to see you soon!  Warm regards

title: Great Stay
review: What a fabulous time we had last month only for 3 days though,As the Villa we booked in Cala Blanca never worked out for us..after 7 days we had to leave ,.Headed to Calan Bosch & saw This hotel, it looked lovely on entering , you felt like your Holiday had just started !the reception staff were very helpful & gave us a lovely "cool room"WOW.. It took our breath away .. What a surprise I got today,my husband has booked 5 days We go on Sunday 😀😎 It was so relaxing .. Fantastic chill out pool ,Breakfast is brill .. Great choice.. Hope it stays ADULTS ONLY.. As there are lots of accomodation geared up to families.We have 8 Grandkids , so wonderful for us to chill out . COOL ROOM SUITE , "Here we come"  Hope the DJ is there .. Calming chill out tunes 👍🏻🌞

title: Chilled luxury
review: We stayed here for 2 weeks, the breakfast is great with proper back bacon, something you don't see often in Europe. The pool area is very relaxing and the rooms are spacious, clean and well furnished. The view over the harbour is super and you eat breakfast overlooking this every day. The area itself is interesting with lots of good restaurants and bars locally, there are walks locally, to the nearest beach and up to the lighthouse in the opposite direction. We will certainly return.

title: Highly recommended
review: Dear Dorothy,  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor! We love that you have chosen to stay with us in Menorca. We appreciate you kind words about our modern and comfortable rooms. We would also like to thank you for your comments about breakfast. This year we have amazing plates to offer every morning! We look forward to welcoming you back again and again!   Warm regards

title: Great Aparthotel
review: Stayed here for 4 nights from 14th June and would highly recommend, we were upgraded to a two bed apartment which we didn't really need as there was only two of us but it was still nice to have the extra space and extra bathroom, we was here for my 50th birthday and was given a belanese bed free and free skewers of strawberries, grapes and pineapple by the pool, which were really nice.         It is in a fantastic location, brilliant rooms, we had room 38 which had a great view of the marina but a bit away from the pool and beach club which great.         The staff were all friendly and helpful, the music played round the pool was ok and quiet relaxing but it was a bit to loud on a couple of occasions, but it didn't really bother us. The only small problem was the water supply…

title: Calas Del Lagas - fantastic stay
review: Dear Jeff,  Thank you for your wonderful 5 star review on Tripadvisor. We appreciate the time you took to share your experience with us and we love that you enjoyed your time at Casas del Lago Hotel Thank you for your kind words to our staff, we will forward your feedback to them.  We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again soon!   Warm Regards

title: Superb
review: Stayed here for a week in early June, the resort is spotless, the rooms are cleaned everyday and towels changed on a daily basis. We stayed on a Bed & Breakfast deal and the food at breakfast was superb everything you could possibly want to eat or drink. The staff are so friendly and they stop and talk to you wherever you are in the hotel. Would definately go back.

title: Highly recommend!
review: My husband and I spent a great week here from 30th May - 6th June 2015. Upon arrival we walked into this immaculate, very modern entrance and reception area. The lady on reception was very helpful. We were showed the location of our apartment and off we went! We arrived outside our apartment doors (looked like patio doors) and upon entering the apartment our breaths were blown away! It was huge!!!!  We had a lovely lounge area with big sofa and tv, a kitchenette with all the utensils you could need and the bedroom area was impressive. It was bright, light and extremely modern.  What we found next to the bed was surprising. There was an electronic dial which we couldn't work out what it did, when we did OMG. It turns out there were lights behind the bed and you could have them as…

title: Excellent Place
review: Dear Alex,  Thank you for your wonderful 5 star review on Tripadvisor. We appreciate the time you took to share your experience with us. Our hotel with its modern rooms and suites with a lounge area, big sofa, tv, kitchenette, pool area... is indeed unforgettable part of Casas del Lago experience. Certainly your satisfaction is our best award and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our doors again soon.  Warm regards

title: Great hotel and location
review: We have just returned from 10 days at the Casa del Lago.  Could not fault the staff, accommodation or the breakfast.  The only thing that spoiled it was the music being played by a DJ on an afternoon.  It was loud, consisted mostly of drums, some opera and some church music.  Who needs this when all they want to do is lie round the pool and enjoy the the sun.  If the music had been back ground and softer that would have been fine but one day I sat outside the suite and the drumming was so intense that I could feel it banging in my head and had to go in and close the doors.  I would certainly recommend that place to stay if they did not have the music and as most people are older couples there was a lot that we talked to said the same thing. Sorry about this review but that…

title: Every aspect of the hotel is aimed at a relaxing stay.
review: Dear Jane,  Thank you very much for choosing Casas del Lago Hotel for your stay in Menorca and for sharing your experience with the Tripadvisor community. We would also like to thank you for your kind words towards our staff, we will forward you comments to them. We regret that the chill out music have not fulfilled your expectations. Thank you for trusting us and hope to see you soon!  Warm regards

title: Used the beach club only
review: This is a first class run hotel. The rooms are large with a separate area to relax. The rooms come with cooking facilities and a fridge  Ideal situated beside the marine.  The breakfast in the morning is excellent . It is the first time on a continental holiday were they not only serve the streaky bacon but the full bacon slice.  However the highlight for us at breakfast was the Nespresso machine , perfect coffee in the morning  We stayed on the half board option which I would recommend. You eat in the Fiesta restaurant beside the marina, The selection of food was excellent. The fish , salads and local fish stew are all great  The house Rioja and the local Menorca wine are good value for money and are under 20 Euros a bottle  We had the option to have dinner one night in the…

title: Just the best
review: Very chilled place to go. Absolutely spotless, great staff, great rooms, fabulous cocktails, lovely pool, & in the marina there are some wonderful restaurants serving the best seafood. This is an adults place and works for those who want that, and some very cool music poolside. Just go and enjoy a very relaxed holiday.

title: Fantastic place
review: Dear Howard,  Thank you very much for choosing Casas del Lago Hotel for your stay in Menorca and for sharing your experience with the Tripadvisor community. It is a real pleasure to read that your stay at our hotel has been fantastic from the very first moment until the time you had to leave.   We do hope that you will choose to stay with us again on your next visit to Menorca, a returning guest is our greatest compliment received  Warm regards

title: Amazing place
review: we stayed here the day after it opened for the season. We had a brand new bungalow overlooking the marina.  Everything was excellent.  There we a few teething problems with the bungalow eg curtains not fitting, however Alex the manager did everything to put things right.  He couldn't have done more for us. He is such a charming man and did more than his best.  Everything is superb at this hotel, food, accommodation and staff. What a wonderful 10 days we had. Thank you Alex for all your helps. Ian and Jean

title: Comfortable and Slightly Unusual
review: Dear Jeanius,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on the Casas del Lago Hotel. We are happy to hear you liked our new facilities. We appreciate your kind words to our staff. The smile in the face of every member of the Casas del Lago family is ever-present at the hotel. We will forward your personalized feedback to Alex.   Warm regards

title: First time in menorca
review: We have just returned from this hotel yesterday 30th May. Stayed here for a week. Would recomend a stay at this adults only hotel to anyone and hope to return next year. I cant begin to tell you how much the we enjoyed our stay. All the staff were fantastic and so friendly, nothing was to much trouble for them and they really went that extra mile to make you feel welcome.The reception staff were brilliant, the restaurant staff so helpful and friendly. I cant express how great they made our stay. The hotel is spotlessly clean, beautifully designed and decorated. The apartments are a pleasure to stay in. Only one little thing that got on our nearves was the dj that played music around the pool. Its not needed during the day as guests are trying to relax and some days it felt like…

title: Simply stunning.
review: 2nd stay, I did say I would return! Newly refurbished bungalows are called harbour suites, just amazing. They have taken note of my last 2 niggles, wall mirrors and sunshade on the terrace. We were the first occupants so there were teething troubles with inadequate temporary curtains but their hard work really shows in the gorgeous design and styling. The Amazing white modern suite with Porcelanosa shower fittings and kitchen area shows that they have not scrimped on quality. The coloured lighting around the bed area was fabulous. A nice touch. We found it peaceful and apart from a little music at the pool bar for a few hours some days that is all we heard in 9 days.  The buffet breakfast is perfect, it's worth paying for, however I do hate to see some older people taking food…

title: holiday ruined by loud music!!
review: Dear JenR869,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on the Casas del Lago Hotel. We are happy to hear you liked the facilities and wanted to be your chill out destination! We appreciate your kind words.  We do hope that you will choose to stay with us again on your next visit to Menorca, a returning guest is our greatest compliment received!  Warm Regards, Deputy Director
